 164+ 7AF7              KeyCode_Equip        	equ VK_C
 165+ 7AF7              KeyCode_GalacticChrt 	equ VK_5
 166+ 7AF7              KeyCode_LocalChart   	equ VK_6
 167+ 7AF7              KeyCode_MarketPrices 	equ VK_7
 168+ 7AF7              KeyCode_Status       	equ VK_8
 169+ 7AF7              KeyCode_Inventory    	equ VK_9
 170+ 7AF7              KeyCode_GameSkip     	equ VK_Z
 171+ 7AF7              KeyCode_Save         	equ VK_O
 172+ 7AF7              KeyCode_Freeze       	equ VK_B
 173+ 7AF7              KeyCode_Resume       	equ VK_L
 174+ 7AF7              KeyCode_Recentre     	equ VK_D
 175+ 7AF7              KeyCode_Quit         	equ VK_Y
 176+ 7AF7              KeyCode_PlanetData   	equ VK_0
 177+ 7AF7              KeyCode_CursorUp        equ VK_Q
 178+ 7AF7              KeyCode_CursorDown      equ VK_A
 179+ 7AF7              KeyCode_PressedYes      equ VK_Y
 180+ 7AF7              KeyCode_PressedNo       equ VK_N
 181+ 7AF7
 182+ 7AF7 00 00 00...  Keys					DS	40          ; This is the list of key states for all the VK keys presssed i.e. VK_CAPS through to VK_B
 183+ 7B1F              c_KeyBoardLen 			equ $ - Keys
 184+ 7B1F 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 185+ 7B27 FE FD FB F7  KeyAddrTab				DB	$FE, $FD, $FB, $F7, $EF, $DF, $BF, $7F
 185+ 7B2B EF DF BF 7F
 186+ 7B2F              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 187+ 7B2F              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 188+ 7B2F              ; key list sequence is in table above
 189+ 7B2F 06 7B 07 7B  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 189+ 7B33 08 7B 09 7B
 189+ 7B37 11 7B
 190+ 7B39 10 7B 01 7B                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 190+ 7B3D FC 7A 02 7B
 190+ 7B41 FD 7A
 191+ 7B43 1A 7B 05 7B                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_FireLaser    ,Keys+KeyCode_TargetMissle ,Keys+KeyCode_FireMissile  ,Keys+KeyCode_UnarmMissile ,Keys+KeyCode_ECM
 191+ 7B47 FF 7A 04 7B
 191+ 7B4B 03 7B
 192+ 7B4D 13 7B F7 7A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_EnergyBomb   ,Keys+KeyCode_EscapePod    ,Keys+KeyCode_DockingComp  ,Keys+KeyCode_Hyperspace   ,Keys+KeyCode_Distance
 192+ 7B51 1D 7B 19 7B
 192+ 7B55 18 7B
 193+ 7B57 00 7B 16 7B                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_HomeCursor   ,Keys+KeyCode_Launch       ,Keys+KeyCode_BuyCargo     ,Keys+KeyCode_SellCargo    ,Keys+KeyCode_Equip
 193+ 7B5B 1E 7B FB 7A
 193+ 7B5F FA 7A
 194+ 7B61 0A 7B 0F 7B                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GalacticChrt ,Keys+KeyCode_LocalChart   ,Keys+KeyCode_MarketPrices ,Keys+KeyCode_Status       ,Keys+KeyCode_Inventory
 194+ 7B65 0E 7B 0D 7B
 194+ 7B69 0C 7B
 195+ 7B6B F8 7A 11 7B                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GameSkip     ,Keys+KeyCode_Save         ,Keys+KeyCode_Freeze       ,Keys+KeyCode_Resume       ,Keys+KeyCode_Recentre
 195+ 7B6F 1E 7B 16 7B
 195+ 7B73 FE 7A
 196+ 7B75 14 7B 0B 7B                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_Quit         ,Keys+KeyCode_PlanetData   ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorUp     ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorDown   ,Keys+KeyCode_Find
 196+ 7B79 01 7B FC 7A
 196+ 7B7D FF 7A
 197+ 7B7F 14 7B 1D 7B                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_PressedYes   ,Keys+KeyCode_PressedNo
 198+ 7B83
 199+ 7B83 23 5A 58 43  ASCII_Map:              DB "#","Z","X","C","V"
 199+ 7B87 56
 200+ 7B88 41 53 44 46                          DB "A","S","D","F","G"
 200+ 7B8C 47
 201+ 7B8D 51 57 45 52                          DB "Q","W","E","R","T"
 201+ 7B91 54
 202+ 7B92 31 32 33 34                          DB "1","2","3","4","5"
 202+ 7B96 35
 203+ 7B97 30 39 38 37                          DB "0","9","8","7","6"
 203+ 7B9B 36
 204+ 7B9C 50 4F 49 55                          DB "P","O","I","U","Y"
 204+ 7BA0 59
 205+ 7BA1 3E 4C 4B 4A                          DB ">","L","K","J","H"
 205+ 7BA5 48
 206+ 7BA6 20 5E 4D 4E                          DB " ","^","M","N","B"
 206+ 7BAA 42
 207+ 7BAB
 208+ 7BAB              ; mapping of a code to the lookup table Keyboard map. So if you are using an addr_Pressed you can then fetch from KeyboardMap the address in Keys
 209+ 7BAB              ; for the raw key press status
 210+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Front         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Front
 211+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Aft           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Aft
 212+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Left          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Left
 213+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Right         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Right
 214+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_RollLeft      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollLeft
 215+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_RollRight     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollRight
 216+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Dive          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Dive
 217+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Climb         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Climb
 218+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Accellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Accellerate
 219+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Decellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Decellerate
 220+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_FireLaser     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireLaser
 221+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_TargetMissle
 222+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_FireMissile   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireMissile
 223+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_UnarmMissile
 224+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_ECM           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_ECM
 225+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_EnergyBomb    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EnergyBomb
 226+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_EscapePod     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EscapePod
 227+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_DockingComp   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_DockingComp
 228+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Hyperspace    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Hyperspace
 229+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Distance      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Distance
 230+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_HomeCursor    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_HomeCursor
 231+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Launch        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Launch
 232+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 233+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 234+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 235+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 236+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 237+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 238+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status
 239+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 240+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 241+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save
 242+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Freeze        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Freeze
 243+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume
 244+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Recentre      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Recentre
 245+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit
 246+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_PlanetData    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_PlanetData
 247+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_CursorUp      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorUp
 248+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_CursorDown    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorDown
 249+ 7BAB              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
 250+ 7BAB
 251+ 7BAB
 252+ 7BAB              MIsKeyPressed:          MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 253+ 7BAB ~                                    ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 254+ 7BAB ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 255+ 7BAB ~                                    JumpIfAIsZero   misstarget
 256+ 7BAB                                      ENDM
 257+ 7BAB
 258+ 7BAB 21 F7 7A     init_keyboard:          ld		hl,Keys                         ; no key s are pressed by default
 259+ 7BAE 11 28 00                             ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen               ;
 260+ 7BB1 3E 00                                ld		a,0                             ;
 261+ 7BB3 CD AD 7A                             call	memfill_dma                     ;
 262+ 7BB6 C9                                   ret                                     ;
 263+ 7BB7
 264+ 7BB7
 265+ 7BB7
 266+ 7BB7 DD 21 1F 7B  scan_keyboard:          ld		ix,RawKeys                      ; hl = table of raw IO port readings
 267+ 7BBB 21 27 7B                             ld		hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 268+ 7BBE 0E 08                                ld		c,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 269+ 7BC0 11 F7 7A                             ld      de,Keys                         ; ix = table of key states from raw read
 270+ 7BC3 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 271+ 7BC4 DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 272+ 7BC6 DD 77 00                             ld      (ix+0),a                        ; save raw scan
 273+ 7BC9 DD 23                                inc     ix
 274+ 7BCB 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 275+ 7BCC 06 05        .ProcessInputBits:      ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 276+ 7BCE 1F           .ProcessBitsLoop:       rra                                     ; shit bit 0 into carry
 277+ 7BCF CB 47                                bit		0,a								; is bit set
 278+ 7BD1 30 08                                jr      nc,.SetKeyPressed               ; low bit means it was pressed
 279+ 7BD3 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 280+ 7BD5                                      ZeroA
 280+ 7BD5 AF          >                        xor a
 281+ 7BD6 C3 E3 7B                             jp      .SetKey
 282+ 7BD9 20 0B                                jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 283+ 7BDB FD 6F        .SetKeyPressed:	        ld      iyl,a                           ; save current input byte
 284+ 7BDD 1A                                   ld      a,(de)                          ; get current keystate
 285+ 7BDE FE 02                                cp      2
 286+ 7BE0 28 02                                jr      z,.AlreadyHeld
 287+ 7BE2 3C                                   inc     a                               ; and increment by 1 as its moved from previous state
 288+ 7BE3 12           .SetKey:                ld		(de),a				  	        ; save key Pressed state
 289+ 7BE4 FD 7D        .AlreadyHeld:           ld      a,iyl                           ; and retrieve the current input byte
 290+ 7BE6 13           .SkipKeySet:	        inc		de								; move to next key
 291+ 7BE7 10 E5                                djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 292+ 7BE9 0D                                   dec     c                               ; thats one row of bits all processed
 293+ 7BEA 20 D7                                jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 294+ 7BEC C9                                   ret
 295+ 7BED
 296+ 7BED
 297+ 7BED
 298+ 7BED              GetKeyStateAddressDE:   MACRO
 299+ 7BED ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 300+ 7BED ~                                    add     hl,a
 301+ 7BED ~                                    ld      e,(hl)
 302+ 7BED ~                                    inc     hl
 303+ 7BED ~                                    ld      d,(hl)                          ; now de = address in keypress list
 304+ 7BED                                      ENDM
 305+ 7BED
 306+ 7BED              GetKeyStateAddressHL:   MACRO
 307+ 7BED ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 308+ 7BED ~                                    add     hl,a
 309+ 7BED ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 310+ 7BED ~                                    inc     hl
 311+ 7BED ~                                    ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 312+ 7BED ~                                    ld      l,a
 313+ 7BED                                      ENDM
 314+ 7BED
 315+ 7BED
 316+ 7BED              ;;old debug codeCurrentX            DB 0
 317+ 7BED              ;;old debug codeCurrentY            DB 0
 318+ 7BED              ;;old debug code
 319+ 7BED              ;;old debug codedisplayKeyStatus:       xor         a
 320+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 321+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          hl,RawKeys
 322+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(hl)
 323+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        and         %00011111
 324+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          b,5
 325+ 7BED              ;;old debug code.displayLoop:           push        bc,,hl
 326+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        rra
 327+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        jr          c,.displayNoPress
 328+ 7BED              ;;old debug code.displayPress:          push        af
 329+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 330+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 331+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 332+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 333+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'*'
 334+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 335+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 336+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 337+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 338+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 339+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 340+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 341+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 342+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ret
 343+ 7BED              ;;old debug code.displayNoPress:        push        af
 344+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 345+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 346+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 347+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 348+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'O'
 349+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 350+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 351+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 352+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 353+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 354+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 355+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 356+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 357+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ret
 358+ 7BED              ;;old debug code
 359+ 7BED              ;;old debug codedisplayDownStatus:      ld  a,(Keys+      KeyCode_CursorUp)
 360+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        cp  0
 361+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayNoUp
 362+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        cp  1
 363+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayUp
 364+ 7BED              ;;old debug code.displayHeld:           ld      de,8*15
 365+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"*"
 366+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 367+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 368+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ret
 369+ 7BED              ;;old debug code.displayUp:             ld      de,8*15
 370+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"+"
 371+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 372+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 373+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ret
 374+ 7BED              ;;old debug code.displayNoUp:             ld      de,8*15
 375+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"O"
 376+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 377+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 378+ 7BED              ;;old debug code                        ret
 379+ 7BED              ;;old debug code
 380+ 7BED
 381+ 7BED
 382+ 7BED              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan, waits until key gets to state 1, if it was already held then#
 383+ 7BED              ; it will have to be let go to reset of 0 and scan again
 384+ 7BED              ; Deprecated as not used as yet
 385+ 7BED              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_press:   GetKeyStateAddressHL
 386+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 387+ 7BED              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 388+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 389+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 390+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 391+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfANENusng  1,.wait_loop             ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 392+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 393+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        ret
 394+ 7BED              ;;;;;;; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan waits until key gets to state 2
 395+ 7BED              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_held:    GetKeyStateAddressDE
 396+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 397+ 7BED              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 398+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 399+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 400+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 401+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  2, .wait_loop
 402+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 403+ 7BED              ;;;;;;                        ret
 404+ 7BED
 405+ 7BED              ; Gets the current keystate of the c_Pressed Key in a register
 406+ 7BED              get_key_a_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 406+ 7BED 21 2F 7B    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 406+ 7BF0 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 406+ 7BF2 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 406+ 7BF3 23          >                        inc     hl
 406+ 7BF4 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 406+ 7BF5 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 407+ 7BF6 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 408+ 7BF7 C9                                   ret
 409+ 7BF8
 410+ 7BF8              ; sets they keystate of c pressed key in a register to 1 (pressed)
 411+ 7BF8              force_key_press:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; read key locations
 411+ 7BF8 21 2F 7B    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 411+ 7BFB ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 411+ 7BFD 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 411+ 7BFE 23          >                        inc     hl
 411+ 7BFF 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 411+ 7C00 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 412+ 7C01 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 413+ 7C03 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 414+ 7C04 C9                                   ret
 415+ 7C05
 416+ 7C05              is_key_up_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL
 416+ 7C05 21 2F 7B    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 416+ 7C08 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 416+ 7C0A 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 416+ 7C0B 23          >                        inc     hl
 416+ 7C0C 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 416+ 7C0D 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 417+ 7C0E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 418+ 7C0F FE 00                                cp      0
 419+ 7C11 C9                                   ret
 420+ 7C12
 421+ 7C12              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 422+ 7C12              is_key_pressed:         GetKeyStateAddressHL
 422+ 7C12 21 2F 7B    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 422+ 7C15 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 422+ 7C17 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 422+ 7C18 23          >                        inc     hl
 422+ 7C19 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 422+ 7C1A 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 423+ 7C1B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 424+ 7C1C FE 01                                cp      1                               ; we cant just test bit 0 as this may have been held long
 425+ 7C1E C9                                   ret
 426+ 7C1F
 427+ 7C1F              ; returns nz is set if c_ key is held, if key was held then keystate would be 2 or 3, i.e. bit 1 set
 428+ 7C1F              is_key_held:            GetKeyStateAddressHL
 428+ 7C1F 21 2F 7B    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 428+ 7C22 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 428+ 7C24 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 428+ 7C25 23          >                        inc     hl
 428+ 7C26 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 428+ 7C27 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 429+ 7C28 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 430+ 7C29 E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 431+ 7C2B C9                                   ret
 432+ 7C2C
 433+ 7C2C              ; checks to see if any key is pressed in the key table
 434+ 7C2C 21 F7 7A     is_any_key_pressed:     ld      hl,Keys
 435+ 7C2F 01 28 00                             ld      bc,40
 436+ 7C32 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 437+ 7C34 ED B1                                cpir                                    ; search for the value 1
 438+ 7C36 28 03                                jr      z,.KeyPressed                   ; if a key was pressed then handle press
 439+ 7C38                                      SetAFalse
 439+ 7C38 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 440+ 7C3A C9                                   ret
 441+ 7C3B 3E 27        .KeyPressed:            ld      a,39                            ; so c will be how many keys still to scan
 442+ 7C3D 91                                   sub     c                               ; so a = 40 - c to get to result
 443+ 7C3E C9                                   ret
 444+ 7C3F
 445+ 7C3F 21 F7 7A     is_any_key_held:        ld      hl,Keys
 446+ 7C42 06 28                                ld      b,40
 447+ 7C44 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 448+ 7C46 7E           .KeyReadLoop:           ld      a,(hl)
 449+ 7C47 E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 450+ 7C49 C2 53 7C                             jp      nz,.KeyPressed
 451+ 7C4C 23                                   inc     hl
 452+ 7C4D 0C                                   inc     c
 453+ 7C4E 10 F6                                djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 454+ 7C50                                      SetAFalse
 454+ 7C50 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 455+ 7C52 C9                                   ret
 456+ 7C53 79           .KeyPressed:            ld      a,c
 457+ 7C54 C9                                   ret
 458+ 7C55
 459+ 7C55
 460+ 7C55 21 27 7B     WaitForNoKey:           ld      hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 461+ 7C58 06 08                                ld		b,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 462+ 7C5A 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 463+ 7C5B DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 464+ 7C5D E6 1F                                and     %00011111
 465+ 7C5F FE 1F                                cp      %00011111
 466+ 7C61 20 F2                                jr      nz ,WaitForNoKey
 467+ 7C63 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 468+ 7C64 10 F4                                djnz    .PortReadLoop
 469+ 7C66 C9                                   ret
 470+ 7C67
 471+ 7C67 F5 D5 C5 E5  WaitForAnyKey:          push    af,,de,,bc,,hl
 472+ 7C6B CD 55 7C                             call    WaitForNoKey
 473+ 7C6E 21 27 7B     .waitKeyLoop:           ld		hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 474+ 7C71 06 08                                ld		b,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 475+ 7C73 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 476+ 7C74 DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 477+ 7C76 E6 1F                                and     %00011111
 478+ 7C78 FE 1F                                cp      %00011111
 479+ 7C7A C2 84 7C                             jp      nz,.WaitComplete
 480+ 7C7D C0                                   ret     nz
 481+ 7C7E 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 482+ 7C7F 10 F2                                djnz    .PortReadLoop
 483+ 7C81 C3 6E 7C                             jp      .waitKeyLoop
 484+ 7C84 E1 C1 D1 F1  .WaitComplete:          pop     af,,de,,bc,,hl
 485+ 7C88 C9                                   ret
 486+ 7C89
 487+ 7C89
 488+ 7C89 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 489+ 7CA7 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 490+ 7CA8 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 491+ 7CA9 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 492+ 7CAA 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 493+ 7CAB              InputLimit              EQU 20
 494+ 7CAB
 495+ 7CAB 21 89 7C     keyboard_copy_input_to_de:  ld      hl,InputString
 496+ 7CAE 3A A8 7C                                 ld      a,(InputCursor)
 497+ 7CB1 FE 00                                    cp      0
 498+ 7CB3 28 05                                    jr      z,.NoString
 499+ 7CB5 4F                                       ld      c,a
 500+ 7CB6 06 00                                    ld      b,0
 501+ 7CB8 ED B0                                    ldir
 502+ 7CBA 3E 00        .NoString                   ld      a,0
 503+ 7CBC 12                                       ld      (de),a
 504+ 7CBD C9                                       ret
 505+ 7CBE
 506+ 7CBE AF           initInputText:          xor     a
 507+ 7CBF 32 A8 7C                             ld      (InputCursor),a
 508+ 7CC2                                      SetMemFalse EnterPressed
 508+ 7CC2 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 508+ 7CC4 32 A9 7C    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 509+ 7CC7                                      SetMemFalse InputChanged
 509+ 7CC7 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 509+ 7CC9 32 AA 7C    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 510+ 7CCC 21 89 7C                             ld      hl,InputString
 511+ 7CCF 06 1E                                ld      b,30
 512+ 7CD1 77           .wipeloop:              ld      (hl),a
 513+ 7CD2 23                                   inc     hl
 514+ 7CD3 10 FC                                djnz    .wipeloop
 515+ 7CD5 C9                                   ret
 516+ 7CD6
 517+ 7CD6              InputName:              SetMemFalse InputChanged
 517+ 7CD6 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 517+ 7CD8 32 AA 7C    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 518+ 7CDB CD 2C 7C                             call    is_any_key_pressed
 519+ 7CDE FE FF                                cp      $FF
 520+ 7CE0 C8                                   ret     z
 521+ 7CE1 4F           .KeyPressed:            ld      c,a
 522+ 7CE2 3A A8 7C                             ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 523+ 7CE5 FE 14                                cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 524+ 7CE7 28 0B                                jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 525+ 7CE9 21 83 7B                             ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 526+ 7CEC 79                                   ld      a,c
 527+ 7CED ED 31                                add     hl,a
 528+ 7CEF 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 529+ 7CF0 FE 41                                cp      "A"
 530+ 7CF2 30 0B                                jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 531+ 7CF4              ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 532+ 7CF4 FE 20        .DeleteOrEnterOnly      cp      " "                             ; if space was  pressed (mapped to Hash in ASCII table))
 533+ 7CF6 28 33                                jr      z,.SpacePressed               ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 534+ 7CF8 FE 3E                                cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 535+ 7CFA 28 19                                jr      z,.EnterPressed
 536+ 7CFC FE 23                                cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 537+ 7CFE C9                                   ret
 538+ 7CFF 47           .AlphaPressed:          ld      b,a
 539+ 7D00 3A A8 7C                             ld      a,(InputCursor)
 540+ 7D03 4F                                   ld      c,a
 541+ 7D04 21 89 7C                             ld      hl,InputString
 542+ 7D07 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 543+ 7D09 78                                   ld      a,b
 544+ 7D0A 70                                   ld      (hl),b
 545+ 7D0B 79                                   ld      a,c
 546+ 7D0C 21 A8 7C                             ld      hl,InputCursor
 547+ 7D0F 34                                   inc     (hl)
 548+ 7D10                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 548+ 7D10 AF          >                        xor     a
 548+ 7D11 32 AA 7C    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 549+ 7D14 C9                                   ret
 550+ 7D15 3A A8 7C     .EnterPressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)
 551+ 7D18 21 89 7C                             ld      hl,InputString
 552+ 7D1B ED 31                                add     hl,a
 553+ 7D1D                                      ZeroA
 553+ 7D1D AF          >                        xor a
 554+ 7D1E 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 555+ 7D1F                                      SetMemTrue EnterPressed
 555+ 7D1F AF          >                        xor     a
 555+ 7D20 32 A9 7C    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 556+ 7D23                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 556+ 7D23 AF          >                        xor     a
 556+ 7D24 32 AA 7C    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 557+ 7D27 CD AB 7B                             call    init_keyboard           ; Flush keyboard status so futher inputs don't auto read the enter key as a second press
 558+ 7D2A C9                                   ret
 559+ 7D2B 3A A8 7C     .SpacePressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)         ; Space = delete
 560+ 7D2E FE 00                                cp      0                       ; if input is zero length then can not delete
 561+ 7D30 C8                                   ret     z
 562+ 7D31 3D                                   dec     a                       ; move back one and update cursor pos
 563+ 7D32 32 A8 7C                             ld      (InputCursor),a         ;
 564+ 7D35 21 89 7C                             ld      hl,InputString          ; now update end of line to null
 565+ 7D38 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 566+ 7D3A                                      ZeroA                           ; .
 566+ 7D3A AF          >                        xor a
 567+ 7D3B 77                                   ld      (hl),a                  ; .
 568+ 7D3C                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 568+ 7D3C AF          >                        xor     a
 568+ 7D3D 32 AA 7C    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 569+ 7D40 C9                                   ret
 570+ 7D41
 571+ 7D41              TargetMissileTest:      AnyMissilesLeft
 571+ 7D41 3A 8B 7F    >                        ld      a,(NbrMissiles)
 571+ 7D44 A7          >                        and     a
 572+ 7D45                                      JumpIfZero      .ClearTargetting
 572+ 7D45 CA 5C 7D    >                        jp	z,.ClearTargetting
 573+ 7D48                                      IsMissileLaunchFlagged                      ; if we are comitted to launch
 573+ 7D48 3A 20 82    >                        ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 573+ 7D4B E6 80       >                        and     $80
 574+ 7D4D C8                                   ret             z                           ; then don't scan as it will be cleared on launch
 575+ 7D4E 3E 16        .ScanForKey:            ld              a,c_Pressed_TargetMissle    ; if not pressed we are done
 576+ 7D50 CD 12 7C                             call            is_key_pressed              ; .
 577+ 7D53 C0                                   ret             nz                          ; .
 578+ 7D54 3A 20 82     .TargetPressed:         ld              a,(MissileTargettingFlag)   ; get flag back
 579+ 7D57                                      JumpIfAEqNusng  StageMissileNotTargeting, .SetTargetting
 579+ 7D57 FE FF       >                        cp     StageMissileNotTargeting
 579+ 7D59 CA 62 7D    >                        jp      z,.SetTargetting
 580+ 7D5C              .ClearTargetting:       ClearMissileTargetting
 580+ 7D5C 3E FF       >                        ld      a,StageMissileNotTargeting
 580+ 7D5E 32 20 82    >                        ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 581+ 7D61 C9                                   ret
 582+ 7D62              .SetTargetting:         SetMissileTargetting
 582+ 7D62 3E FE       >                        ld      a,StageMissileTargeting
 582+ 7D64 32 20 82    >                        ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 583+ 7D67 C9                                   ret
 584+ 7D68
 585+ 7D68 AF           MovementKeyTest:        xor     a
 586+ 7D69 32 0C 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 587+ 7D6C 3A 2A 7F                             ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 588+ 7D6F E6 FC                                and     $FC
 589+ 7D71 20 26                                jr      nz,CursorKeys
 590+ 7D73 2A 3D 7B     ClimbDiveKeys:          ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)                 ; Check for Climb
 591+ 7D76 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 592+ 7D77                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanDiveKey
 592+ 7D77 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 592+ 7D78 CA 86 7D    >                        jp	    z, ScanDiveKey
 593+ 7D7B 3A 0C 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 594+ 7D7E F6 80                                or      CursorClimb
 595+ 7D80 32 0C 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 596+ 7D83 C3 BC 7D                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 597+ 7D86 2A 3B 7B     ScanDiveKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)                  ; Check for Dive
 598+ 7D89 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 599+ 7D8A                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 599+ 7D8A A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 599+ 7D8B CA BC 7D    >                        jp	    z, ScanLeftKey
 600+ 7D8E 3A 0C 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 601+ 7D91 F6 40                                or      CursorDive
 602+ 7D93 32 0C 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 603+ 7D96 C3 BC 7D                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 604+ 7D99 2A 79 7B     CursorKeys:             ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)              ; Check cursor keys
 605+ 7D9C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 606+ 7D9D                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanCursorDownKey
 606+ 7D9D A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 606+ 7D9E CA AC 7D    >                        jp	    z, ScanCursorDownKey
 607+ 7DA1 3A 0C 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 608+ 7DA4 F6 80                                or      CursorClimb
 609+ 7DA6 32 0C 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 610+ 7DA9 C3 BC 7D                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 611+ 7DAC 2A 7B 7B     ScanCursorDownKey:      ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 612+ 7DAF 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 613+ 7DB0                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 613+ 7DB0 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 613+ 7DB1 CA BC 7D    >                        jp	    z, ScanLeftKey
 614+ 7DB4 3A 0C 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 615+ 7DB7 F6 40                                or      CursorDive
 616+ 7DB9 32 0C 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 617+ 7DBC 2A 37 7B     ScanLeftKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 618+ 7DBF 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 619+ 7DC0                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRightKey
 619+ 7DC0 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 619+ 7DC1 CA CD 7D    >                        jp	    z, ScanRightKey
 620+ 7DC4 3A 0C 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 621+ 7DC7 F6 20                                or      CursorLeft
 622+ 7DC9 32 0C 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 623+ 7DCC C9                                   ret
 624+ 7DCD 2A 39 7B     ScanRightKey:           ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 625+ 7DD0 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 626+ 7DD1                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanHomeKey
 626+ 7DD1 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 626+ 7DD2 CA DE 7D    >                        jp	    z, ScanHomeKey
 627+ 7DD5 3A 0C 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 628+ 7DD8 F6 10                                or      CursorRight
 629+ 7DDA 32 0C 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 630+ 7DDD C9                                   ret
 631+ 7DDE 2A 57 7B     ScanHomeKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_HomeCursor)
 632+ 7DE1 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 633+ 7DE2                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRecentreKey
 633+ 7DE2 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 633+ 7DE3 CA EF 7D    >                        jp	    z, ScanRecentreKey
 634+ 7DE6 3A 0C 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 635+ 7DE9 F6 08                                or      CursorHome
 636+ 7DEB 32 0C 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 637+ 7DEE C9                                   ret
 638+ 7DEF 2A 73 7B     ScanRecentreKey:        ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Recentre)
 639+ 7DF2 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 640+ 7DF3                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 640+ 7DF3 A7          >                        and     a
 640+ 7DF4 C8          >                        ret     z

 642+ 7DF8 F6 04                                or      CursorRecenter
 643+ 7DFA 32 0C 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a

  12+ 7DFE              Bit3Only            equ %00001000

  14+ 7DFE              Bit1Only            equ %00000010
  15+ 7DFE              Bit0Only            equ %00000001

  93+ 83A5 21 1D 82     RechargeShip:           ld      hl,PlayerEnergy                                 ; if enery >= 128
  94+ 83A8 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  95+ 83A9 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                                             ; then we can recharge shields
  96+ 83AB 28 0D                                jr      z,.UpdatePlayerEnergy
  97+ 83AD 21 1B 82     .ShieldCharge:          ld      hl,ForeShield                                   ; charge front shield
  98+ 83B0 34                                   inc     (hl)
  99+ 83B1 20 01                                jr      nz,.DoneForeShield
 100+ 83B3 35           .ForeOverCharge:        dec     (hl)
 101+ 83B4 23           .DoneForeShield:        inc     hl                                              ; point to aft shield
 102+ 83B5 34                                   inc     (hl)
 103+ 83B6 20 01                                jr      nz,.DoneAftShield
 104+ 83B8 35                                   dec     (hl)                                            ; back to 255
 105+ 83B9 23           .DoneAftShield:         inc     hl                                              ; point to energy
 106+ 83BA 34           .UpdatePlayerEnergy:    inc     (hl)
 107+ 83BB 28 0A                                jr      z,.OverflowedEnergy
 108+ 83BD 3A AD 84                             ld      a,(ExtraEnergyUnit)
 109+ 83C0                                      ReturnIfANENusng EquipmentItemFitted                    ; if energy unit fitted an extra step
 109+ 83C0 FE FF       >                        cp      EquipmentItemFitted
 109+ 83C2 C0          >                        ret     nz
 110+ 83C3 34           .EnergyUnitFitted:      inc     (hl)
 111+ 83C4 28 01                                jr      z,.OverflowedEnergy
 112+ 83C6 C9                                   ret
 113+ 83C7 35           .OverflowedEnergy:      dec     (hl)                                            ;  restore to 255
 114+ 83C8 C9                                   ret
 115+ 83C9 21 1D 82     .SkipShieldCharge:      ld      hl,PlayerEnergy
 116+ 83CC 18 EC                                jr      .UpdatePlayerEnergy
 117+ 83CE
 118+ 83CE              ; sets carry to true if target
 119+ 83CE 3A 20 82     IsMissileLockedOn:      ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 120+ 83D1 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 121+ 83D3 28 07                                jr      z, .TargetSelected
 122+ 83D5 E6 70                                and     $70                         ; are all upper bits set (we can ignore bit 7)
 123+ 83D7 CA DC 83                             jp      z, .TargetSelected           ; if its only bit 7 then we have a lock
 124+ 83DA                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; if bitsd 6 to 4 were set then it must be unlocked status
 124+ 83DA B7          >                        or a
 125+ 83DB C9                                   ret
 126+ 83DC              .TargetSelected:        JumpIfSlotAEmpty .TargetInvalid     ; does slot A have an target
 126+ 83DC 21 F1 7F    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 126+ 83DF ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 126+ 83E1 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 126+ 83E2 3C          >                        inc     a
 126+ 83E3 CA E9 83    >                        jp      z,.TargetInvalid    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 126+ 83E6 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 127+ 83E7                                      SetCarryFlag
 127+ 83E7 37          >                        scf
 128+ 83E8 C9                                   ret
 129+ 83E9 3E FF        .TargetInvalid:         ld      a, StageMissileNotTargeting     ; housekeep missile status if target gone
 130+ 83EB 32 20 82                             ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 131+ 83EE C9                                   ret

 576  84C1                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 84C1              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 84C1              doRND2:
   3+ 84C1 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 84C2              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 84C2              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ 84C2              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ 84C2              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ 84C2 3A 0E 7E                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ 84C5 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ 84C7 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ 84C8 21 10 7E     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ 84CB 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ 84CC 32 0E 7E     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ 84CF 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ 84D0 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ 84D1 32 10 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ 84D4 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ 84D5 3A 0F 7E                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ 84D8 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ 84D9 21 11 7E     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ 84DC 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ 84DD 32 0F 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ 84E0 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ 84E1 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ 84E2 32 11 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ 84E5 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ 84E6                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ 84E6 C9                                   ret
  29+ 84E7
  30+ 84E7 21 0E 7E     saveRandomSeeds:        ld      hl,RandomSeed
  31+ 84EA 11 12 7E                             ld      de,RandomSeedSave
  32+ 84ED 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  33+ 84F0 ED A0                                ldi
  34+ 84F2 ED A0                                ldi
  35+ 84F4 ED A0                                ldi
  36+ 84F6 ED A0                                ldi
  37+ 84F8 C9                                   ret
  38+ 84F9
  39+ 84F9 21 12 7E     restoreRandomSeeds:     ld      hl,RandomSeedSave
  40+ 84FC 11 0E 7E                             ld      de,RandomSeed
  41+ 84FF 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  42+ 8502 ED A0                                ldi
  43+ 8504 ED A0                                ldi
  44+ 8506 ED A0                                ldi
  45+ 8508 ED A0                                ldi
  46+ 850A C9                                   ret

# file opened: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm
   1+ 850B 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 850F 58 59 53 45
   1+ 8513 45 44
   2+ 8515 21 22 80     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 8518 11 07 7F                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 851B ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 851D ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 851F ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 8521 ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 8523 ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 8525 ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 8527 C9                                   ret
  11+ 8528
  12+ 8528 21 07 7F     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 852B 11 22 80                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 852E 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 8530
  16+ 8530 21 22 80     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 8533 11 16 80                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 8536 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 8538
  20+ 8538 21 16 80     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 853B 11 22 80                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 853E 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 8540
  24+ 8540 21 16 80     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 8543 11 07 7F                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 8546 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 8548
  28+ 8548 21 07 7F     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 854B 11 16 80                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 854E 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 8550
  32+ 8550              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 8550 CD 53 85     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 8553              .NextStep:
  35+ 8553 CD 56 85     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 8556              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 8556 3A 07 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 8559 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 855A 21 09 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 855D 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 855E 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 855F 3A 08 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 8562 21 0A 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 8565 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 8566 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 8567 3A 09 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 856A 32 07 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 856D 3A 0A 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 8570 32 08 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 8573 3A 0C 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 8576 32 0A 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 8579 3A 0B 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 857C 32 09 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 857F B7           		or		a
  55+ 8580 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 8581 21 09 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 8584 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 8585 32 0B 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 8588 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 8589 21 0A 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 858C 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 858D 32 0C 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 8590 C9           		ret
  64+ 8591
  65+ 8591              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 8591 CD 94 85     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 8594              .NextStep:
  68+ 8594 CD 97 85     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 8597              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 8597              ; x = a + c
  71+ 8597 3A 16 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 859A B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 859B 21 18 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 859E 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 859F 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 85A0              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 85A0 3A 17 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 85A3 21 19 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 85A6 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 85A7 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 85A8 3A 18 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 85AB 32 16 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 85AE 3A 19 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 85B1 32 17 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 85B4 3A 1B 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 85B7 32 19 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 85BA 3A 1A 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 85BD 32 18 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 85C0 B7           		or		a
  90+ 85C1 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 85C2 21 18 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 85C5 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 85C6 32 1A 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 85C9 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 85CA 21 19 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 85CD 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 85CE 32 1B 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 85D1 C9           		ret
  99+ 85D2
 100+ 85D2 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 85D3 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 85D4 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 85D5
 104+ 85D5 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 85D6 32 22 7F                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 85D9 3A 08 7F     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 85DC 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 85DD 3A 29 80     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 85E0 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 85E1 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 85E2 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 85E3 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 85E5 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 85E7 ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 85E9 32 D4 85     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 85EC ED 5B D2 85                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 85F0 BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 85F1 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 85F3 3A 0A 7F     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 85F6 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 85F7 3A 28 80                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 85FA 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 85FB 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 85FC 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 85FD CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 85FF 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 8601 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 8603 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 8604 BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 8605 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 8607 3A D4 85     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 860A 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 860B ED 43 D2 85                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 860F C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 8610 CD 48 85                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 8613 C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 8614 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 8615 B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 8616 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 8617 CD 50 85     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 861A 3A 22 7F                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 861D 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 861E FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 8620 C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 8621 32 22 7F                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 8624 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 8626
 148+ 8626              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 8626 3A 17 80     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 8629 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 862B 32 AA 7F     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 862E 3A 18 80     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 8631 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 8633 CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 8635 CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 8637 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 8639 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 863B 32 AB 7F     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 863E CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 8640 FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 8642 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 8644              .Fedual:
 163+ 8644 3A AA 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 8647 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 8649 32 AA 7F     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 864C              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 864C 3A AA 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 864F EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 8651 32 AC 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 8654 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 8655 3A 19 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 8658 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 865A 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 865B 32 AC 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 865E 3A AB 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 8661 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 8663 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 8664 3A AC 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 8667 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 8668 32 AC 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 866B CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 866D CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 866F 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 8670 3A AA 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 8673 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 8674 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 8675 3A AB 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 8678 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 8679 32 AD 7F     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 867C 3A AA 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 867F EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 8681 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 8683 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 8684 3A AB 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 8687 C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 8689 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 868A ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 868C 3A AD 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 868F 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 8690 ED 30        		mul
 201+ 8692 CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 8694 CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 8696 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 8698 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 869A CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 869C CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 869E ED 53 AF 7F  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 86A2              .DoRadius:
 209+ 86A2 3A 19 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 86A5 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 86A6 3A 1B 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 86A9 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 86AB C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 86AD 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 86AE ED 43 B3 7F  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 86B2 C9           		ret
 217+ 86B3
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  38+ 87F9              getTableText:
  39+ 87F9              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ 87F9              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ 87F9 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ 87FA ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ 87FC ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ 87FE 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ 87FF 23           	inc		hl
  46+ 8800 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ 8801 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ 8802 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ 8803 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ 8804
  51+ 8804
  52+ 8804              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ 8804              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ 8804              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ 8804              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ 8804              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ 8804              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ 8804              getRankIndex:
  59+ 8804              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ 8804              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ 8804 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ 8805 B3           	or		e
  63+ 8806 FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ 8808 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ 8809 AF           	xor 	a
  66+ 880A 21 58 87     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ 880D              .testLoop:
  68+ 880D 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ 880E 23           	inc		hl
  70+ 880F 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ 8810 E5           	push	hl
  72+ 8811 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ 8812 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ 8813 CD 27 96     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ 8816 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ 8818              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ 8818 E1           	pop		hl
  78+ 8819 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ 881A 23           	inc		hl
  80+ 881B 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ 881C 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ 881E              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ 881E E1           	pop		hl
  84+ 881F C9           	ret

 232+ 8E73
 233+ 8E73              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 234+ 8E73              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 235+ 8E73
 236+ 8E73              CapitaliseString:
 237+ 8E73              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 238+ 8E73              .CapLoop:
 239+ 8E73 23           	inc		hl
 240+ 8E74 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 241+ 8E75 FE 00        	cp		0
 242+ 8E77 C8           	ret		z
 243+ 8E78 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 244+ 8E7A 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 245+ 8E7C FE 41        	cp		'A'
 246+ 8E7E 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 247+ 8E80              .LowerCase:
 248+ 8E80 C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 249+ 8E82 77           	ld		(hl),a
 250+ 8E83 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop

 252+ 8E85 21 6C 8D     ShipIndexToAddress      ld      hl,WordIdxShipNames
 253+ 8E88 C3 8E 8E                             jp      WordLookup
 254+ 8E8B
 255+ 8E8B 21 9E 8C     WordIndexToAddress:     ld		hl,WordIdx
 256+ 8E8E ED 31        WordLookup:             add		hl,a
 257+ 8E90 ED 31                                add		hl,a
 258+ 8E92 D5                                   push	de
 259+ 8E93 5E                                   ld		e,(hl)
 260+ 8E94 23                                   inc		hl
 261+ 8E95 56                                   ld		d,(hl)
 262+ 8E96 EB                                   ex		de,hl
 263+ 8E97 D1                                   pop		de
 264+ 8E98 C9                                   ret

 268+ 8E99              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"

 270+ 8E9C CD F9 87     	call	getTableText
 271+ 8E9F 11 52 8E     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 272+ 8EA2              .ReadLoop:
 273+ 8EA2 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 274+ 8EA3 FE 00        	cp		0
 275+ 8EA5 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone

 277+ 8EA8 D5           	push	de
 278+ 8EA9 21 9E 8C     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 279+ 8EAC CD F9 87     	call	getTableText

 281+ 8EB0              .WordExpandLoop:
 282+ 8EB0 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 283+ 8EB1 FE 00        	cp		0
 284+ 8EB3 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 285+ 8EB5              ;.GetChar:

 287+ 8EB6 13           	inc		de
 288+ 8EB7 23           	inc		hl
 289+ 8EB8 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 290+ 8EBA              .AddSpace:
 291+ 8EBA 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 292+ 8EBC 12           	ld		(de),a
 293+ 8EBD 13           	inc		de
 294+ 8EBE E1           	pop		hl
 295+ 8EBF 23           	inc		hl
 296+ 8EC0 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 297+ 8EC2              .ReadDone:
 298+ 8EC2 1B           	dec		de
 299+ 8EC3 AF           	xor		a
 300+ 8EC4 12           	ld		(de),a
 301+ 8EC5 C9           	ret

 194+ 8F60              ;CA                      DEX

 199+ 8F60              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ 8F60              ;CA                      DEX

 202+ 8F60              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ 8F60              ;60                      RTS
 204+ 8F60              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens

 206+ 8F60              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96

 215+ 8F60              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ 8F60              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ 8F60              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ 8F60              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ 8F60              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ 8F60              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ 8F60              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ 8F60              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ 8F60              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ 8F60              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ 8F60              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ 8F60              ;
 227+ 8F60              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ 8F60              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ 8F60              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ 8F60              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ 8F60              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ 8F60              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ 8F60              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ 8F60              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ 8F60              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ 8F60              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ 8F60              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ 8F60              ;
 239+ 8F60              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ 8F60              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ 8F60              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ 8F60              ;
 243+ 8F60              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ 8F60              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ 8F60              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ 8F60              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ 8F60              ;
 248+ 8F60              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ 8F60              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ 8F60              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ 8F60              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ 8F60              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ 8F60              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ 8F60              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ 8F60              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ 8F60              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ 8F60              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ 8F60              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ 8F60              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ 8F60              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ 8F60              ;
 262+ 8F60              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ 8F60              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ 8F60              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ 8F60              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ 8F60              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ 8F60              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ 8F60              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ 8F60              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ 8F60              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ 8F60              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ 8F60              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ 8F60              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ 8F60              ;
 275+ 8F60              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ 8F60              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ 8F60              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ 8F60              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ 8F60              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ 8F60              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ 8F60              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ 8F60              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ 8F60              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ 8F60              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ 8F60              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ 8F60              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ 8F60              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ 8F60              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 289+ 8F60              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 290+ 8F60              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ 8F60              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256

 293+ 8F60              ;	.TT49	\ word ended

 295+ 8F60              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ 8F60              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ 8F60              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ 8F60              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ 8F60              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ 8F60              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 301+ 8F60              ;98                      TYA
 302+ 8F60              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 303+ 8F60              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 304+ 8F60              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi

 307+ 8F60              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth

 309+ 8F60              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
