   1+ 8F60              ;; calcs BHB + CDE where B and C are signs and may be 24 bit
   2+ 8F60              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3+ 8F60              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4+ 8F60
   5+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLSAHLEquBHLaddCDE:        ld      a,b
   6+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        xor     c
   7+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        and     SignOnly8Bit
   8+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        JumpIfNegative   .OppositeSigns
   9+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS.SameSigns:             ld      ixh,b                      ; ixh = b
  10+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ClearSignBit b                     ; b = ABS b
  11+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        add     hl,de                      ; hl = hl + de
  12+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      a,b                        ; a = b + c + carry
  13+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        adc     c                          ;
  14+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      b,a                        ;
  15+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      a,ixh                      ;
  16+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        SignBitOnlyA                       ;
  17+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        or      b                          ;
  18+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ret                                ;
  19+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS.OppositeSigns:         ld      ixh,b                      ; save signed into ixh and ixl
  20+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      ixl,c                      ; .
  21+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ClearSignBit c                     ; c = ABS C
  22+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      a,b                        ; a = abs b
  23+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ClearSignBitA                      ; .
  24+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        sbc     c                          ; a = a - c
  25+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        JumpIfNegative  .OppositeCDEgtBHL  ; if c is positive
  26+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        push    hl
  27+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        sbc     hl,de                      ; then subtract de from hl
  28+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        JumpIfNegative  .HLDEWasNegative   ; if sub was positive
  29+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        pop     de                         ; at this stage the stack is just junk
  30+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      b,a                        ; then copy results to AHL
  31+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      a,ixh                      ; by just handling sign
  32+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        SignBitOnlyA                       ; .
  33+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        or      b                          ; .
  34+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ret                                ; .
  35+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS.OppositeCDEgtBHL:      ex      de,hl                      ; save hl
  36+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      c,ixh                      ; swap signs over
  37+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      b,ixl                      ;
  38+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        jp      .OppositeSigns             ; and do calc again
  39+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS.HLDEWasNegative:       pop     hl                         ; get back hl swap values and try again
  40+ 8F60              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        jp      .OppositeCDEgtBHL
  41+ 8F60              ; example
  42+ 8F60              ; bhl - 00 00 06 CDE - 80 00 0B so equates to 000006 + (-00000B) or -000005 or 800005
  43+ 8F60
  44+ 8F60 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
  45+ 8F61 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  46+ 8F63 A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  47+ 8F64                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  47+ 8F64 FA 72 8F    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
  48+ 8F67 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
  49+ 8F68 B1                                   or      c
  50+ 8F69                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg    ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  50+ 8F69 FA 6E 8F    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  51+ 8F6C 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  52+ 8F6D C9                                   ret
  53+ 8F6E 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  54+ 8F6F 78                                   ld      a,b
  55+ 8F70 B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  56+ 8F71 C9                                   ret
  57+ 8F72              ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       ClearCarryFlag
  57+ 8F72 B7          >                        or a
  58+ 8F73 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  59+ 8F75 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  60+ 8F77 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry:ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  61+ 8F78 C9                                   ret
  62+ 8F79              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                               ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  62+ 8F79 AF          >                    xor a
  62+ 8F7A 95          >                    sub l
  62+ 8F7B 6F          >                    ld l,a
  62+ 8F7C 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  62+ 8F7D 94          >                    sub h
  62+ 8F7E 67          >                    ld h,a
  63+ 8F7F 78                                   ld      a,b
  64+ 8F80 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  65+ 8F82 C9                                   ret
  66+ 8F83
  67+ 8F83 7C           ADDHLDESignedV4:        ld      a,h
  68+ 8F84 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  69+ 8F86 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  70+ 8F87 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  71+ 8F88                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN       ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  71+ 8F88 FA A0 8F    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  72+ 8F8B 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
  73+ 8F8C B2                                   or      d
  74+ 8F8D                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg      ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  74+ 8F8D FA 92 8F    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  75+ 8F90 19                                   add     hl,de
  76+ 8F91 C9                                   ret
  77+ 8F92 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  78+ 8F93 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  79+ 8F95 67                                   ld      h,a
  80+ 8F96 7A                                   ld      a,d
  81+ 8F97 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  82+ 8F99 57                                   ld      d,a
  83+ 8F9A 19                                   add     hl,de
  84+ 8F9B 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  85+ 8F9D B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  86+ 8F9E 67                                   ld      h,a
  87+ 8F9F C9                                   ret
  88+ 8FA0 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  89+ 8FA1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  90+ 8FA3 67                                   ld      h,a
  91+ 8FA4 7A                                   ld      a,d
  92+ 8FA5 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  93+ 8FA7 57                                   ld      d,a
  94+ 8FA8                                      ClearCarryFlag
  94+ 8FA8 B7          >                        or a
  95+ 8FA9 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  96+ 8FAB 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  97+ 8FAD 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  98+ 8FAE B4                                   or      h
  99+ 8FAF 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 100+ 8FB0 C9                                   ret
 101+ 8FB1              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 101+ 8FB1 AF          >                    xor a
 101+ 8FB2 95          >                    sub l
 101+ 8FB3 6F          >                    ld l,a
 101+ 8FB4 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 101+ 8FB5 94          >                    sub h
 101+ 8FB6 67          >                    ld h,a
 102+ 8FB7 78                                   ld      a,b
 103+ 8FB8 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 104+ 8FBA B4                                   or      h
 105+ 8FBB 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 106+ 8FBC C9                                   ret

 108+ 8FBD              ;;;NOT USED addhldesigned:          bit     7,h

 110+ 8FBD              ;;;NOT USED                         call    negate16hl
 111+ 8FBD              ;;;NOT USED .noneghl:               bit     7,d
 112+ 8FBD              ;;;NOT USED                         jr      nz,.nonegde
 113+ 8FBD              ;;;NOT USED                         call    negate16de
 114+ 8FBD              ;;;NOT USED .nonegde:               add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add

 116+ 8FBD              ;;;NOT USED                         bit     7,h
 117+ 8FBD              ;;;NOT USED                         ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early
 118+ 8FBD              ;;;NOT USED                         call    negate16hl
 119+ 8FBD              ;;;NOT USED                         ld      a,$FF
 120+ 8FBD              ;;;NOT USED                         ret

 123+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? ; HL(2sc) = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
 124+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? ; 06 06 2022 not used
 125+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? HL2cEquHLSgnPlusAusgn:  ld      d,0
 126+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ld      e,a                         ; set up DE = A
 127+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ld      a,h
 128+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         and     SignMask8Bit
 129+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         jr      z,.HLPositive               ; if HL is negative then do HL - A
 130+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .HLNegative:            ld      h,a                         ; hl = ABS (HL)
 131+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         NegHL                               ; hl = - hl
 132+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .HLPositive:            ClearCarryFlag                      ; now do adc hl,de
 133+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         adc     hl,de                       ; aftert his hl will be 2's c
 134+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ret
 135+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? ; 06 06 2022 not used
 136+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? HLEquHLSgnPlusAusgn:    ld      e,a
 137+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ld      a,h
 138+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         and     SignMask8Bit
 139+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         jr      nz,.HLNegative              ; if HL is negative then do HL - A
 140+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .HLPositive:            ld      a,e                         ; else its HL + A
 141+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         add     hl,a
 142+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ret
 143+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .HLNegative:            ClearSignBit    h                   ; Clear sign of HL
 144+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         NegHL                               ; and convert to 2's C
 145+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ld      d,0
 146+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ClearCarryFlag
 147+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         sbc     hl,de                       ; now add a to -ve HL , add does not do 2's c
 148+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         jp      m,.FlipResult               ; if it was negative then its really positive
 149+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         SetSignBit      h
 150+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ret
 151+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .FlipResult:            NegHL                               ; so if -hl + A => HL - A => HL - DE is negative then the actual result is +ve
 152+ 8FBD              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ret

 155+ 8FBD              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 156+ 8FBD              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
 157+ 8FBD 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
 158+ 8FBE 5C                                   ld      e,h
 159+ 8FBF 7C                                   ld      a,h
 160+ 8FC0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 8FC2 67                                   ld      h,a
 162+ 8FC3 7A                                   ld      a,d
 163+ 8FC4 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 164+ 8FC6 7B                                   ld      a,e
 165+ 8FC7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 166+ 8FC9 B4                                   or      h
 167+ 8FCA C9                                   ret
 168+ 8FCB              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 169+ 8FCB              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
 170+ 8FCB 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
 171+ 8FCC 4F                                   ld      c,a
 172+ 8FCD 78                                   ld      a,b
 173+ 8FCE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 174+ 8FD0 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
 175+ 8FD2 EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
 176+ 8FD3 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
 177+ 8FD5 69                                   ld      l,c
 178+ 8FD6                                      ClearCarryFlag
 178+ 8FD6 B7          >                        or a
 179+ 8FD7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
 180+ 8FD9 C9                                   ret
 181+ 8FDA 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
 182+ 8FDB ED 31                                add hl,a
 183+ 8FDD C9                                   ret
 184+ 8FDE              ;tested mathstestsun2
 185+ 8FDE              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
 186+ 8FDE 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
 187+ 8FDF AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
 188+ 8FE0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 189+ 8FE2 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
 190+ 8FE4 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
 191+ 8FE5 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
 192+ 8FE7 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
 193+ 8FE9 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 194+ 8FEA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 195+ 8FEC 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 196+ 8FED 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 197+ 8FEE E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 198+ 8FF0 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 199+ 8FF1 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
 200+ 8FF2 85                                   add     l                   ; .
 201+ 8FF3 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 202+ 8FF4 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
 203+ 8FF5 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
 204+ 8FF6 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 205+ 8FF7 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
 206+ 8FF8 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
 207+ 8FF9 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
 208+ 8FFB 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 209+ 8FFC C9                                   ret                         ; done
 210+ 8FFD 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 211+ 8FFE FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
 212+ 9000 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 213+ 9002 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 214+ 9003 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 215+ 9004 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
 216+ 9006 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 217+ 9008 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 218+ 9009 E5                                   push    hl                  ; save hl
 219+ 900A 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; hl = bc - de, if bc < de then there is a carry
 220+ 900C ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
 221+ 900E E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
 222+ 900F 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
 223+ 9011 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
 224+ 9013 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
 225+ 9014                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
 225+ 9014 BD          >                        cp      l
 225+ 9015 DA 1F 90    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
 226+ 9018 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
 227+ 901A              ; The same so its just zero
 228+ 901A AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
 229+ 901B 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
 230+ 901C 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
 231+ 901D 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
 232+ 901E C9                                   ret                        ; .
 233+ 901F              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
 234+ 901F 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
 235+ 9020 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
 236+ 9021 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
 237+ 9022 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
 238+ 9023 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
 239+ 9024 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
 240+ 9025 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
 241+ 9026 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
 242+ 9027 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
 243+ 9028 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
 244+ 902A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 245+ 902C B2                                   or      d                  ;
 246+ 902D 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 247+ 902E C9                                   ret
 248+ 902F 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
 249+ 9030 95                                   sub     l                  ;
 250+ 9031 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
 251+ 9032 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
 252+ 9033 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
 253+ 9034 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
 254+ 9035 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
 255+ 9036 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 256+ 9037 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 257+ 9038 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 258+ 903A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 259+ 903C B2                                   or      d                  ;
 260+ 903D 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 261+ 903E C9                                   ret
 262+ 903F
 263+ 903F              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 264+ 903F              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 265+ 903F 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 266+ 9040 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 267+ 9041 A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 268+ 9042 CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 269+ 9044 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 270+ 9046 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 271+ 9047 C9                                   ret                             ; return
 272+ 9048 ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 273+ 904A D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 274+ 904B 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 275+ 904C EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 276+ 904D A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 277+ 904E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 278+ 9050 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 279+ 9051 C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 280+ 9052
 281+ 9052
 282+ 9052              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 283+ 9052              ; a = value to add
 284+ 9052              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 285+ 9052              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 286+ 9052              ; NOT USED addINWKbasigned:
 287+ 9052              ; NOT USED 		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 288+ 9052              ; NOT USED 		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 289+ 9052              ; NOT USED 		ld		a,b
 290+ 9052              ; NOT USED 		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 291+ 9052              ; NOT USED         ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 292+ 9052              ; NOT USED         and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 293+ 9052              ; NOT USED         ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 294+ 9052              ; NOT USED         ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 295+ 9052              ; NOT USED         and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 296+ 9052              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 297+ 9052              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 298+ 9052              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 299+ 9052              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 300+ 9052              ; NOTUSEDaddhlcsigned:
 301+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 302+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 303+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      d,(hl)
 304+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 305+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 306+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 307+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 308+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 309+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        jr      z,.postivecalc
 310+ 9052              ; NOTUSED.negativecalc:
 311+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,h
 312+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        and     SignMask8Bit
 313+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 314+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 315+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 316+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        sbc     hl,bc
 317+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 318+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 319+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 320+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        and     SignMask8Bit
 321+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 322+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 323+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 324+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a
 325+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 326+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 327+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 328+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 329+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 330+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 331+ 9052              ; NOTUSED.nocarry:
 332+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        NegHL                               ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 333+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        or      b                           ; b is still varT
 334+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 335+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e
 336+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 337+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 338+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 339+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 340+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 341+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ret
 342+ 9052              ; NOTUSED.postivecalc:
 343+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      ixl,b
 344+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,0
 345+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        add     hl,de
 346+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl
 347+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 348+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 349+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 350+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 351+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 352+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e
 353+ 9052              ; NOTUSED        ret
 354+ 9052
 355+ 9052              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 356+ 9052              ;MVT1
 357+ 9052              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 358+ 9052              ;    A = sign bit => T
 359+ 9052              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 360+ 9052              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 361+ 9052              ;
 362+ 9052              ;        and h, 7F
 363+ 9052              ;        b = 0
 364+ 9052              ;        c = varS
 365+ 9052              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 366+ 9052              ;        retain carry
 367+ 9052              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 368+ 9052              ;        and 7F
 369+ 9052              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 370+ 9052              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 371+ 9052              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 372+ 9052              ;
 373+ 9052              ;    else
 374+ 9052              ;MV10.
 375+ 9052              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 376+ 9052              ;        or      sign bit
 377+ 9052
 378+ 9052
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_add.asm
 584  9052                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_subtract.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_subtract.asm
   1+ 9052              ;...subtract routines
   2+ 9052              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
   3+ 9052 7C           subHLDES15:             ld      a,h
   4+ 9053 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   5+ 9055 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
   6+ 9056 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
   7+ 9057                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
   7+ 9057 FA 85 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
   8+ 905A 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
   9+ 905B B2                                   or      d
  10+ 905C                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  10+ 905C FA 66 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
  11+ 905F                                      ClearCarryFlag
  11+ 905F B7          >                        or a
  12+ 9060 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  13+ 9062                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  13+ 9062 FA 79 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  14+ 9065 C9                                   ret
  15+ 9066 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  16+ 9067 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  17+ 9069 67                                   ld      h,a
  18+ 906A 7A                                   ld      a,d
  19+ 906B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  20+ 906D 57                                   ld      d,a
  21+ 906E                                      ClearCarryFlag
  21+ 906E B7          >                        or a
  22+ 906F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  23+ 9071                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  23+ 9071 FA 79 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  24+ 9074 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  25+ 9075 F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
  26+ 9077 67                                   ld      h,a
  27+ 9078 C9                                   ret
  28+ 9079              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
  28+ 9079 AF          >                    xor a
  28+ 907A 95          >                    sub l
  28+ 907B 6F          >                    ld l,a
  28+ 907C 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  28+ 907D 94          >                    sub h
  28+ 907E 67          >                    ld h,a
  29+ 907F 78                                   ld      a,b
  30+ 9080 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  31+ 9082 B4                                   or      h
  32+ 9083 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  33+ 9084 C9                                   ret
  34+ 9085 B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
  35+ 9086 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  36+ 9087 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  37+ 9089 67                                   ld      h,a
  38+ 908A 7A                                   ld      a,d
  39+ 908B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  40+ 908D 57                                   ld      d,a
  41+ 908E 19                                   add     hl,de
  42+ 908F 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  43+ 9090 B4                                   or      h
  44+ 9091 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  45+ 9092 C9                                   ret
  46+ 9093
  47+ 9093
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_subtract.asm

   1+ 9093              ; Note its big endian
   2+ 9093 2A 87 84     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ 9096 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ 9097 22 87 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ 909A 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ 909D 2A 89 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ 90A0 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ 90A2 22 89 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ 90A5 C9                                   ret
  10+ 90A6
  11+ 90A6 2A 87 84     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ 90A9 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ 90AA B5                                   or      l
  14+ 90AB 2A 89 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ 90AE B4                                   or      h
  16+ 90AF B5                                   or      l
  17+ 90B0 C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ 90B1 B7                                   or      a
  19+ 90B2 2A 87 84                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ 90B5 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ 90B7 22 87 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ 90BA 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ 90BD 2A 89 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ 90C0 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ 90C2 22 89 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ 90C5                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ 90C5 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ 90C7 C2 CB 90    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ 90CA C9                                   ret
  28+ 90CB 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ 90CE 22 87 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ 90D1 22 89 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ 90D4 C9                                   ret

 586  90D5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ 90D5              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ 90D5              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ 90D5 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ 90D6 E5                                   push hl
   5+ 90D7 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ 90D9 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ 90DB E5                                   push hl
   8+ 90DC AF                                   xor a
   9+ 90DD 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ 90DE 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ 90DF DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ 90E1 CB 10                                rl b
  13+ 90E3 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ 90E5 17                                   rla
  15+ 90E6 B9                                   cp c
  16+ 90E7 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ 90E9 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ 90EB ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ 90ED 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ 90EE 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ 90F0 ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ 90F2 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ 90F3 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ 90F5 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ 90F6 2D                                   dec l
  26+ 90F7 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ 90F8 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ 90FA D1                                   pop de
  29+ 90FB 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ 90FC DD E5                                push ix
  31+ 90FE D1                                   pop de
  32+ 90FF C9                                   ret
  33+ 9100
  34+ 9100 FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ 9102 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ 9104 CD D5 90                             call    Div24by24
  37+ 9107 F5                                   push    af
  38+ 9108 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ 910A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ 910C B1                                   or      c
  41+ 910D 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ 910E F1                                   pop     af
  43+ 910F C9                                   ret
  44+ 9110
  45+ 9110                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ 9110 FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ 9112 A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ 9113 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ 9115 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ 9117 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ 9118 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ 911A 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ 911B FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ 911D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ 911F CD D5 90                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ 9122 FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ 9124 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ 9126 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ 9127 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ 9129 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ 912A FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ 912C C9                                   ret
  63+ 912D
  64+ 912D              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ 912D              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ 912D              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ 912D              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ 912D 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ 912E 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ 9130 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ 9132 3A 1D 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ 9135 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ 9136 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ 9139 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ 913A 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ 913C CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ 913E 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ 913F ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ 9141 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ 9143 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ 9145 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ 9146 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ 9147 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ 9149 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ 914A 32 1E 7F                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ 914D C9                                   ret

   1+ 914E              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ 914E 2A 1E 7F                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ 9151 3A 1D 7F                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ 9154 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ 9156 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ 9159 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ 915A                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ 915A CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ 915C CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ 915E CB 20                                sla b
   9+ 9160 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ 9162 EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ 9163 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ 9164 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ 9165              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ 9165 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ 9167 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ 9169 CB 20                                sla b
  15+ 916B 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ 916D 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ 916F EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ 9170 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ 9172 C9                                   ret
  20+ 9173
  21+ 9173
  22+ 9173              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ 9173 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ 9173 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ 9173 ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ 9173 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ 9173 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ 9173 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ 9173 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ 9173 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ 9173 ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ 9173 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ 9173 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ 9173 ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ 9173 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ 9173 ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ 9173 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ 9173 ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ 9173                                      ENDM

  44+ 9173              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned

  44+ 917D E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ 917F 57          >                        ld      d,a

  53+ 9195 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  53+ 9196 3A 1D 7F    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  53+ 9199 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  53+ 919A AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  53+ 919B E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  53+ 919D 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  53+ 919E 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  53+ 919F E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  53+ 91A1 57          >                        ld      d,a
  53+ 91A2 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  53+ 91A3 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  53+ 91A5 5F          >                        ld      e,a

  56+ 91B1 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  57+ 91B2                                      ClearCarryFlag
  57+ 91B2 B7          >                        or a
  58+ 91B3 C9                                   ret
  59+ 91B4
  60+ 91B4 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  61+ 91B5 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  62+ 91B7 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  63+ 91B8 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  64+ 91B9                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  64+ 91B9 FA D1 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  65+ 91BC 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  66+ 91BD B2                                   or      d
  67+ 91BE                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  67+ 91BE FA C3 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  68+ 91C1 19                                   add     hl,de
  69+ 91C2 C9                                   ret
  70+ 91C3 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  71+ 91C4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  72+ 91C6 67                                   ld      h,a
  73+ 91C7 7A                                   ld      a,d
  74+ 91C8 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  75+ 91CA 57                                   ld      d,a
  76+ 91CB 19                                   add     hl,de
  77+ 91CC 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  78+ 91CE B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  79+ 91CF 67                                   ld      h,a
  80+ 91D0 C9                                   ret
  81+ 91D1 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  82+ 91D2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  83+ 91D4 67                                   ld      h,a
  84+ 91D5 7A                                   ld      a,d
  85+ 91D6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  86+ 91D8 57                                   ld      d,a
  87+ 91D9 B7                                   or      a
  88+ 91DA ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  89+ 91DC 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  90+ 91DE 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  91+ 91DF B4                                   or      h
  92+ 91E0 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  93+ 91E1 C9                                   ret
  94+ 91E2              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  94+ 91E2 AF          >                    xor a
  94+ 91E3 95          >                    sub l
  94+ 91E4 6F          >                    ld l,a
  94+ 91E5 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  94+ 91E6 94          >                    sub h
  94+ 91E7 67          >                    ld h,a
  95+ 91E8 78                                   ld      a,b
  96+ 91E9 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  97+ 91EB B4                                   or      h
  98+ 91EC 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  99+ 91ED C9                                   ret
 100+ 91EE
 101+ 91EE
 102+ 91EE                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
 103+ 91EE                  ;
 104+ 91EE                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
 105+ 91EE                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 106+ 91EE                  ;
 107+ 91EE                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 108+ 91EE                  ;         carry reset
 109+ 91EE                  ;
 110+ 91EE                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 111+ 91EE 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 112+ 91EF 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 113+ 91F0 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 114+ 91F2 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ 91F3 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 116+ 91F5
 117+ 91F5 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 118+ 91F6 85                                   add a,l
 119+ 91F7 57                                   ld  d,a
 120+ 91F8 EB                                   ex de,hl
 121+ 91F9
 122+ 91F9 7A                                   ld  a,d
 123+ 91FA CE 00                                adc a,0
 124+ 91FC C9                                   ret
 125+ 91FD
 126+ 91FD 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 127+ 91FE 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 128+ 91FF ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 129+ 9201 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 130+ 9202 C9                                   ret
 131+ 9203
 132+ 9203                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 133+ 9203                 ;
 134+ 9203                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 135+ 9203                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 136+ 9203                 ;
 137+ 9203                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 138+ 9203                 ;         carry reset
 139+ 9203                 ;
 140+ 9203                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 141+ 9203
 142+ 9203
 143+ 9203
 144+ 9203 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 145+ 9204 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 146+ 9205 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 147+ 9206 6A                                   ld l,d
 148+ 9207 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 149+ 9208 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 150+ 9209              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 151+ 9209 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 152+ 920B EB                                   ex de,hl
 153+ 920C ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 154+ 920E
 155+ 920E AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 156+ 920F 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 157+ 9210 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 158+ 9211
 159+ 9211 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 160+ 9212 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 161+ 9213 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 162+ 9215
 163+ 9215 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 164+ 9216 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 165+ 9217
 166+ 9217 7A                                   ld a,d
 167+ 9218 85                                   add a,l
 168+ 9219 67                                   ld h,a
 169+ 921A 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 170+ 921B
 171+ 921B D1                                   pop de
 172+ 921C ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 173+ 921E
 174+ 921E EB                                   ex de,hl
 175+ 921F ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 176+ 9221 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 177+ 9222
 178+ 9222 C9                                   ret
 179+ 9223
 180+ 9223              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 181+ 9223              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 182+ 9223              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 183+ 9223              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 184+ 9223              ;         carry reset
 185+ 9223              ; maths is
 186+ 9223              ;        hl = y , de= x
 187+ 9223              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 188+ 9223              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 189+ 9223              ;
 190+ 9223              ;
 191+ 9223              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 192+ 9223 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 193+ 9224 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 194+ 9225 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 195+ 9226 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 196+ 9227 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 197+ 9228 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 198+ 9229 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 199+ 922B EB                                   ex de,hl
 200+ 922C ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 201+ 922E 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 202+ 922F 59                                   ld e,c
 203+ 9230 50                                   ld d,b
 204+ 9231 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 205+ 9233 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 206+ 9234 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 207+ 9235 67                                   ld h,a
 208+ 9236 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 209+ 9237                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 210+ 9237 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 211+ 9238 C1                                   pop     bc
 212+ 9239 C9                                   ret
 213+ 923A
 214+ 923A
 215+ 923A              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 216+ 923A              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 217+ 923A 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 218+ 923B AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 219+ 923C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 220+ 923E FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 221+ 9240 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 222+ 9241 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 223+ 9243 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 224+ 9244 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 225+ 9245 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 226+ 9247              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 227+ 9247 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 228+ 9248 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 229+ 9249 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 230+ 924B 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 231+ 924C 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 232+ 924D 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 233+ 924E 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 234+ 924F 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 235+ 9250 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 236+ 9251 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 237+ 9253 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 238+ 9254 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 239+ 9255 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 240+ 9256 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 241+ 9257 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 242+ 9258 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 243+ 9259 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 244+ 925A ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 245+ 925C 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 246+ 925D 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 247+ 925E FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 248+ 9260 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 249+ 9261 C9                                   ret
 250+ 9262
 251+ 9262              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 252+ 9262              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 253+ 9262              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 254+ 9262              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 255+ 9262              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 256+ 9262              ;mult3
 257+ 9262              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 258+ 9262              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 259+ 9262              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 260+ 9262              ; Algorithm
 261+ 9262              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 262+ 9262              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 263+ 9262              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 264+ 9262              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 265+ 9262              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 266+ 9262              ;
 267+ 9262              ;
 268+ 9262 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 269+ 9263 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 270+ 9264 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 271+ 9266 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 272+ 9268 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 273+ 9269 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 274+ 926B 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 275+ 926C 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 276+ 926D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 277+ 926F 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 278+ 9270 B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 279+ 9271 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 280+ 9273 7C                                   ld      a,h
 281+ 9274 B5                                   or      l
 282+ 9275 B3                                   or      e
 283+ 9276 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 284+ 9278              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 285+ 9278 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 286+ 9279 ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 287+ 927B 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 288+ 927C FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 289+ 927E 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 290+ 927F 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 291+ 9280 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 292+ 9282 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 293+ 9284 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 294+ 9285 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 295+ 9286 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 296+ 9288 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 297+ 9289 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 298+ 928A ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 299+ 928C FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 300+ 928E 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 301+ 928F 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 302+ 9290 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 303+ 9291 CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 304+ 9293 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 305+ 9295 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 306+ 9296 C9                                   ret
 307+ 9297 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 308+ 929A                                      ZeroA
 308+ 929A AF          >                        xor a
 309+ 929B 4F                                   ld      c,a
 310+ 929C 6F                                   ld      l,a
 311+ 929D C9                                   ret
 312+ 929E
 313+ 929E              ;;;
 314+ 929E              ;;;
 315+ 929E              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 316+ 929E              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 317+ 929E              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 318+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 319+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 320+ 929E              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 321+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 322+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 323+ 929E              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 324+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 325+ 929E              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 326+ 929E              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 327+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 328+ 929E              ;;;                        or      l
 329+ 929E              ;;;                        or      e
 330+ 929E              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 331+ 929E              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 332+ 929E              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 333+ 929E              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 334+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 335+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 336+ 929E              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 337+ 929E              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 338+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 339+ 929E              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 340+ 929E              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 341+ 929E              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 342+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 343+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 344+ 929E              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 345+ 929E              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 346+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 347+ 929E              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 348+ 929E              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 349+ 929E              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 350+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 351+ 929E              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 352+ 929E              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 353+ 929E              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 354+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 355+ 929E              ;;;                        ret
 356+ 929E              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 357+ 929E              ;;;                        ZeroA
 358+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 359+ 929E              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 360+ 929E              ;;;                        ret
 361+ 929E
 362+ 929E              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 363+ 929E              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 364+ 929E              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 365+ 929E              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 366+ 929E              ;         carry reset
 367+ 929E              ;
 368+ 929E              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 369+ 929E 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 370+ 929F AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 371+ 92A0 32 9E 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 372+ 92A3 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 373+ 92A4 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 374+ 92A7 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 375+ 92A9 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 376+ 92AB 57                                   ld      d,a
 377+ 92AC 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 378+ 92AE 32 9E 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 379+ 92B1 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 380+ 92B2 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 381+ 92B5 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 382+ 92B7 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 383+ 92B9 67                                   ld      h,a
 384+ 92BA 3A 9E 92                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 385+ 92BD EE 80                                xor     $80
 386+ 92BF 32 9E 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 387+ 92C2 CD 23 92     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 388+ 92C5 3A 9E 92     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 389+ 92C8 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 390+ 92CB C8                                   ret     z
 391+ 92CC AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 392+ 92CD 95                                   sub 	l
 393+ 92CE 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 394+ 92CF 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 395+ 92D0 94                                   sub 	h
 396+ 92D1 67                                   ld 		h,a
 397+ 92D2 C9                                   ret
 398+ 92D3
 399+ 92D3 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 400+ 92D4 32 9E 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 401+ 92D7 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 402+ 92D8 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 403+ 92DB 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 404+ 92DD E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 405+ 92DF 57                                   ld      d,a
 406+ 92E0 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 407+ 92E2 32 9E 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 408+ 92E5 CD 23 92     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 409+ 92E8 3A 9E 92     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 410+ 92EB ED 27 80                             test    $80
 411+ 92EE C8                                   ret     z
 412+ 92EF AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 413+ 92F0 95                                   sub 	l
 414+ 92F1 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 415+ 92F2 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 416+ 92F3 94                                   sub 	h
 417+ 92F4 67                                   ld 		h,a
 418+ 92F5 C9                                   ret

   1+ 92F6              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 92F6              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ 92F6
   4+ 92F6              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ 92F6 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ 92F6 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ 92F6 ~            			mul
   8+ 92F6              			ENDM
   9+ 92F6
  10+ 92F6              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ 92F6 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ 92F6 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ 92F6 ~            			mul
  14+ 92F6 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ 92F6              			ENDM
