 589  92F6                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ 92F6              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 92F6              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ 92F6              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ 92F6              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ 92F6              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ 92F6              asm_sqrt:
   7+ 92F6 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ 92F9 61           	ld h,c
   9+ 92FA 69           	ld l,c
  10+ 92FB              .sqrloop:
  11+ 92FB CB 38        	srl b
  12+ 92FD CB 19        	rr c
  13+ 92FF 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ 9300 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 9301 ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ 9303 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ 9305 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ 9306 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ 9307 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ 9309              .sqrbit:
  21+ 9309 19           	add hl,de
  22+ 930A EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ 930B B7           	or a
  24+ 930C ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ 930E              .sqrfi:
  26+ 930E CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ 9310 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ 9312 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ 9314 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ 9316 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ 9318 C9           	ret
  32+ 9319
  33+ 9319
  34+ 9319              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ 9319 3A 1D 7F     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ 931C 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ 931D 3A 1E 7F     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ 9320 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ 9321 CD F6 92     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ 9324 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ 9325 32 1D 7F     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ 9328 C9           	ret
  43+ 9329
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 590  9329                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ 9329
   2+ 9329
   3+ 9329
   4+ 9329              ;
   5+ 9329              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
   6+ 9329              ;   Loop:   A << 2
   7+ 9329              ;           if carry was 0
   8+ 9329              ;               if a >= D
   9+ 9329              ;                   A = A - D
  10+ 9329              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
  11+ 9329              ;           else
  12+ 9329
  13+ 9329              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
  14+ 9329              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
  15+ 9329              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
  16+ 9329              ;
  17+ 9329              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
  18+ 9329              ;
  19+ 9329              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
  20+ 9329              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
  21+ 9329
  22+ 9329 57           DVIDT:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
  23+ 932A 3A 1D 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
  24+ 932D 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; C = var Q
  25+ 932E 3A 19 7E                             ld      a,(varP)
  26+ 9331 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
  27+ 9332                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
  28+ 9332 7A           BAequDEdivC:            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
  29+ 9333 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
  30+ 9334 28 2A                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
  31+ 9336 79                                   ld      a,c                     ; Fast exit is divide by 0
  32+ 9337 A7                                   and     a                       ;
  33+ 9338 28 29                                jr      z,.ResultIsFFFF         ;
  34+ 933A 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
  35+ 933B A9                                   xor     c                       ;
  36+ 933C E6 80                                and     $80
  37+ 933E 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
  38+ 933F 3E 00                                ld      a,0
  39+ 9341 06 10                                ld      b,16
  40+ 9343                                      ShiftDELeft1
  40+ 9343 CB 23       >			   sla e
  40+ 9345 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  41+ 9347 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
  42+ 9349 CB 39                                srl     c
  43+ 934B CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
  44+ 934D                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
  44+ 934D B9          >                        cp      c
  44+ 934E DA 54 93    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
  45+ 9351                                      ClearCarryFlag
  45+ 9351 B7          >                        or a
  46+ 9352 99                                   sbc     c
  47+ 9353                                      ClearCarryFlag
  47+ 9353 B7          >                        or a
  48+ 9354 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
  49+ 9355 CB 13                                rl      e
  50+ 9357 CB 12                                rl      d
  51+ 9359 05                                   dec     b
  52+ 935A 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
  53+ 935C 7B                                   ld      a,e
  54+ 935D B5                                   or      l
  55+ 935E 42                                   ld      b,d
  56+ 935F C9                                   ret
  57+ 9360              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
  57+ 9360 AF          >                        xor a
  58+ 9361 47                                   ld      b,a
  59+ 9362 C9                                   ret
  60+ 9363 3E FF        .ResultIsFFFF:          ld      a,$FF
  61+ 9365 47                                   ld      b,a
  62+ 9366 C9                                   ret
  63+ 9367
  64+ 9367 57           DIV96:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
  65+ 9368 3A 1D 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
  66+ 936B 0E 60                                ld      c,96                    ; C = var Q
  67+ 936D 3A 19 7E                             ld      a,(varP)
  68+ 9370 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
  69+ 9371                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
  70+ 9371 7A           BAequDEdiv96            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
  71+ 9372 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
  72+ 9373 28 26                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
  73+ 9375 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
  74+ 9376 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
  75+ 9377 E6 80                                and     $80
  76+ 9379 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
  77+ 937A 3E 00                                ld      a,0
  78+ 937C 06 10                                ld      b,16
  79+ 937E                                      ShiftDELeft1
  79+ 937E CB 23       >			   sla e
  79+ 9380 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  80+ 9382 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
  81+ 9384 CB 39                                srl     c
  82+ 9386 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
  83+ 9388                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
  83+ 9388 B9          >                        cp      c
  83+ 9389 DA 8F 93    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
  84+ 938C                                      ClearCarryFlag

  85+ 938D 99                                   sbc     c

  88+ 9390 CB 13                                rl      e
  89+ 9392 CB 12                                rl      d
  90+ 9394 05                                   dec     b
  91+ 9395 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop

  94+ 9399 42                                   ld      b,d
  95+ 939A C9                                   ret
  96+ 939B              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
  96+ 939B AF          >                        xor a

  98+ 939D C9                                   ret
  99+ 939E
 100+ 939E 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
 101+ 939F 15                                   dec     d
 102+ 93A0 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
 103+ 93A2 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
 104+ 93A4 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 105+ 93A6 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
 106+ 93A7 B3                                   or      e
 107+ 93A8 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
 108+ 93AA 14                                   inc     d
 109+ 93AB 15                                   dec     d
 110+ 93AC CD 31 95                             call    BC_Div_DE
 111+ 93AF                                      ZeroA
 111+ 93AF AF          >                        xor a
 112+ 93B0 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
 113+ 93B1 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
 114+ 93B3 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
 115+ 93B4 C9                                   ret
 116+ 93B5 AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
 117+ 93B6 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
 118+ 93B7 67                                   ld      h,a
 119+ 93B8 6F                                   ld      l,a
 120+ 93B9 C9                                   ret
 121+ 93BA 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 122+ 93BC 67                                   ld      h,a
 123+ 93BD 6F                                   ld      l,a
 124+ 93BE                                      SetCarryFlag
 124+ 93BE 37          >                        scf
 125+ 93BF C9                                   ret
 126+ 93C0
 127+ 93C0              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
 128+ 93C0 06 08        HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
 129+ 93C2 CB 27                                sla		a							;
 130+ 93C4 67                                   ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
 131+ 93C5 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
 132+ 93C7 38 03                                jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
 133+ 93C9 BA                                   cp      d                           ; what was var Q
 134+ 93CA 38 03                                jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
 135+ 93CC              .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
 135+ 93CC B7          >                        or a
 136+ 93CD 9A                                   sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
 137+ 93CE                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
 137+ 93CE B7          >                        or a
 138+ 93CF 3F           .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
 139+ 93D0 CB 14                                rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
 140+ 93D2 10 F1                                djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
 141+ 93D4 BA           .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
 142+ 93D5 30 19                                jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
 143+ 93D7                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
 143+ 93D7 B7          >                        or a
 144+ 93D8 06 FE        .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
 145+ 93DA 68                                   ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
 146+ 93DB CB 27        .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
 147+ 93DD 38 0A                                jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
 148+ 93DF BA                                   cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
 149+ 93E0 38 01                                jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
 150+ 93E2 9A                                   sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
 151+ 93E3 3F           .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
 152+ 93E4 CB 15                                rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
 153+ 93E6 38 F3                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
 154+ 93E8 C9                                   ret
 155+ 93E9 9A           .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
 156+ 93EA                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
 156+ 93EA 37          >                        scf
 157+ 93EB CB 15                                rl      l                           ;
 158+ 93ED 38 EC                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
 159+ 93EF C9                                   ret
 160+ 93F0 2E FF        .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
 161+ 93F2 C9                                   ret
 162+ 93F3
 163+ 93F3 BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
 164+ 93F4 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
 165+ 93F6 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
 166+ 93F8 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
 167+ 93FA CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
 168+ 93FC 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
 169+ 93FE                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
 169+ 93FE BA          >                        cp      d
 169+ 93FF DA 04 94    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
 170+ 9402 92                                   sub     d
 171+ 9403                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
 171+ 9403 B7          >                        or a
 172+ 9404              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
 172+ 9404 3F          >                        ccf
 173+ 9405 CB 13                                rl      e
 174+ 9407 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
 175+ 9409 7B                                   ld      a,e
 176+ 940A C9                                   ret
 177+ 940B 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 178+ 940C                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 178+ 940C 37          >                        scf
 179+ 940D CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 180+ 940F 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 181+ 9411 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 182+ 9412 C9                                   ret
 183+ 9413 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 184+ 9415 C9                                   ret
 185+ 9416 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 186+ 9418 C9                                   ret
 187+ 9419
 188+ 9419
 189+ 9419              ; Divide 8-bit values
 190+ 9419              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 191+ 9419              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 192+ 9419              ;
 193+ 9419              ;;;Div8:
 194+ 9419              ;;;    xor a
 195+ 9419              ;;;    ld b,8
 196+ 9419              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 197+ 9419              ;;;    rl e
 198+ 9419              ;;;    rla
 199+ 9419              ;;;    sub c
 200+ 9419              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 201+ 9419              ;;;    add a,c
 202+ 9419              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 203+ 9419              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 204+ 9419              ;;;    ld b,a0
 205+ 9419              ;;;    ld a,e
 206+ 9419              ;;;    rla
 207+ 9419              ;;;    cpl
 208+ 9419              ;;;    ret
 209+ 9419
 210+ 9419              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 211+ 9419              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 212+ 9419              ;;         A is a copy of E
 213+ 9419              ;;         HL is the remainder
 214+ 9419              ;;         BC is not changed
 215+ 9419              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 216+ 9419              ;140 bytes
 217+ 9419              ;145cc
 218+ 9419
 219+ 9419              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 220+ 9419 ~                                rla
 221+ 9419 ~                                adc     hl,hl
 222+ 9419 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 223+ 9419 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 224+ 9419 ~                                add     hl,bc
 225+ 9419                                  ENDM
 226+ 9419
 227+ 9419              DEequDEDivBC:
 228+ 9419 AF               xor a
 229+ 941A ED 62            sbc hl,hl
 230+ 941C 7A               ld a,d
 231+ 941D                  MacroDEDivBC
 231+ 941D 17          >                    rla
 231+ 941E ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 231+ 9420 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 231+ 9422 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 231+ 9424 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 232+ 9425                  MacroDEDivBC
 232+ 9425 17          >                    rla
 232+ 9426 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 232+ 9428 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 232+ 942A 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 232+ 942C 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 233+ 942D                  MacroDEDivBC

 233+ 9430 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 233+ 9432 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 233+ 9434 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 253+ 94A2 2F               cpl

 256+ 94A5
 257+ 94A5
 258+ 94A5
 259+ 94A5              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 260+ 94A5              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 261+ 94A5              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 262+ 94A5              ; Our use
 263+ 94A5              ; BC = A0
 264+ 94A5              ; DE = 0C
 265+ 94A5              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 266+ 94A5              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 266+ 94A5 B9          >                        cp     c
 266+ 94A6 D2 D1 94    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 267+ 94A9 47                                   ld      b,a
 268+ 94AA 59                                   ld      e,c
 269+ 94AB 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 270+ 94AD 16 00                                ld      d,0
 271+ 94AF C3 BC 94                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 272+ 94B2 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 273+ 94B3 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 274+ 94B5 21 1D 7F                             ld      hl,varQ
 275+ 94B8 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 276+ 94B9 16 00                                ld      d,0
 277+ 94BB 5F                                   ld      e,a
 278+ 94BC              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 279+ 94BC 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 280+ 94BF 78                                   ld      a,b
 281+ 94C0 06 10                                ld      b,16
 282+ 94C2 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 283+ 94C4 17                                   rla			; ...
 284+ 94C5 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 285+ 94C7 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 286+ 94C9 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 287+ 94CB 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 288+ 94CC 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 289+ 94CD 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 290+ 94CF 47                                   ld   b,a
 291+ 94D0 C9                                   ret
 292+ 94D1 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 293+ 94D4 C9                                   ret
 294+ 94D5              ; switch to logarithm version
 295+ 94D5              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 296+ 94D5 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 297+ 94D7 AF                                   xor a
 298+ 94D8 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 299+ 94DA 17                                   rla
 300+ 94DB BA                                   cp d
 301+ 94DC 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 301+ 94DE
 302+ 94DE 0C                                   inc c
 303+ 94DF 92                                   sub d
 304+ 94E0 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 305+ 94E2 C9                                   ret
 306+ 94E3              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 307+ 94E3 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 308+ 94E5 AF                                   xor a
 309+ 94E6 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 310+ 94E8 CB 14                                rl	h
 311+ 94EA              ;    add hl,hl
 312+ 94EA 17                                   rla
 313+ 94EB B9                                   cp c
 314+ 94EC 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 315+ 94EE 2C                                   inc l
 316+ 94EF 91                                   sub c
 317+ 94F0 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 318+ 94F2 C9                                   ret
 319+ 94F3              ;
 320+ 94F3              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 321+ 94F3              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 322+ 94F3              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 323+ 94F3              ;
 324+ 94F3              HLDivC_Iteration: 	    MACRO
 325+ 94F3 ~                                    add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 326+ 94F3 ~                                    rla				; ...
 327+ 94F3 ~                                    cp	c			; ...
 328+ 94F3 ~                                    jr	1F
 329+ 94F3 ~                                    sub	c			; ...
 330+ 94F3 ~            1:
 331+ 94F3 ~                                    inc	l			; ...
 332+ 94F3                                      ENDM
 333+ 94F3
 334+ 94F3              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 335+ 94F3 ~                                    rl  e
 336+ 94F3 ~                                    rla
 337+ 94F3 ~                                    sub c
 338+ 94F3 ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 339+ 94F3 ~                                    add a,c
 340+ 94F3 ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 341+ 94F3                                      ENDM

 361+ 9531              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 362+ 9531 ~                                    rla
 363+ 9531 ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 364+ 9531 ~                                    add	    hl,de

 370+ 9531
 371+ 9531              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 372+ 9531              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 373+ 9531              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 374+ 9531              ;min: 738cc
 375+ 9531              ;max: 898cc
 376+ 9531              ;avg: 818cc
 377+ 9531              ;144 bytes
 378+ 9531 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 379+ 9532 67                                   ld h,a
 380+ 9533 6F                                   ld l,a
 381+ 9534 93                                   sub e
 382+ 9535 5F                                   ld e,a
 383+ 9536 9F                                   sbc a,a
 384+ 9537 92                                   sub d
 385+ 9538 57                                   ld d,a
 386+ 9539 78                                   ld a,b

 387+ 953B ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 387+ 953D 19          >                        add	    hl,de

 387+ 9540 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 387+ 9542             >1:

 398+ 957D                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 398+ 957D 17          >                        rla
 398+ 957E ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 398+ 9580 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 398+ 9581 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 398+ 9583 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 398+ 9585             >1:
 399+ 9585                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 399+ 9585 17          >                        rla
 399+ 9586 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 399+ 9588 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 399+ 9589 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 399+ 958B ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 399+ 958D             >1:
 400+ 958D                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 400+ 958D 17          >                        rla
 400+ 958E ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 400+ 9590 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 400+ 9591 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 400+ 9593 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 400+ 9595             >1:
 401+ 9595                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 401+ 9595 17          >                        rla
 401+ 9596 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 401+ 9598 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 401+ 9599 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 401+ 959B ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 401+ 959D             >1:
 402+ 959D                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 402+ 959D 17          >                        rla
 402+ 959E ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 402+ 95A0 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 402+ 95A1 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 402+ 95A3 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 402+ 95A5             >1:
 403+ 95A5                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 403+ 95A5 17          >                        rla
 403+ 95A6 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 403+ 95A8 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 403+ 95A9 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 403+ 95AB ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 403+ 95AD             >1:
 404+ 95AD                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 404+ 95AD 17          >                        rla
 404+ 95AE ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 404+ 95B0 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 404+ 95B1 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 404+ 95B3 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 404+ 95B5             >1:
 405+ 95B5                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 405+ 95B5 17          >                        rla
 405+ 95B6 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 405+ 95B8 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 405+ 95B9 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 405+ 95BB ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 405+ 95BD             >1:
 406+ 95BD 17                                   rla
 407+ 95BE 4F                                   ld c,a
 408+ 95BF C9                                   ret
 409+ 95C0
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
 591  95C0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ 95C0              asm_tis2:
   2+ 95C0              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ 95C0              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ 95C0 F5           	push af
   5+ 95C1 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ 95C3 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ 95C4 3A 1D 7F     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ 95C7 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ 95C8 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ 95C9 BB           	cp e
  11+ 95CA 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ 95CC 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ 95CE ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ 95D0 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 95D1 3A 1D 7F     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ 95D4 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ 95D5 CD E3 94     	call asm_div16
  18+ 95D8 F1           	pop af
  19+ 95D9 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ 95DB B5           	or l
  21+ 95DC C9           	ret
  22+ 95DD              .tis2_set96:
  23+ 95DD F1           	pop af
  24+ 95DE E6 80        	and $80
  25+ 95E0 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ 95E2 C9           	ret
  27+ 95E3
  28+ 95E3
  29+ 95E3              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ 95E3              squareregfx:
  31+ 95E3 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ 95E6 57           	ld d,a
  33+ 95E7 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ 95E8 ED 30        	mul
  35+ 95EA EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ 95EB              squareregfy:
  37+ 95EB 3A A8 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ 95EE 57           	ld d,a
  39+ 95EF 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ 95F0 ED 30        	mul
  41+ 95F2 19           	add hl,de
  42+ 95F3              squareregfz:
  43+ 95F3 3A AA C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ 95F6 57           	ld d,a
  45+ 95F7 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ 95F8 ED 30        	mul
  47+ 95FA 19           	add hl,de
  48+ 95FB EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ 95FC              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ 95FC CD F6 92     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ 95FF E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ 9600 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ 9601 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ 9602              normfx:
  55+ 9602 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ 9605 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ 9606 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ 9607 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ 9608 CD C0 95     	call asm_tis2
  60+ 960B 32 A6 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ 960E              normfy:
  62+ 960E 3A A8 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ 9611 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ 9612 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ 9613 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ 9614 CD C0 95     	call asm_tis2
  67+ 9617 32 A8 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ 961A              normfz:
  69+ 961A 3A AA C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ 961D E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ 961E 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ 961F 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ 9620 CD C0 95     	call asm_tis2
  74+ 9623 32 AA C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ 9626              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ 9626 C9           	ret
  77+ 9627
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 592  9627                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ 9627              ; Input:
   2+ 9627              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ 9627              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ 9627              ; Output:
   5+ 9627              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ 9627              ;
   7+ 9627              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ 9627              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ 9627              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ 9627              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ 9627              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ 9627              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ 9627              ;
  14+ 9627
  15+ 9627 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  16+ 9628 A7                               and     a
  17+ 9629 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  18+ 962B E1                               pop     hl
  19+ 962C C9                               ret
  20+ 962D
  21+ 962D              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  22+ 962D              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  23+ 962D
  24+ 962D E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  25+ 962F 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  26+ 9630 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  27+ 9632 67                               ld      h,a
  28+ 9633 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  29+ 9634 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  30+ 9636 57                               ld      d,a
  31+ 9637 A7                               and     a
  32+ 9638 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  33+ 963A D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  34+ 963C C9                               ret
  35+ 963D
  36+ 963D
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
 593  963D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ 963D              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ 963D              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ 963D              negate16:
   4+ 963D              negate16hl:
   5+ 963D                      ; Input:
   6+ 963D                      ;       HL = value
   7+ 963D                      ; Output:
   8+ 963D                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ 963D                      ; Destroys:
  10+ 963D                      ;       AF
  11+ 963D                      ;
  12+ 963D AF           	xor 	a
  13+ 963E 95           	sub 	l
  14+ 963F 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ 9640 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ 9641 94           	sub 	h
  17+ 9642 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ 9643 C9           	ret
  19+ 9644
  20+ 9644              negate16de:
  21+ 9644 AF           	xor 	a
  22+ 9645 93           	sub 	e
  23+ 9646 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ 9647 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ 9648 92           	sub 	d
  26+ 9649 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ 964A C9           	ret
  28+ 964B
  29+ 964B              negate16bc:
  30+ 964B AF           	xor 	a
  31+ 964C 91           	sub 	c
  32+ 964D 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ 964E 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ 964F 90           	sub 	b
  35+ 9650 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ 9651 C9           	ret
  37+ 9652
  38+ 9652
  39+ 9652              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ 9652 ~            					xor 	a
  41+ 9652 ~            					sub 	l
  42+ 9652 ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ 9652 ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ 9652 ~            					sub 	h
  45+ 9652 ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ 9652              					ENDM
  47+ 9652
  48+ 9652              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ 9652 ~            					xor 	a
  50+ 9652 ~                                sub 	e
  51+ 9652 ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ 9652 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ 9652 ~                                sub 	d
  54+ 9652 ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ 9652              					ENDM
  56+ 9652              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ 9652 ~            					xor 	a
  58+ 9652 ~                                sub 	c
  59+ 9652 ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ 9652 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ 9652 ~                                sub 	b
  62+ 9652 ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ 9652              					ENDM
  64+ 9652
  65+ 9652              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ 9652 ~            					xor 	a
  67+ 9652 ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ 9652 ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ 9652 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ 9652 ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ 9652 ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ 9652              					ENDM
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
 594  9652                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ 9652              ; a equal a / d * 96
   2+ 9652
   3+ 9652
   4+ 9652
   5+ 9652              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
   6+ 9652 3A A6 C0     normaliseXX1596S7:      ld		a,(XX15VecX)	    ; XX15+0
   7+ 9655 DD 67                                ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
   8+ 9657 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
   9+ 9659              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
   9+ 9659 5F          >			ld	e,a
   9+ 965A 57          >			ld  d,a
   9+ 965B ED 30       >			mul
  10+ 965D 62                                   ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  11+ 965E 6B                                   ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  12+ 965F 3A A7 C0     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  13+ 9662 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  14+ 9664 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  15+ 9666                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  15+ 9666 5F          >			ld	e,a
  15+ 9667 57          >			ld  d,a
  15+ 9668 ED 30       >			mul
  16+ 966A 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  17+ 966B 3A A8 C0     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(XX15VecZ)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  18+ 966E FD 67                                ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  19+ 9670 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  20+ 9672                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  20+ 9672 5F          >			ld	e,a
  20+ 9673 57          >			ld  d,a
  20+ 9674 ED 30       >			mul
  21+ 9676 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  22+ 9677 EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  23+ 9678 CD F6 92     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  24+ 967B 3A A6 C0     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(XX15VecX)
  25+ 967E E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  26+ 9680 4F                                   ld		c,a
  27+ 9681 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  28+ 9682 CD 15 98                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  29+ 9685 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  30+ 9686 DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh			    ;++SGN
  31+ 9688 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  32+ 968A B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  33+ 968B 32 A6 C0                             ld		(XX15VecX),a
  34+ 968E 3A A7 C0     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  35+ 9691 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  36+ 9693 4F                                   ld		c,a
  37+ 9694 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  38+ 9695 CD 15 98                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  39+ 9698 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  40+ 9699 DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl			    ;++SGN
  41+ 969B E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  42+ 969D B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  43+ 969E 32 A7 C0                             ld		(XX15VecY),a
  44+ 96A1 3A A8 C0     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(XX15VecZ)
  45+ 96A4 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  46+ 96A6 4F                                   ld		c,a
  47+ 96A7 55                                   ld		d,l				; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  48+ 96A8 CD 15 98                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  49+ 96AB 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  50+ 96AC FD 7C                                ld		a,iyh			    ;++SGN
  51+ 96AE E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  52+ 96B0 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  53+ 96B1 32 A8 C0                             ld		(XX15VecZ),a
  54+ 96B4 C9                                   ret
  55+ 96B5
  56+ 96B5              ; Normalise vector
  57+ 96B5              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  58+ 96B5              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  59+ 96B5              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  60+ 96B5              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  61+ 96B5
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 595  96B5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ 96B5              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ 96B5              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ 96B5              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ 96B5              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ 96B5              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ 96B5              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ 96B5              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ 96B5 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ 96B8 CD CE 96     	call	Num1
  10+ 96BB 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ 96BE CD CE 96     	call	Num1
  12+ 96C1 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ 96C4 CD CE 96     	call	Num1
  14+ 96C7 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ 96C9 CD CE 96     	call	Num1
  16+ 96CC 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ 96CE              Num1:
  18+ 96CE 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ 96D0              .Num2:
  20+ 96D0 3C           	inc	a
  21+ 96D1 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ 96D2 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ 96D4 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ 96D6 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ 96D7 13           	inc	de
  26+ 96D8 C9           	ret
  27+ 96D9
  28+ 96D9              DispAtoDE:
  29+ 96D9 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ 96DB 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ 96DC C3 B5 96     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ 96DF
  33+ 96DF              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ 96DF 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ 96E1 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ 96E2 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ 96E5 CD F5 96     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ 96E8 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ 96EA CD CE 96     	call	Num1
  40+ 96ED 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ 96EF 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ 96F0 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ 96F1 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ 96F3 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ 96F5              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ 96F5 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ 96F7              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ 96F7 3C           	inc	a
  49+ 96F8 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ 96F9 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ 96FB FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ 96FD 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ 96FF              .Blank:
  54+ 96FF 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ 9701              .DontBlank:
  56+ 9701 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ 9703 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ 9704 13           	inc	de
  59+ 9705 C9           	ret
  60+ 9706
  61+ 9706              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ 9706 FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ 9708 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ 970A 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ 970C 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ 970D 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ 9710 CD 1C 97     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ 9713 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ 9715 CD 1C 97     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ 9718 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ 971A 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ 971C              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ 971C 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ 971E              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ 971E 3C           	inc	a
  76+ 971F 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ 9720 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ 9722 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ 9724 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ 9726              .Blank:
  81+ 9726 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ 9728              .DontBlank:
  83+ 9728 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ 972A 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ 972B 13           	inc	de
  86+ 972C C9           	ret
  87+ 972D              .NoStock:
  88+ 972D 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ 972F 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ 9730 13           	inc	de
  91+ 9731 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ 9732 13           	inc	de
  93+ 9733 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ 9735 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ 9736 13           	inc de
  96+ 9737 C9           	ret
  97+ 9738
  98+ 9738
  99+ 9738              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ 9738              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ 9738              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ 9738              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ 9738 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ 973C 0A 00 00 00
 103+ 9740 64 00 00 00
 103+ 9744 E8 03 00 00
 103+ 9748 10 27 00 00
 104+ 974C A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ 9750 40 42 0F 00
 104+ 9754 80 96 98 00
 104+ 9758 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ 975C 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ 9760 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ 9764
 107+ 9764              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ 9764 CD 73 97     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ 9767 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ 976A FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ 976D 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ 976F FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ 9772 C9                                   ret
 114+ 9773
 115+ 9773 DD 22 60 97  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ 9777 ED 53 62 97                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ 977B DD 21 5C 97                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ 977F 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ 9781 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ 9783 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ 9785 B7                                   or a
 122+ 9786 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ 9789 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ 978C 2A 60 97                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ 978F ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ 9791 22 60 97                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ 9794 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ 9797 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ 979A 2A 62 97                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ 979D ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ 979F 22 62 97                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ 97A2 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ 97A4 0C                                   inc c
 134+ 97A5 3C                                   inc a
 135+ 97A6 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ 97A8 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ 97AB DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ 97AE 2A 60 97                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ 97B1 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ 97B2 22 60 97                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ 97B5 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ 97B8 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ 97BB 2A 62 97                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ 97BE ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ 97C0 22 62 97                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ 97C3 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ 97C6 DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ 97C8 0C                                   inc c
 149+ 97C9 0D                                   dec c
 150+ 97CA 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ 97CC FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ 97CF FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ 97D1 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ 97D3 3A 60 97                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ 97D6 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ 97D8 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ 97DB FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ 97DF C9                                   ret
 159+ 97E0
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
 596  97E0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ 97E0              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ 97E0 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 97E1 D2 FC 97    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ 97E4 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ 97E6 CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ 97E8                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ 97E8 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 97E9 DA FF 97    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ 97EC 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ 97ED 37                                   scf
   7+ 97EE CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ 97F0 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ 97F2 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ 97F3 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ 97F5 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ 97F7 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ 97F8 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ 97FA 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 97FB C9                                   ret
  16+ 97FC 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ 97FE C9                                   ret
  18+ 97FF B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ 9800 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ 9802 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ 9804 C3 F2 97                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ 9807
  23+ 9807
  24+ 9807              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ 9807              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ 9807              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ 9807 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ 9809 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ 980B ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ 980D CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ 980F              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ 980F              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ 980F              TIS2:
  34+ 980F 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ 9810 3A 1D 7F     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ 9813 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ 9814 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ 9815              AequAdivDmul967Bit:
  39+ 9815 4F               ld          c,a
  40+ 9816 7A               ld          a,d
  41+ 9817 CB 27            sla         a
  42+ 9819 30 10            jr          nc, .OKToDivide
  43+ 981B              .ScaleDown:
  44+ 981B B7               or          a
  45+ 981C CB 3A            srl         d
  46+ 981E
  47+ 981E 79               ld          a,c
  48+ 981F E6 7F            and         SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9821 CB 3F            srl         a
  50+ 9823 47               ld          b,a
  51+ 9824 79               ld          a,c
  52+ 9825 E6 80            and         $80
  53+ 9827 B0               or          b
  54+ 9828 C3 2C 98         jp          AequAdivDmul96
  55+ 982B              .OKToDivide:
  56+ 982B 79               ld          a,c
  57+ 982C              AequAdivDmul96:
  58+ 982C 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  59+ 982D E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  60+ 982F              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  60+ 982F BA          >                        cp     d
  60+ 9830 D2 50 98    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  61+ 9833 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  62+ 9835              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  63+ 9835 CB 27        	sla			a
  64+ 9837              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
  64+ 9837 BA          >                        cp      d
  64+ 9838 DA 56 98    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  65+ 983B 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  66+ 983C 37           	scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
  67+ 983D CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  68+ 983F 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  69+ 9841              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  70+ 9841 78           	ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
  71+ 9842 CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  72+ 9844 CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  73+ 9846 47           	ld			b,a							; .
  74+ 9847 CB 3F        	srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
  75+ 9849 80           	add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
  76+ 984A 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  77+ 984B 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  78+ 984C E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  79+ 984E B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  80+ 984F C9           	ret
  81+ 9850              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  82+ 9850              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  83+ 9850 79           	ld			a,c
  84+ 9851 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  85+ 9853 F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  86+ 9855 C9           	ret
  87+ 9856              .TIS2SkipSub:
  88+ 9856              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
  88+ 9856 B7          >                        or a
  89+ 9857 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  90+ 9859 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  91+ 985B C3 41 98     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  92+ 985E
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
 597  985E                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ 985E              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ 985E              fmltu:
   3+ 985E 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ 985F 3A 1D 7F                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ 9862 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ 9863 ED 30                                mul
   7+ 9865 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ 9866 C9                                   ret
   9+ 9867
  10+ 9867 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ 9868 ED 30                                mul
  12+ 986A 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ 986B C9                                   ret
  14+ 986C

 598  986C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ 986C              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ 986C              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ 986C 21 00 82     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ 986F FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ 9871 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ 9873 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ 9874 C3 80 98     		jp		DV41
   8+ 9877              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ 9877 21 00 82     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ 987A 3A 03 7E     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ 987D ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ 987F 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ 9880              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ 9880 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ 9881 3A 17 7F     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ 9884              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ 9884 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ 9886 CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ 9888 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ 9889 AF           		xor		a
  21+ 988A              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ 988A CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ 988C 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ 988E BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ 988F 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ 9891              DV8:
  27+ 9891 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ 9892 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ 9893              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ 9893 CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ 9895 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ 9897              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ 9897              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ 9897 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ 9899 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ 989A              .RollRemainder:
  37+ 989A CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ 989C 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ 989E B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ 989F 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ 98A1              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ 98A1 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ 98A2              .DontSBC:
  44+ 98A2 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ 98A4 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ 98A6 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ 98A7 32 1E 7F     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ 98AA 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ 98AB 32 19 7E     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ 98AE C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ 98AF              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ 98AF 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ 98B0 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ 98B1 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ 98B3 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ 98B5 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ 98B6 32 1E 7F     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ 98B9 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ 98BA 32 19 7E     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ 98BD C9           		ret
  61+ 98BE              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ 98BE 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ 98C0 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ 98C1 32 1E 7F     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ 98C4 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ 98C5 32 19 7E     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ 98C8 C9           		ret
  68+ 98C9
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
 599  98C9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"

   1+ 98C9
   2+ 98C9              asm_defmutl:
   3+ 98C9              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ 98C9              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ 98C9 ED 30        	mul
   6+ 98CB 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low

 600  98CD
 601  98CD                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ 98CD              APequQmulA:
   2+ 98CD              asm_mult1:
   3+ 98CD              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ 98CD FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ 98CF 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ 98D1 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ 98D2 3A 1D 7F     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ 98D5 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ 98D6 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ 98D8 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ 98DA AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ 98DB E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ 98DD 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ 98DE 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ 98DF E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ 98E1 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ 98E2 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ 98E3 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ 98E5 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ 98E6 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ 98E8 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ 98E9 32 19 7E     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ 98EC 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ 98ED B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ 98EE 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ 98EF C9           	ret
  27+ 98F0              .mul0:
  28+ 98F0 AF           	xor	a
  29+ 98F1 32 19 7E     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ 98F4 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ 98F5 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ 98F6 C9           	ret
  33+ 98F7
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 602  98F7                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ 98F7              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ 98F7              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ 98F7              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ 98F7              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ 98F7              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ 98F7              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ 98F7              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ 98F7              LL38:
   9+ 98F7              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ 98F7              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ 98F7              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ 98F7              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ 98F7              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ 98F7              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ 98F7              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ 98F7              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ 98F7              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ 98F7              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ 98F7              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ 98F7              ;	ret
  21+ 98F7              ; calculation table
  22+ 98F7              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ 98F7              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ 98F7              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ 98F7              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ 98F7              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ 98F7              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ 98F7              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ 98F7              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ 98F7              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ 98F7
  32+ 98F7              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ 98F7              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ 98F7              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ 98F7              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ 98F7
  37+ 98F7
  38+ 98F7              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ 98F7 21 1F 7F     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ 98FA AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ 98FB FA 06 99     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ 98FE 3A 1D 7F     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ 9901 21 1E 7F     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ 9904 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ 9905 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ 9906              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ 9906 3A 1E 7F     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ 9909 21 1D 7F     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ 990C              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ 990C              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ 990C B7          >                        or a
  51+ 990D 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ 990E 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ 9910              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ 9910              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ 9910              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ 9910 C9           	ret
  57+ 9911              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ 9911 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ 9913 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ 9915 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ 9917 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ 9918 3A 1F 7F     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ 991B EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ 991D 32 1F 7F     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ 9920 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ 9921                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ 9921 B7          >                        or a
  67+ 9922 C9           	ret
  68+ 9923              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ 9923 32 1F 7F         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ 9926                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ 9926 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9927 C9               ret
  72+ 9928              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ 9928              ;--	push	bc
  74+ 9928              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ 9928              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ 9928              ;--	sub		b
  77+ 9928              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ 9928              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ 9928              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ 9928              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ 9928              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ 9928              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ 9928              ;--	ret
  84+ 9928
  85+ 9928              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ 9928              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ 9928              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ 9928              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ 9928              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ 9928              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ 9928              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ 9928              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ 9928              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ 9928              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ 9928              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ 9928              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ 9928              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ 9928              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ 9928              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ 9928              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ 9928              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ 9928              ;;;;	ret
 109+ 9928              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ 9928              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ 9928              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ 9928              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ 9928              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ 9928              ;;;;	ret
 117+ 9928              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ 9928              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ 9928              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ 9928              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ 9928              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ 9928              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ 9928              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ 9928              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ 9928              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ 9928              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ 9928              ;;;;	ret
 134+ 9928              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ 9928              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ 9928              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ 9928              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ 9928              ;;;;	ret
 141+ 9928
 142+ 9928
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm

   1+ 9928              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ 9928              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ 9928              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ 9928
   5+ 9928
   6+ 9928              moveship4Yreg:

   8+ 992B 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ 992C              moveship4breg:
  10+ 992C              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ 992C              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ 992C              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ 992C 3A 31 7E     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ 992F 32 1D 7F     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ 9932 21 22 C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn

  17+ 9936 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ 9938 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ 9939 32 1E 7F     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo

  23+ 9941 2B           		dec		hl

  38+ 9957 32 19 7E             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P

  41+ 995C 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ 995D 32 1E 7F             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo

  50+ 996B 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ 996C 2B                   dec     hl

  53+ 996E 3A 02 7E             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ 9971 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ 9972 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment
  56+ 9973 32 19 7E             ld      (varP),a                    ; P

  71+ 998E EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ 9990 CD 73 91             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ 9993 2B                   dec     hl
