 605  99B8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ 99B8              ;;;LL28:
   2+ 99B8              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ 99B8              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ 99B8              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ 99B8              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ 99B8              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ 99B8              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ 99B8              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ 99B8              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ 99B8              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ 99B8              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ 99B8              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ 99B8              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ 99B8              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ 99B8              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ 99B8              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ 99B8              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ 99B8              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ 99B8              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ 99B8              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ 99B8              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ 99B8              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ 99B8              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ 99B8              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ 99B8              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ 99B8              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ 99B8              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ 99B8              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ 99B8              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ 99B8              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ 99B8              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ 99B8              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ 99B8              ;;;	ret
  34+ 99B8              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ 99B8              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ 99B8              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ 99B8              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ 99B8              ;;;	ret
  39+ 99B8
  40+ 99B8              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ 99B8 59             ld    e,c
  42+ 99B9 67             ld    h,a
  43+ 99BA 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ 99BC              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ 99BC 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ 99BD B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ 99BE C8             ret z
  48+ 99BF 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ 99C2 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ 99C4              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ 99C4 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ 99C6 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ 99C7 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ 99C9 C9             ret
  55+ 99CA
  56+ 99CA              HL_Div_C:
  57+ 99CA              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ 99CA              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ 99CA              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ 99CA 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ 99CC AF                   xor a
  62+ 99CD              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ 99CD 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ 99CE 17                   rla
  65+ 99CF B9                   cp c
  66+ 99D0 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ 99D2 91                   sub c
  68+ 99D3 2C                   inc l
  69+ 99D4              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ 99D4 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ 99D6 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ 99D7 32 1E 7F             ld  (varR),a
  73+ 99DA C9                   ret
  74+ 99DB
  75+ 99DB
  76+ 99DB
  77+ 99DB              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ 99DB              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ 99DB              BFRDIV:
  80+ 99DB F5           		push	af
  81+ 99DC 3A 1D 7F     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ 99DF 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ 99E0 F1           		pop		af
  84+ 99E1 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ 99E3 CA FA 99     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ 99E6              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ 99E6 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ 99E8 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ 99E9              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ 99E9 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ 99EB AF           		xor a
  92+ 99EC              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ 99EC 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ 99ED 17           		rla
  95+ 99EE B9           		cp c
  96+ 99EF 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ 99F1 2C           		inc l
  98+ 99F2 91           		sub c
  99+ 99F3              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ 99F3 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ 99F5 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ 99F6 32 1E 7F     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ 99F9 C9           		ret
 104+ 99FA              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ 99FA 32 1E 7F     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ 99FD C9           		ret
 107+ 99FE              ;	push	af
 108+ 99FE              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ 99FE              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ 99FE              ;	pop		af
 111+ 99FE              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ 99FE              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ 99FE              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ 99FE              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ 99FE              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ 99FE              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ 99FE              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ 99FE              ;	sla		a
 119+ 99FE              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ 99FE              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ 99FE              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ 99FE              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ 99FE              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ 99FE              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ 99FE              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ 99FE              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ 99FE              ;	scf
 128+ 99FE              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ 99FE              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ 99FE              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ 99FE              ;LL2:
 132+ 99FE              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ 99FE              ;LL2Good:
 134+ 99FE              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ 99FE              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ 99FE              ;	ret
 137+ 99FE
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
 606  99FE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ 99FE              RequAdivQ:
   2+ 99FE              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ 99FE              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ 99FE 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ 99FF 3A 1D 7F     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ 9A02 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ 9A04 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ 9A06 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ 9A07 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ 9A09 AF               xor a
  11+ 9A0A              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ 9A0A CB 21            sla c
  13+ 9A0C 17               rla
  14+ 9A0D BA               cp d
  15+ 9A0E 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ 9A10 0C               inc c
  17+ 9A11 92               sub d
  18+ 9A12              LL64:
  19+ 9A12 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ 9A14 32 1C 7F     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ 9A17 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ 9A18 32 1E 7F     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ 9A1B C9               ret
  24+ 9A1C              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ 9A1C 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ 9A1E 32 1E 7F     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ 9A21 32 1C 7F     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ 9A24 C9           	ret
  29+ 9A25
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
 607  9A25                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm
   1+ 9A25              asm_mult12:
   2+ 9A25              RSequQmulA:
   3+ 9A25              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ 9A25 CD CD 98     	call APequQmulA
   5+ 9A28 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ 9A29 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ 9A2A 32 1F 7F     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ 9A2D 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ 9A2E 32 1E 7F     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ 9A31 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ 9A32 C9           	ret

  32+ 9AC3              ; Divide that sets value to FFFF if divide by 0 unless main value is 0, then 0
  33+ 9AC3
  34+ 9AC3              ; (P+1 A) = (A P) / Q
  35+ 9AC3              ;  B A    = (A P) / Q
  36+ 9AC3              ; TESTED OK

  39+ 9AC3 2A A6 C0     NormalizeXX15:          ld      hl, (XX15VecX)              ; h= VecX, l = VecY
  40+ 9AC6 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,  (XX15VecZ)              ; a = VecZ, d we don't care
  41+ 9AC9 E6 7F        .ABSZ:                  and     SignMask8Bit
  42+ 9ACB FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = abs z
  43+ 9ACD 57           .ZSquared:              ld      d,a
  44+ 9ACE 5F                                   ld      e,a
  45+ 9ACF ED 30                                mul     de
  46+ 9AD1 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; bc = z squared
  47+ 9AD3 7D           .ABSX:                  ld      a,l
  48+ 9AD4 E6 7F        .XSquared:              and     SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9AD6 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = abs x
  50+ 9AD8 57                                   ld      d,a
  51+ 9AD9 5F                                   ld      e,a
  52+ 9ADA ED 30                                mul     de
  53+ 9ADC EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = x squared
  54+ 9ADD 7A           .ABSY:                  ld      a,d                         ; as h was swapped into d
  55+ 9ADE E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  56+ 9AE0 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = abs y
  57+ 9AE2 5F           .YSquared:              ld      e,a
  58+ 9AE3 57                                   ld      d,a
  59+ 9AE4 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; de = y squared
  60+ 9AE6 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de + bc
  61+ 9AE7 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ;
  62+ 9AE8 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  63+ 9AE9 CD F6 92                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; d = iyl =hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
  64+ 9AEC 55                                   ld      d,l
  65+ 9AED FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d
  66+ 9AEF DD 7C        .NormaliseX:            ld      a,ixh                       ; normalise x
  67+ 9AF1 CD 15 98                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  68+ 9AF4 57                                   ld      d,a
  69+ 9AF5 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecX)
  70+ 9AF8 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  71+ 9AFA B2                                   or      d
  72+ 9AFB 32 A6 C0                             ld      (XX15VecX),a
  73+ 9AFE DD 7D        .NormaliseY:            ld      a,ixl                       ; normalise y
  74+ 9B00 55                                   ld      d,l
  75+ 9B01 CD 15 98                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  76+ 9B04 57                                   ld      d,a
  77+ 9B05 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecY)
  78+ 9B08 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  79+ 9B0A B2                                   or      d
  80+ 9B0B 32 A7 C0                             ld      (XX15VecY),a
  81+ 9B0E FD 7C        .NormaliseZ:            ld      a,iyh                       ; normalise z
  82+ 9B10 55                                   ld      d,l
  83+ 9B11 CD 15 98                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  84+ 9B14 57                                   ld      d,a
  85+ 9B15 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecZ)
  86+ 9B18 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  87+ 9B1A B2                                   or      d
  88+ 9B1B 32 A8 C0                             ld      (XX15VecZ),a
  89+ 9B1E C9                                   ret
  90+ 9B1F
  91+ 9B1F              TidyNormaliseNoseV:     MACRO
  92+ 9B1F ~                                    call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
  93+ 9B1F ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
  94+ 9B1F ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
  95+ 9B1F                                      ENDM
  96+ 9B1F              TidyNormaliseRoofV:     MACRO

  99+ 9B1F ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 100+ 9B1F                                      ENDM

 110+ 9B37 20 47                                jr      nz,.ProcessRoofZ            ; .

 178+ 9BC7 3A 38 C0     .ProcessRoofX:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; so we set Q to Nose Y

 209+ 9C11 CD 89 9A    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 210+ 9C14              ;...sidex = ((nosez * roofy) - nosey * roofz) / 96
 211+ 9C14 3A 3A C0     .DoSidevX:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)      ;  -(-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 212+ 9C17 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 213+ 9C19 32 1D 7F                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 214+ 9C1C 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	     ;roov z

 219+ 9C2B CD 95 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 220+ 9C2E CD 71 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 221+ 9C31 78                                   ld      a,b
 222+ 9C32 32 2A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 223+ 9C35              ;...sidey = ((nosex * roofz) - nosez * roofx) / 96
 224+ 9C35 3A 36 C0     .DoSidevY:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; -(-nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96

 226+ 9C3A 32 1D 7F                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 227+ 9C3D 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roov z
 228+ 9C40 CD 25 9A                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; rs = nosex * roofz

 244+ 9C6A 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 245+ 9C6D CD 95 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 246+ 9C70 CD 71 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 247+ 9C73 78                                   ld      a,b
 248+ 9C74 32 2E C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 249+ 9C77                                      ZeroA
 249+ 9C77 AF          >                        xor a
 250+ 9C78 32 29 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),a

 252+ 9C7E 32 2D C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),a

 254+ 9C82
 255+ 9C82
 256+ 9C82              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
 257+ 9C82              		; b = regX on entry
 258+ 9C82              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
 259+ 9C82 08           		ex		af,af'
 260+ 9C83 78           		ld		a,b
 261+ 9C84 32 1D 7F     		ld		(varQ),a
 262+ 9C87 08           		ex		af,af'
 263+ 9C88 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
 264+ 9C8A CD 73 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
 265+ 9C8D              ; USES 				A BC E
 266+ 9C8D              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
 267+ 9C8D              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
 268+ 9C8D 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
 269+ 9C8E E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
 270+ 9C90 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
 271+ 9C91 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
 272+ 9C92 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
 273+ 9C94 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
 274+ 9C96              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
 275+ 9C96 CB 27        		sla		a
 276+ 9C98              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
 276+ 9C98 FE 60       >                        cp      $60
 276+ 9C9A DA A7 9C    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
 277+ 9C9D DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
 278+ 9C9F 37           		scf
 279+ 9CA0 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
 280+ 9CA2 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
 281+ 9CA4              TIS1KIPCont:
 282+ 9CA4 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
 283+ 9CA5 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
 284+ 9CA6 C9           		ret
 285+ 9CA7              TIS1SkipSub:
 286+ 9CA7 B7           	or			a
 287+ 9CA8 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 288+ 9CAA 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 289+ 9CAC C3 A4 9C     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
 290+ 9CAF
 291+ 9CAF              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
 292+ 9CAF              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
 293+ 9CAF
 294+ 9CAF
 295+ 9CAF
 296+ 9CAF
 297+ 9CAF              TidyRotYSmall:
 298+ 9CAF CD D8 9D     		call	CalcRoofvZ
 299+ 9CB2 32 34 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
 300+ 9CB5 C3 E9 9C     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
 301+ 9CB8
 302+ 9CB8              TidyRotXSmall:
 303+ 9CB8 AF           		xor		a
 304+ 9CB9 47           		ld		b,a
 305+ 9CBA 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
 306+ 9CBD E6 60        		and		%01100000
 307+ 9CBF CA AF 9C     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
 308+ 9CC2 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 309+ 9CC5 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 310+ 9CC6 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 311+ 9CC9 CD 9E 9D     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
 312+ 9CCC 32 32 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
 313+ 9CCF C3 E9 9C     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
 314+ 9CD2              ; TIDY is broken
 315+ 9CD2
 316+ 9CD2
 317+ 9CD2              TIDY:
 318+ 9CD2
 319+ 9CD2              ORTHOGALISE:
 320+ 9CD2              ;-- NormaliseNosev
 321+ 9CD2 CD 33 9A     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
 322+ 9CD5 CD 52 96     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 323+ 9CD8 CD 6C 9A     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
 324+ 9CDB              .CheckNXSmall:
 325+ 9CDB 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 326+ 9CDE E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 327+ 9CE0 CA B8 9C     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 328+ 9CE3              .RotXIsBig:
 329+ 9CE3 CD 64 9D             call	CalcRoofvX
 330+ 9CE6 32 30 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 331+ 9CE9              NormaliseRoofV:
 332+ 9CE9 CD 46 9A     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 333+ 9CEC CD 52 96     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof
 334+ 9CEF              ;calc sidev x
 335+ 9CEF CD 89 9A     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 336+ 9CF2 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 337+ 9CF5 32 1D 7F     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 338+ 9CF8 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 339+ 9CFB CD 25 9A     		call	RSequQmulA
 340+ 9CFE 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 341+ 9D01 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 342+ 9D02 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 343+ 9D05 CD 82 9C     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 344+ 9D08                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 344+ 9D08 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 344+ 9D09 CA 0E 9D    >                        jp	    z, NormSideXNoNeg
 345+ 9D0C EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 346+ 9D0E              NormSideXNoNeg:
 347+ 9D0E 32 2A C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 348+ 9D11              ;calc sidev y
 349+ 9D11 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 350+ 9D14 32 1D 7F     		ld		(varQ),a
 351+ 9D17 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 352+ 9D1A CD 25 9A     		call	RSequQmulA
 353+ 9D1D 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 354+ 9D20 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 355+ 9D21 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 356+ 9D24 CD 82 9C     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 357+ 9D27                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 357+ 9D27 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 357+ 9D28 CA 2D 9D    >                        jp	    z, NormSideYNoNeg
 358+ 9D2B EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 359+ 9D2D              NormSideYNoNeg:
 360+ 9D2D 32 38 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 361+ 9D30              ;calc sidev z
 362+ 9D30 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 363+ 9D33 32 1D 7F     		ld		(varQ),a
 364+ 9D36 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 365+ 9D39 CD 25 9A     		call	RSequQmulA
 366+ 9D3C 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 367+ 9D3F 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now

 369+ 9D43 CD 82 9C     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 370+ 9D46                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg

 370+ 9D47 CA 4C 9D    >                        jp	    z, NormSideZNoNeg
 371+ 9D4A EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 372+ 9D4C              NormSideZNoNeg:
 373+ 9D4C 32 2C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 374+ 9D4F              .ClearLoBytes:
 375+ 9D4F 21 35 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ 9D52 06 09        		ld		b,9
 377+ 9D54 AF                   xor     a
 378+ 9D55              .ClearLoLoop:
 379+ 9D55 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 380+ 9D56 23           		inc		hl
 381+ 9D57 23           		inc		hl
 382+ 9D58 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 383+ 9D5A CD 59 9A     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 384+ 9D5D CD 52 96     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof
 385+ 9D60              ;calc sidev x
 386+ 9D60 CD A6 9A     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 387+ 9D63
 388+ 9D63 C9           		ret
 389+ 9D64
 390+ 9D64
 391+ 9D64              CalcRoofvX:
 392+ 9D64              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 393+ 9D64              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 393+ 9D64 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 393+ 9D67 32 1D 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 394+ 9D6A 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 395+ 9D6D CD 25 9A     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 396+ 9D70              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 396+ 9D70 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 396+ 9D73 32 1D 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 397+ 9D76 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 398+ 9D79 CD 73 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 399+ 9D7C 7A           		ld		a,d
 400+ 9D7D E6 80        		and 	$80
 401+ 9D7F FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 402+ 9D81              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 403+ 9D81 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 404+ 9D84 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 405+ 9D85 E6 80        		and		$80
 406+ 9D87 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 407+ 9D89 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 408+ 9D8B 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 409+ 9D8C E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 410+ 9D8E 42           		ld		b,d
 411+ 9D8F 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 412+ 9D90 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 413+ 9D91 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 414+ 9D93 CD 31 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 415+ 9D96 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 416+ 9D98 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 417+ 9D9A E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 418+ 9D9C B0           		or		b
 419+ 9D9D C9           		ret
 420+ 9D9E
 421+ 9D9E
 422+ 9D9E              CalcRoofvY:
 423+ 9D9E              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 424+ 9D9E              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 424+ 9D9E 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 424+ 9DA1 32 1D 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 425+ 9DA4 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 426+ 9DA7 CD 25 9A     		call	RSequQmulA
 427+ 9DAA              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 427+ 9DAA 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 427+ 9DAD 32 1D 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 428+ 9DB0 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 429+ 9DB3 CD 73 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 430+ 9DB6 7A           		ld		a,d
 431+ 9DB7 E6 80        		and 	$80
 432+ 9DB9 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 433+ 9DBB 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 434+ 9DBE 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 435+ 9DBF E6 80        		and		$80
 436+ 9DC1 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 437+ 9DC3 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 438+ 9DC5 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 439+ 9DC6 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 440+ 9DC8 42           		ld		b,d
 441+ 9DC9 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 442+ 9DCA 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 443+ 9DCB 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 444+ 9DCD CD 31 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 445+ 9DD0 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 446+ 9DD2 EE 80        		xor		$80
 447+ 9DD4 E6 80        		and		$80
 448+ 9DD6 B0           		or		b
 449+ 9DD7 C9           		ret
 450+ 9DD8
 451+ 9DD8              CalcRoofvZ:
 452+ 9DD8              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 453+ 9DD8              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 453+ 9DD8 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 453+ 9DDB 32 1D 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 454+ 9DDE 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 455+ 9DE1 CD 25 9A     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 456+ 9DE4              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 456+ 9DE4 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 456+ 9DE7 32 1D 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 457+ 9DEA 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 458+ 9DED CD 73 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 459+ 9DF0 7A           		ld		a,d
 460+ 9DF1 E6 80        		and 	$80
 461+ 9DF3 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 462+ 9DF5 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 463+ 9DF8 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 464+ 9DF9 E6 80        		and		$80
 465+ 9DFB FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 466+ 9DFD FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 467+ 9DFF 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 468+ 9E00 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 469+ 9E02 42           		ld		b,d
 470+ 9E03 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 471+ 9E04 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 472+ 9E05 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 473+ 9E07 CD 31 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 474+ 9E0A FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 475+ 9E0C EE 80        		xor		$80
 476+ 9E0E E6 80        		and		$80
 477+ 9E10 B0           		or		b
 478+ 9E11 C9           		ret

 612  9E12                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ 9E12
   2+ 9E12              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ 9E12 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ 9E13 D2 31 9E    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ 9E16 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ 9E18 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ 9E1A 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ 9E1C                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ 9E1C BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ 9E1D DA 22 9E    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ 9E20 92                                   sub     d
   8+ 9E21                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ 9E21 B7          >                        or a
   9+ 9E22 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ 9E23 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ 9E25 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ 9E27 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ 9E28 C9                                   ret
  14+ 9E29 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ 9E2A 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ 9E2B CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ 9E2D 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ 9E2F 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ 9E30 C9                                   ret
  20+ 9E31 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ 9E33 C9                                   ret
  22+ 9E34
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
 613  9E34                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ 9E34              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ 9E34              TIS1:
   3+ 9E34 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ 9E35 3A 02 7E     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ 9E38 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ 9E39 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ 9E3A              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ 9E3A 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ 9E3B 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ 9E3C 32 1D 7F     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ 9E3F 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ 9E40 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ 9E42 CD 73 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ 9E45              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ 9E45              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ 9E45              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ 9E45 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ 9E46 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ 9E48 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ 9E49 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ 9E4A E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ 9E4C 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ 9E4E 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ 9E4F              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ 9E4F CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ 9E51 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ 9E53 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ 9E55 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ 9E57              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ 9E57 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ 9E59 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ 9E5B 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ 9E5C B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ 9E5D C9           		ret
  35+ 9E5E
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

  42+ 9E76                                     ; This shoudl be a call nz to tidy *****ret     nz
  43+ 9E76 3E 10                               ld      a,16
  44+ 9E78 32 D8 66                            ld      (TidyCounter),a
  45+ 9E7B                                     ;call    TidyUbnK
  46+ 9E7B                                     ; add AI in here too
  47+ 9E7B 3A 45 C3                            ld       a,(ShipTypeAddr)

  48+ 9E7E FE 0A       >                        cp    ShipAiJumpTableMax
  48+ 9E80 D0          >                        ret	 nc
  49+ 9E81 21 5E 9E                            ld       hl,ShipAIJumpTable
  50+ 9E84 ED 31                               add      hl,a
  51+ 9E86 ED 31                               add      hl,a
  52+ 9E88 7E                                  ld       a,(hl)                                  ; contrary to the name
  53+ 9E89 23                                  inc      hl                                      ; jp (hl) is really
  54+ 9E8A 66                                  ld       h,(hl)                                  ; jp hl
  55+ 9E8B 6F                                  ld       l,a                                     ;
  56+ 9E8C E9                                  jp       hl                                      ; Follow the AI Jump Table
  57+ 9E8D C9                                  ret                                              ; not needed as jp handles this

  59+ 9E8E
  60+ 9E8E

  69+ 9E93              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  70+ 9E93              CalculateAgression:     IFDEF   ALWAYSANGRY
  71+ 9E93 ~                                        jp  UltraHostile
  72+ 9E93                                      ENDIF
  73+ 9E93 3A 47 C3                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
  74+ 9E96 47                                   ld      b,a
  75+ 9E97 E6 02                                and     %00000010
  76+ 9E99 20 20                                jr      nz,.UltraHostile
  77+ 9E9B 78                                   ld      a,b
  78+ 9E9C E6 F0                                and     %11110000                               ; if it can can anger a fighter bay then generally more hostile as implies its a large ship
  79+ 9E9E 21 5C C0                             ld      hl,UBnKMissilesLeft                     ; more missiles more agression
  80+ 9EA1 B6                                   or      (hl)
  81+ 9EA2 47                                   ld      b,a
  82+ 9EA3 3A 46 C3                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  83+ 9EA6 E6 4E                                and     %01001110                               ; We look at if its a bounty hunter, hostile already, pirate and cop
  84+ 9EA8 B0                                   or      b
  85+ 9EA9 47                                   ld      b,a
  86+ 9EAA 3A 53 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKShipAggression)
  87+ 9EAD                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64,.NotAlreadyAgressive
  87+ 9EAD FE 40       >                        cp      64
  87+ 9EAF DA B6 9E    >                        jp		c, .NotAlreadyAgressive
  88+ 9EB2 78                                   ld      a,b
  89+ 9EB3 F6 80                                or      %10000000                               ; if its already at least 64 agressive then likley to stay so
  90+ 9EB5 47                                   ld      b,a
  91+ 9EB6 78           .NotAlreadyAgressive:   ld      a,b
  92+ 9EB7 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  93+ 9EBA C9                                   ret
  94+ 9EBB 3E FF        .UltraHostile:          ld      a,$FF
  95+ 9EBD 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  96+ 9EC0 C9                                   ret
  97+ 9EC1              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  98+ 9EC1              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
  99+ 9EC1 3A 46 C3     MakeHostile:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags
 100+ 9EC4                                      ;break
 101+ 9EC4                                      JumpIfMemEqNusng ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeStation, .SetNewbHostile
 101+ 9EC4 3A 45 C3    >                        ld  a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 101+ 9EC7 FE 02       >                        cp  ShipTypeStation
 101+ 9EC9 CA E8 9E    >                        jp  z,.SetNewbHostile
 102+ 9ECC E6 20        .ItsNotAStation:        and     ShipIsBystander                         ; check if space station present if its a bystander
 103+ 9ECE C4 22 9F                             call    nz, SetStationHostile                   ; Set Space Station if present, Angry
 104+ 9ED1 3A 54 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                        ; get AI data
 105+ 9ED4                                      ReturnOnBitClear a, ShipAIEnabledBitNbr         ; if 0 then no AI attached so it can't get angry
 105+ 9ED4 CB 7F       >                        bit 	ShipAIEnabledBitNbr,a
 105+ 9ED6 C8          >                        ret		z
 106+ 9ED7 4F                                   ld      c,a                                     ; Copy to c in case we need it later
 107+ 9ED8                                      SetMemToN UBnKAccel, 2                          ; set accelleration to 2 to speed up
 107+ 9ED8 3E 02       >                        ld      a,2
 107+ 9EDA 32 47 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 108+ 9EDD CB 27                                sla     a                                       ; set pitch to 4
 109+ 9EDF 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                     ; .
 110+ 9EE2 3A 47 C3                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
 111+ 9EE5                                      ReturnIfBitMaskClear ShipCanAnger
 111+ 9EE5 E6 80       >                        and     ShipCanAnger
 111+ 9EE7 C8          >                        ret     z
 112+ 9EE8 CD 52 C5     .SetNewbHostile:        call    SetShipHostile
 113+ 9EEB C9                                   ret

 165+ 9F54              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 166+ 9F54              CheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
 167+ 9F54 ~                                    ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
 168+ 9F54 ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipSign)
 169+ 9F54 ~                                    xor     (hl)
 170+ 9F54 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
 171+ 9F54 ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipPos)
 172+ 9F54 ~                                    ld      de,(MissilePos)
 173+ 9F54 ~                                    jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
 174+ 9F54 ~            .XSame:                 and     a
 175+ 9F54 ~                                    sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 176+ 9F54 ~                                    JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 177+ 9F54 ~                                    NegHL
 178+ 9F54 ~                                    jp      .CheckDiff
 179+ 9F54 ~            .SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 180+ 9F54 ~                                    ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 181+ 9F54 ~            .CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 182+ 9F54 ~                                    ReturnIfANotZero
 183+ 9F54 ~                                    ld      a,l
 184+ 9F54 ~                                    and     a
 185+ 9F54 ~                                    ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 186+ 9F54                                      ENDM

 188+ 9F54              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work

 190+ 9F57 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize

 111++A1D0
 112++A1D0 47                                   ld      b,a
 113++A1D1 CD 60 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 114++A1D4 22 91 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl

 116++A1DA              ; by here missile in in memory and TacticsVector now holds distance
 117++A1DA              ; if or ABS all high bytes is <> 0
 118++A1DA              .CheckDistance:         IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
 119++A1DA 2A 8A A0                                 ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX+1)              ; test if high bytes are set (value is assumed to be 24 bit, though calcs are only 16 so this is uneeded)
 120++A1DD 7C                                       ld      a,h                                ; .
 121++A1DE ED 5B 8E A0                              ld      de,(TacticsVectorY+1)              ; .
 122++A1E2 B2                                       or      d                                  ; .
 123++A1E3 ED 4B 92 A0                              ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ+1)              ; .
 124++A1E7 B0                                       or      b                                  ; .
 125++A1E8                                          ClearSignBitA                              ; .
 125++A1E8 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 126++A1EA                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 126++A1EA C2 F9 A1    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 127++A1ED B5                                       or      l                                    ; test for low byte bit 7, i.e high of 16 bit values
 128++A1EE B3                                       or      e                                  ; .
 129++A1EF B1                                       or      c                                  ; .
 130++A1F0                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 130++A1F0 C2 F9 A1    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 131++A1F3                                      ELSE
 132++A1F3 ~                                        jp                  .FarAway
 133++A1F3                                      ENDIF
 134++A1F3              ; If we get here its close enough to detonate
 135++A1F3 3A 45 C0     .CloseMissileExplode:   ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)
 136++A1F6 C3 15 9F                             jp      MissileHitShipA
 137++A1F9              ;   *far away ** TODO need to set memory read write on page 0
 138++A1F9              .FarAway:               SelectTargetBank
 138++A1F9 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
 138++A1FB             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 138++A1FB ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 139++A1FE                                      JumpIfMemFalse      UBnKECMFitted, .NoECM                   ; if target has ECM and enough energy to use it
 139++A1FE 3A 5A C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKECMFitted)
 139++A201 A7          >                        and     a
 139++A202 C2 1F A2    >                        jp      nz, .NoECM
 140++A205                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng    UBnKEnergy,    ECMCounterMax, .NoECM    ; .
 140++A205 3A 58 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 140++A208 FE 80       >                        cp      ECMCounterMax
 140++A20A DA 1F A2    >                        jp	  c,.NoECM
 141++A20D                                      JumpIfMemIsNotZero   ECMCountDown, .NoECM                ; . ECM is already active
 141++A20D 3A 2D 7E    >                        ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 141++A210 A7          >                        and     a
 141++A211 C2 1F A2    >                        jp	    nz,.NoECM
 142++A214 3A 10 7E     .TestIfUsingECM:        ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                                             ; if random < 16
 143++A217                                      JumpIfAGTENusng     16, .UpdateMissilePos                           ;   then fire ECM destroying missile
 143++A217 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 143++A219 D2 1F A2    >                        jp		nc,.UpdateMissilePos
 144++A21C              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in to fire ECM
 145++A21C C3 7A C5     .ZeroPageFireECM:       jp      FireECM                                             ; with an implicit return
 146++A21F              ;                       implicit ret
 147++A21F              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in with no ECM
 148++A21F              .NoECM:
 149++A21F                                    ;;;         ** can do 16 bit maths as we can take teh view that once a object/space station is 24 bit value away then
 150++A21F                                    ;;;         ** targeting computer looses track and destructs missiles
 151++A21F              ;--- Now we can actually update the missile AI
 152++A21F              .UpdateMissilePos:      ;break
 153++A21F                                      SelectMissileBank
 153++A21F FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 153++A221             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 153++A221 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 154++A224                                      ;break
 155++A224                                      ;call    ORTHOGALISE
 156++A224              .NormaliseDirection:    IFDEF MISSILEBREAK
 157++A224 ~                                        break
 158++A224                                      ENDIF
 159++A224 CD 89 A7                             call    NormalizeTactics                    ; Normalise vector down to 7 bit + sign byte (.TA19->TAS2)
 160++A227                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 161++A227 CD 50 A6                                 call DebugTacticsCopy
 162++A22A                                      ENDIF
 163++A22A              .NegateDirection:       FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 163++A22A 3A 8B A0    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 163++A22D EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 163++A22F 32 8B A0    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 164++A232                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 164++A232 3A 8F A0    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 164++A235 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++A237 32 8F A0    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 165++A23A                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 165++A23A 3A 93 A0    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 165++A23D EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++A23F 32 93 A0    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 166++A242 CD 59 A2                             call    SeekingLogic
 167++A245 C9                                   ret
 168++A246 3A EF 7F     .ProcessMissileHit:     ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 169++A249                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng UniverseSlotListSize  ; need to wait another loop
 169++A249 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 169++A24B D0          >                        ret	 nc
 170++A24C C3 3A 9F     .ActivateNewExplosion:  jp  CheckMissileBlastInit               ; initialise
 171++A24F                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return by using jp
 172++A24F CD 63 C6     .ECMIsActive:           call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; ECM detonates missile
 173++A252                                      SetMemTrue  UBnKMissleHitToProcess      ; Enque an explosion
 173++A252 AF          >                        xor     a
 173++A253 32 44 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 174++A256 C3 46 A2                             jp      .ProcessMissileHit              ; lets see if we can enqueue now
 175++A259                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return as activenewexplosion does jp to init with a free ret
 176++A259
 177++A259 CD 95 A6     SeekingLogic:           call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 178++A25C 32 4C A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 179++A25F 3A 1F 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 180++A262 32 50 A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A265 CD EB A6     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 182++A268 32 4F A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 183++A26B 3A 1F 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 184++A26E 32 50 A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 185++A271 CD 7B A2                             call    SimplifiedShipPitchv3
 186++A274 CD 9F A2                             call    SimplifiedShipRollv3
 187++A277 CD CD A2                             call    SimplifiedShipSpeedv3
 188++A27A C9                                   ret
 189++A27B
 190++A27B              SimplifiedShipPitchv3:  ;break
 191++A27B 2A 4F A0                             ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 192++A27E 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 193++A27F EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 194++A281 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 195++A283 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 196++A284 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 197++A285 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 198++A287                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 198++A287 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 198++A289 D2 95 A2    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 199++A28C                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 199++A28C AF          >                        xor a
 200++A28D B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 201++A28E 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 202++A291                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 203++A291 32 DC A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 204++A294                                      ENDIF
 205++A294 C9                                   ret
 206++A295 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 207++A297 B4                                   or      h
 208++A298 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 209++A29B                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 210++A29B 32 DC A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 211++A29E                                      ENDIF
 212++A29E C9                                   ret
 213++A29F
 214++A29F              ;Direct on dot product nose is $24
 215++A29F              ; Position                  Pitch   Roll    Speed
 216++A29F              ; Top left forwards         up      -ve     +
 217++A29F              ; Top right forwards        up      +ve     +
 218++A29F              ; Bottom left forwards      down    -ve     +
 219++A29F              ; Bottom right forwards     down    +ve     +
 220++A29F              ; Top left rear             up      -ve     -
 221++A29F              ; Top right rear            up      +ve     -
 222++A29F              ; Bottom left rear          down    -ve     -
 223++A29F              ; Bottom right rear         down    +ve     -
 224++A29F
 225++A29F
 226++A29F
 227++A29F              SimplifiedShipRollv3:  ; ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)               ; get current roll
 228++A29F                                     ; sla     a                                 ; * 2 to also abs
 229++A29F                                     ; ReturnIfAGTENusng 32                      ; and so if >32 skip
 230++A29F CD F1 A6                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 231++A2A2 32 52 A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 232++A2A5 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 233++A2A6 3A 1F 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 234++A2A9 32 53 A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 235++A2AC 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 236++A2AD 3A 50 A0                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 237++A2B0                                      ;xor     $80                               ; .
 238++A2B0                                      ;xor     h                                 ; b = flip against pitch sign
 239++A2B0                                      ;and     $80                               ; .
 240++A2B0                                      ;xor $80
 241++A2B0 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 242++A2B1 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 243++A2B2 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 244++A2B4                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 244++A2B4 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 244++A2B6 D2 C2 A2    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 245++A2B9                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 245++A2B9 AF          >                        xor a
 246++A2BA B0                                   or      b
 247++A2BB 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a

 261++A2CD 2A 4C A0     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3:  ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 262++A2D0 7C                                   ld      a,h
 263++A2D1 A7                                   and     a
 264++A2D2 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 265++A2D4 ED 5B 4F A0                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 266++A2D8 7D                                   ld      a,l
 267++A2D9                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 267++A2D9 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 267++A2DB DA E7 A2    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 268++A2DE 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 269++A2E0 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 270++A2E3                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 271++A2E3 32 DE A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 272++A2E6                                      ENDIF
 273++A2E6 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 274++A2E7              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 274++A2E7 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 274++A2E9 DA F5 A2    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 275++A2EC 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 276++A2EE 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 277++A2F1                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 278++A2F1 32 DE A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 279++A2F4                                      ENDIF
 280++A2F4 C9                                   ret
 281++A2F5              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 281++A2F5 AF          >                        xor a
 282++A2F6 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 283++A2F9                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 284++A2F9 32 DE A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 285++A2FC                                      ENDIF

 293++A304 20 08                                jr      nz,.NotSlow

 295++A307                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 30, .NotSlow
 295++A307 FE 1E       >                        cp     30

 297++A30E 2A 4C A0     .NotSlow:               ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)             ; if nosedir is negative (pointing the wrong way)
 298++A311 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; or nosedir < 22 (very far off)
 299++A312 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; do decelleration test
 300++A314 C2 25 A3                             jp      nz,.DecelTest                       ; .
 301++A317 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ; .
 302++A318                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .DecelTest                ; .
 302++A318 B8          >                        cp      b
 302++A319 DA 25 A3    >                        jp		c, .DecelTest
 303++A31C 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else

 306++A321 32 DE A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 307++A324                                      ENDIF
 308++A324 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 309++A325 7D           .DecelTest:             ld      a,l                                 ; if abs acelleration > 18
 310++A326                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 18 ,.Deccelerate             ;    decelerate by 2
 310++A326 FE 12       >                        cp     18
 310++A328 D2 33 A3    >                        jp		nc,.Deccelerate

 321++A33B                                      ENDIF

 327++A347 7C                                   ld      a,h

 329++A34A 67                                   ld      h,a
 330++A34B 78                                   ld      a,b
 331++A34C E6 7F                                and     $7F
 332++A34E 47                                   ld      b,a
 333++A34F 7A                                   ld      a,d
 334++A350 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 335++A352 57                                   ld      d,a
 336++A353 09                                   add     hl,bc
 337++A354 19                                   add     hl,de
 338++A355                                      ShiftHLRight1

 338++A357 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 339++A359                                      ShiftHLRight1

 167++A51D CD 25 A5                             call    ShipSeekingLogic            ;    seek as per missile
 168++A520 C9                                   ret
 169++A521 CD 25 A5     .ShipTurnAway:          call    ShipSeekingLogic            ; move away (ie.. as per missile but dot products not reversed)
 170++A524                                      ;              consider a random roll
 171++A524 C9                                   ret
 172++A525
 173++A525 CD 95 A6     ShipSeekingLogic:       call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 174++A528 32 4C A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 175++A52B 3A 1F 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 176++A52E 32 50 A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 177++A531 CD EB A6     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 178++A534 32 4F A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 179++A537 3A 1F 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 180++A53A 32 50 A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A53D CD 47 A5                             call    ShipPitchv3
 182++A540 CD 6B A5                             call    ShipRollv3
 183++A543 CD 99 A5                             call    ShipSpeedv3
 184++A546 C9                                   ret
 185++A547
 186++A547 2A 4F A0     ShipPitchv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 187++A54A 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 188++A54B EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 189++A54D E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 190++A54F 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 191++A550 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 192++A551 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 193++A553                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 193++A553 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 193++A555 D2 61 A5    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 194++A558                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 194++A558 AF          >                        xor a
 195++A559 B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 196++A55A 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 197++A55D                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 198++A55D 32 DC A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 199++A560                                      ENDIF
 200++A560 C9                                   ret
 201++A561 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 202++A563 B4                                   or      h
 203++A564 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 204++A567                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 205++A567 32 DC A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 206++A56A                                      ENDIF
 207++A56A C9                                   ret
 208++A56B
 209++A56B CD F1 A6     ShipRollv3:             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 210++A56E 32 52 A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 211++A571 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 212++A572 3A 1F 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 213++A575 32 53 A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 214++A578 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 215++A579 3A 50 A0                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 216++A57C 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 217++A57D 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 218++A57E CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 219++A580                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 219++A580 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 219++A582 D2 8E A5    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 220++A585                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 220++A585 AF          >                        xor a
 221++A586 B0                                   or      b
 222++A587 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 223++A58A                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 224++A58A 32 DA A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 225++A58D                                      ENDIF
 226++A58D C9                                   ret
 227++A58E 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 228++A590 B4                                   or      h
 229++A591 A8                                   xor     b
 230++A592 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 231++A595                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 232++A595 32 DA A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 233++A598                                      ENDIF
 234++A598 C9                                   ret
 235++A599
 236++A599 2A 4C A0     ShipSpeedv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 237++A59C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 238++A59D A7                                   and     a
 239++A59E 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 240++A5A0 ED 5B 4F A0                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 241++A5A4 7D                                   ld      a,l
 242++A5A5                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 242++A5A5 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 242++A5A7 DA B3 A5    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 243++A5AA 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 244++A5AC 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 245++A5AF                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 246++A5AF 32 DE A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 247++A5B2                                      ENDIF
 248++A5B2 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 249++A5B3              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 249++A5B3 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 249++A5B5 DA C1 A5    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 250++A5B8 3E FF        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 251++A5BA 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 252++A5BD                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 253++A5BD 32 DE A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 254++A5C0                                      ENDIF
 255++A5C0 C9                                   ret
 256++A5C1              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 256++A5C1 AF          >                        xor a
 257++A5C2 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 258++A5C5                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 259++A5C5 32 DE A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 260++A5C8                                      ENDIF
 261++A5C8 C9                                   ret
 262++A5C9              ;;;ShipPitchv2:  ;break
 263++A5C9              ;;;                        ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 264++A5C9              ;;;                        ld      a,h                                ; .
 265++A5C9              ;;;                        xor     $80                                ; .
 266++A5C9              ;;;                        and     $80                                ; .
 267++A5C9              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 268++A5C9              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 269++A5C9              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 270++A5C9              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 271++A5C9              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 272++A5C9              ;;;                        or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 273++A5C9              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 274++A5C9              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 275++A5C9              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 276++A5C9              ;;;                        ENDIF
 277++A5C9              ;;;                        ret
 278++A5C9              ;;;.skipPitchZero:         ld      a,3
 279++A5C9              ;;;                        or      h
 280++A5C9              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 281++A5C9              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 282++A5C9              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 283++A5C9              ;;;                        ENDIF
 284++A5C9              ;;;                        ret
 285++A5C9
 286++A5C9

 372++A5C9              ;;;                        ENDIF

 374++A5C9              ;;;
 375++A5C9              ;;;
 376++A5C9              ;;;                        ;

 378++A5C9              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .

 380++A5C9              ;;;                        ld      a,(varS)                           ; .

 383++A5C9              ;;;                        ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign

 393++A5C9              ;;;                        ENDIF

 399++A5C9              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG

 401++A5C9              ;;;                        ENDIF
 402++A5C9              ;;;                        ret
 403++A5C9              ;;;

 266+ A5C9
 267+ A5C9              ; On Entry A = TacticsDotProduct2 sign (i.e. roof direction)
 268+ A5C9              ; on exit a == new roll
 269+ A5C9 EE 80        calcNPitch:             xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; c = sign flipped of dot product only
 270+ A5CB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; .
 271+ A5CD 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; . (varT in effect)
 272+ A5CE F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH                 ; a = flipped sign max pitch
 273+ A5D0 3A 49 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; b = abs (currentz pitch)
 274+ A5D3 C9                                   ret
 275+ A5D4
 276+ A5D4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; . which will initially be 0
 277+ A5D6 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 278+ A5D7 3A 4F A0                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; a = abs roof dot product
 279+ A5DA                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXPITCH+1, .calcNPitch2    ; if a >= roll threshold
 279+ A5DA FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXPITCH+1
 279+ A5DC DA E9 A5    >                        jp		c, .calcNPitch2
 280+ A5DF 78                                   ld      a,b
 281+ A5E0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 282+ A5E2                                      ;jr      z,.NPitchPositive
 283+ A5E2                                     ; ld      a,
 284+ A5E2 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXPITCH                         ;    z rot = z rot * dot product flipped sign
 285+ A5E4 B1                                   or      c                               ;    i.e. zrot = current magnitude but dot product sign flipped
 286+ A5E5 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;    .
 287+ A5E8 C9                                   ret                                     ; else (a LT current abs z)
 288+ A5E9 B1           .calcNPitch2:           or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 289+ A5EA 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;
 290+ A5ED C9                                   ret                                     ;
 291+ A5EE
 292+ A5EE 3A 49 C0     calcNRoll:              ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
 293+ A5F1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 294+ A5F3 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; flip sign of dot product
 295+ A5F5 F6 05                                or      5
 296+ A5F7 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 297+ A5FA C9                                   ret
 298+ A5FB
 299+ A5FB 4F                                   ld      c,a
 300+ A5FC F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH
 301+ A5FE 3A 48 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
 302+ A601 C9                                   ret
 303+ A602
 304+ A602
 305+ A602
 306+ A602 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; get ABS value
 307+ A604 47                                   ld      b,a
 308+ A605 3A 4F A0                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; now we have the dot product abs value
 309+ A608                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXROLL+1, .calcNRoll2
 309+ A608 FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXROLL+1
 309+ A60A DA 14 A6    >                        jp		c, .calcNRoll2
 310+ A60D 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXROLL
 311+ A60F B1                                   or      c
 312+ A610 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 313+ A613 C9                                   ret
 314+ A614 B1           .calcNRoll2:            or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 315+ A615 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 316+ A618 C9                                   ret
 317+ A619
 318+ A619
 319+ A619 21 2A C0     CopyRotSideToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX+1
 320+ A61C C3 28 A6                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 321+ A61F
 322+ A61F 21 36 C0     CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
 323+ A622 C3 28 A6                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 324+ A625
 325+ A625 21 30 C0     CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1
 326+ A628              ; Coy rotation matrix high byte to trans rot mat, strip off sign and separate to rotmat byte 2
 327+ A628 11 6D A0     CopyRotmatToTacticsMat: ld      de,TacticsRotMatX
 328+ A62B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of x
 329+ A62C 47                                   ld      b,a
 330+ A62D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 331+ A62F 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 332+ A630 13                                   inc     de
 333+ A631 78                                   ld      a,b
 334+ A632 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 335+ A634 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 336+ A635 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 337+ A636 23                                   inc     hl
 338+ A637 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of y
 339+ A638 7E           .processYElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of y
 340+ A639 47                                   ld      b,a
 341+ A63A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 342+ A63C 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 343+ A63D 13                                   inc     de
 344+ A63E 78                                   ld      a,b
 345+ A63F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 346+ A641 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 347+ A642 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 348+ A643 23                                   inc     hl
 349+ A644 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of z
 350+ A645 7E           .ProcessZElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of z
 351+ A646 47                                   ld      b,a
 352+ A647 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 353+ A649 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 354+ A64A 13                                   inc     de
 355+ A64B 78                                   ld      a,b
 356+ A64C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 357+ A64E 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 358+ A64F C9                                   ret
