 381+ A68E ED 43 D1 A0                          ld      (TacticsNoseZ),bc
 382+ A692
 383+ A692 C9                                   ret
 384+ A693                                      ENDIF
 385+ A693
 386+ A693 00 00        TacticsVarResult        DW 0
 387+ A695 CD 1F A6     XX12EquTacticsDotNosev: call    CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat
 388+ A698 21 6D A0     XX12EquTacticsDotHL:    ld      hl,TacticsRotMatX; UBnkTransmatNosevX    ; ROTMATX HI
 389+ A69B 7E           .CalcXValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; DE = RotMatX & Vect X
 390+ A69C 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 391+ A69D 3A 89 A0                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX)                  ; .
 392+ A6A0 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 393+ A6A1 ED 30                                mul                                         ; .
 394+ A6A3 7A                                   ld      a,d                                 ; S = A = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X)
 395+ A6A4 32 1F 7F                             ld      (varS),a                            ; .
 396+ A6A7 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 397+ A6A8 3A 8B A0     .CalcXSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)                ; B  = A = Sign VecX xor sign RotMatX
 398+ A6AB AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ; .
 399+ A6AC 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; .
 400+ A6AD 23           .MoveToY:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Y component
 401+ A6AE 7E           .CalcYValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y)
 402+ A6AF 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 403+ A6B0 3A 8D A0                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY)                  ; .
 404+ A6B3 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 405+ A6B4 ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 406+ A6B6 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 407+ A6B7 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 408+ A6B9 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 409+ A6BA 3A 8F A0     .CalcYSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)                ; c = sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 410+ A6BD AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ;
 411+ A6BE 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
 412+ A6BF 23           .MoveToZ:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Z component
 413+ A6C0 E5           .AddXandY:              push    hl                                  ; but save HL as we need that
 414+ A6C1 3A 1F 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; hl = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X) b= sign
 415+ A6C4 26 00                                ld      h,0                                 ; de = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y) c= sign
 416+ A6C6 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ;
 417+ A6C7 CD 60 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; a(sign) hl = sum
 418+ A6CA 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; b = sign of result
 419+ A6CB 22 93 A6                             ld      (TacticsVarResult),hl               ; save sub in TacticsVarResult
 420+ A6CE E1           .CalcZValue:            pop     hl                                  ; get back to the rotation mat z
 421+ A6CF 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatZ & Vect Z)
 422+ A6D0 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 423+ A6D1 3A 91 A0                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ)                  ; .
 424+ A6D4 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 425+ A6D5 ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 426+ A6D7 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 427+ A6D8 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 428+ A6DA 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 429+ A6DB 3A 93 A0     .CalcZSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 430+ A6DE AE                                   xor     (hl)
 431+ A6DF 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; Set C to the sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 432+ A6E0 2A 93 A6                             ld      hl, (TacticsVarResult)              ; CHL = x + y, BDE = z products
 433+ A6E3 CD 60 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; so AHL = X y z products
 434+ A6E6 32 1F 7F                             ld      (varS),a                            ; for backwards compatibility
 435+ A6E9 7D                                   ld      a,l                                  ; .
 436+ A6EA C9                                   ret
 437+ A6EB
 438+ A6EB CD 25 A6     XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv: call    CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat
 439+ A6EE C3 98 A6                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 440+ A6F1
 441+ A6F1 CD 19 A6     XX12EquTacticsDotSidev: call    CopyRotSideToTacticsMat
 442+ A6F4 C3 98 A6                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 443+ A6F7
 444+ A6F7 21 20 C0     CopyToTargetVector:     ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 445+ A6FA 11 79 A0                             ld      de,TacticsTargetX
 446+ A6FD 01 09 00                             ld      bc,9
 447+ A700 ED B0                                ldir
 448+ A702 C9                                   ret
 449+ A703
 450+ A703 2A 20 C0     CopyPosToVector:        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
 451+ A706 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 452+ A709                                      ;xor     $80
 453+ A709 22 89 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 454+ A70C 32 8B A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 455+ A70F
 456+ A70F 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 457+ A712 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 458+ A715                                      ;xor     $80
 459+ A715 22 8D A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 460+ A718 32 8F A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 461+ A71B
 462+ A71B 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
 463+ A71E 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 464+ A721                                      ;xor     $80
 465+ A721 22 91 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 466+ A724 32 93 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 467+ A727 C9                                   ret
 468+ A728
 469+ A728              SetPlayerAsTarget:      ZeroA
 469+ A728 AF          >                        xor a
 470+ A729 21 79 A0                             ld      hl,TacticsTargetX
 471+ A72C 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 472+ A72E 77           .ZeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a                              ; player is always at 0,0,0
 473+ A72F 23                                   inc     hl
 474+ A730 10 FC                                djnz    .ZeroLoop
 475+ A732 C9                                   ret
 476+ A733
 477+ A733 CD 28 A7     CalcVectorToMyShip:     call    SetPlayerAsTarget
 478+ A736 CD 03 A7                             call    CopyPosToVector
 479+ A739                                      ;call    CopyToTargetVector
 480+ A739                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetX+2
 481+ A739                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetY+2
 482+ A739                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetZ+2
 483+ A739 C9                                   ret
 484+ A73A
 485+ A73A ED 5B 79 A0  CalcTargetVector:       ld      de,(TacticsTargetX)                        ; get target ship X
 486+ A73E 3A 7B A0                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetX+2)                       ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
 487+ A741                                      FlipSignBitA
 487+ A741 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 488+ A743 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 489+ A744 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
 490+ A747 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 491+ A74A 47                                   ld      b,a
 492+ A74B CD 60 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 493+ A74E 22 89 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 494+ A751 32 8B A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 495+ A754 ED 5B 7C A0  .UpdateTargetingShipY:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetY)
 496+ A758 3A 7E A0                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetY+2)
 497+ A75B                                      FlipSignBitA
 497+ A75B EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 498+ A75D 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 499+ A75E 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)                        ; get missile x
 500+ A761 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 501+ A764 47                                   ld      b,a
 502+ A765 CD 60 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 503+ A768 22 8D A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 504+ A76B 32 8F A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 505+ A76E ED 5B 7F A0  .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetZ)
 506+ A772 3A 81 A0                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetZ+2)
 507+ A775                                      FlipSignBitA
 507+ A775 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 508+ A777 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 509+ A778 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 510+ A77B 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 511+ A77E 47                                   ld      b,a
 512+ A77F CD 60 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 513+ A782 22 91 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 514+ A785 32 93 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 515+ A788 C9                                   ret
 516+ A789
 517+ A789              ;-- Now its scaled we can normalise
 518+ A789              ;-- Scale down so that h d &b are zero, then do once again so l e and c are 7 bit
 519+ A789              ;-- use 7 bit mul96 to ensure we don;t get odd maths
 520+ A789 2A 89 A0     NormalizeTactics:       ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 521+ A78C ED 5B 8D A0                          ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 522+ A790 ED 4B 91 A0                          ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 523+ A794 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h
 524+ A795 B2                                   or      d
 525+ A796 B0                                   or      b
 526+ A797 28 0F                                jr      z,.DoneScaling
 527+ A799                                      ShiftHLRight1
 527+ A799 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 527+ A79B CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 528+ A79D                                      ShiftDERight1
 528+ A79D CB 3A       >			   srl d
 528+ A79F CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 529+ A7A1                                      ShiftBCRight1
 529+ A7A1 CB 38       >			   srl b
 529+ A7A3 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 530+ A7A5 C3 94 A7                             jp      .ScaleLoop
 531+ A7A8              .DoneScaling:           ShiftHLRight1                       ; as the values now need to be sign magnitued
 531+ A7A8 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 531+ A7AA CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 532+ A7AC                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; e.g. S + 7 bit we need an extra shift
 532+ A7AC CB 3A       >			   srl d
 532+ A7AE CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 533+ A7B0                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; now values are in L E C
 533+ A7B0 CB 38       >			   srl b
 533+ A7B2 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 534+ A7B4 E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc                  ; save vecrtor x y and z nwo they are scaled to 1 byte
 535+ A7B7 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; hl = y(e) ^ 2
 536+ A7B8 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 537+ A7BA EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 538+ A7BB 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = x(l) ^ 2
 539+ A7BC ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 540+ A7BE 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de
 541+ A7BF 51                                   ld      d,c                         ; de = y(c)^ 2 + x ^ 2
 542+ A7C0 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 543+ A7C1 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 544+ A7C3 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl =  y^ 2 + x ^ 2 + z ^ 2
 545+ A7C4 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; fix as hl was holding square
 546+ A7C5 CD F6 92                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; IYH = A = hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 547+ A7C8                                      ; add in logic if h is low then use lower bytes for all
 548+ A7C8 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ;
 549+ A7C9 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ;
 550+ A7CB 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; D = sqrt
 551+ A7CC C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrive tacticsvectorz scaled
 552+ A7CD 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; a = scaled byte
 553+ A7CE CD 15 98                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg          ; This rountine I think is wrong and retuins bad values
 554+ A7D1 32 91 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),a          ; z = normalised z
 555+ A7D4 D1                                   pop     de
 556+ A7D5 7B                                   ld      a,e
 557+ A7D6 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 558+ A7D8 CD 15 98                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 559+ A7DB 32 8D A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),a
 560+ A7DE E1                                   pop     hl
 561+ A7DF 7D                                   ld      a,l
 562+ A7E0 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 563+ A7E2 CD 15 98                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 564+ A7E5 32 89 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),a
 565+ A7E8                                      ; BODGE FOR NOW
 566+ A7E8                                     ; BODGE FOR NOW
 567+ A7E8                                      ZeroA                              ;; added to help debugging
 567+ A7E8 AF          >                        xor a
 568+ A7E9 32 8A A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 569+ A7EC 32 8E A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 570+ A7EF 32 92 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 571+ A7F2                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorX+2     ; now upper byte is sign only
 571+ A7F2 3A 8B A0    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorX+2)
 571+ A7F5 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 571+ A7F7 32 8B A0    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 572+ A7FA                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorY+2     ; (could move it to lower perhaps later if
 572+ A7FA 3A 8F A0    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorY+2)
 572+ A7FD E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 572+ A7FF 32 8F A0    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 573+ A802                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorZ+2     ;  its worth it)
 573+ A802 3A 93 A0    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorZ+2)
 573+ A805 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 573+ A807 32 93 A0    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 574+ A80A C9                                   ret

 747+ A80B              ;                    then fire laser at us (which reduces energy)
 748+ A80B              ;                         cause laser damage to our ship (this will signal death is needed)
 749+ A80B              ;                         decellerate by half as ship has lock on
 750+ A80B              ;                         return
 751+ A80B              ;                    else fire laser into space (which reduces energy)
 752+ A80B              ;                 end if
 753+ A80B              ;         end if
 754+ A80B              ; .PART 7#
 755+ A80B              ;        if ship is a msile targetting us
 756+ A80B              ;           then ship turns towards us some more
 757+ A80B              ;           else if z hi > =  3 or ( x hi or y hi > 1) , i.e. ship is far away
 758+ A80B              ;                    then do random wiht bit 7 set
 759+ A80B              ;                         if random < AI flag
 760+ A80B              ;                            then   ship turned towards us
 761+ A80B              ;                            else   ship turns away from us
 762+ A80B              ;                         end if
 763+ A80B              ;                end if
 764+ A80B              ;           end if
 765+ A80B              ;           calculate new roll, pitch and accelleration based on new targe vector
 766+ A80B
 767+ A80B
 768+ A80B              ;        determine ship direction based on agression and type
 769+ A80B              ;        set pitch and roll coutners
 770+ A80B              ;        adjust speed depleding on relationship to us
 771+ A80B              ; .PART 8 - new
 772+ A80B              ;        if ship has ECM, another ECM is not active and missile targeted at it
 773+ A80B              ;           if ship has enery of ECM energey cost + 1/8th total
 774+ A80B              ;              if chance 25%
 775+ A80B              ;                 then fire ECM
 776+ A80B              ;
 777+ A80B
 778+ A80B
 779+ A80B
 780+ A80B
 781+ A80B 2A 89 A0     ReduceTacticVectors:ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 782+ A80E ED 5B 8D A0                      ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 783+ A812 ED 4B 91 A0                      ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 784+ A816 3A 8B A0                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)        ; .
 785+ A819 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = X sign
 786+ A81B 3A 8F A0                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)        ; .
 787+ A81E FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = Y sign
 788+ A820 3A 93 A0                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)        ; .
 789+ A823 DD 67                            ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = z sign
 790+ A825 FD B4        .ScaleLoop:         or      iyh                         ; now check if upper has value
 791+ A827 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ; .
 792+ A829                                  ClearSignBitA                       ;  exluding sign bit
 792+ A829 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 793+ A82B 28 21                            jr      z,.DoneScaling              ; and exit loop if upper byte is only sign component
 794+ A82D FD 7C        .ScaledDownBy2:     ld      a,iyh
 795+ A82F CB 2F                            sra     a
 796+ A831 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 797+ A833 CB 1C                            rr      h                           ; Deal with X
 798+ A835 CB 1D                            rr      l                           ;
 799+ A837 FD 7D                            ld      a,iyl
 800+ A839 CB 2F                            sra     a                           ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 801+ A83B FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a
 802+ A83D CB 1A                            rr      d                           ; Deal with Y
 803+ A83F CB 1B                            rr      e                           ;
 804+ A841 DD 7D                            ld      a, ixl                      ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 805+ A843 CB 2F                            sra     a
 806+ A845 DD 6F                            ld      ixl,a
 807+ A847 CB 18                            rr      b                           ; Deal with Z
 808+ A849 CB 19                            rr      c                           ;
 809+ A84B C3 25 A8                         jp      .ScaleLoop
 810+ A84E 7C           .DoneScaling:       ld      a,h
 811+ A84F B2                               or      d
 812+ A850 B0                               or      b
 813+ A851                                  SignBitOnlyA                        ; check if new sign bit has a value rotated in,
 813+ A851 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 814+ A853 28 0C                            jr      z,.OKToNormalise
 815+ A855              .ShiftTo15Bit:      ShiftHLRight1                       ; one last shift to 15 bit we don't need
 815+ A855 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 815+ A857 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 816+ A859                                  ShiftDERight1                       ; to do sign bytes
 816+ A859 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 816+ A85B CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 817+ A85D                                  ShiftBCRight1                       ; as value must be 0
 817+ A85D CB 38       >			   srl b
 817+ A85F CB 19       >			   rr  c
 818+ A861 7C           .OKToNormalise:     ld      a,h                         ; iyh now can only hold sign
 819+ A862 FD B4                            or      iyh                         ; so by the end of here
 820+ A864 67                               ld      h,a                         ;   hl = x
 821+ A865 7A                               ld      a,d                         ;   de = y
 822+ A866 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ;   bc = z
 823+ A868 57                               ld      d,a                         ; all scaled to 15 bit + sign
 824+ A869 78                               ld      a,b                         ;
 825+ A86A DD B4                            or      ixh                         ;
 826+ A86C 47                               ld      b,a                         ;
 827+ A86D 22 99 A0                         ld      (TacticsNormX),hl
 828+ A870 22 9D A0                         ld      (TacticsNormY),hl
 829+ A873 22 A1 A0                         ld      (TacticsNormZ),hl
 830+ A876 C9                               ret
 831+ A877                                 ; ***SIgn bits*** need to be in byte 3
 832+ A877
# file closed: ./GameEngine/Tactics.asm

 192+ A898              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 193+ A898              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
 194+ A898              ;			bc  = amount to read
 195+ A898              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 196+ A898              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 197+ A898 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
 198+ A899 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 199+ A89A E5                                   push    hl
 200+ A89B DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
 201+ A89E CF                                   rst	    $08
 202+ A89F 9D                                   db	    F_READ
 203+ A8A0 E1                                   pop	    hl
 204+ A8A1 C9                                   ret

 207+ A8A2              ;	Function	Write bytes to the open file
 208+ A8A2              ;	In:		ix  = address to read from
 209+ A8A2              ;			bc  = amount to write

 211+ A8A2              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 212+ A8A2 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
 213+ A8A3 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 214+ A8A4 E5                                   push	hl
 215+ A8A5 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix

 217+ A8A9 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
 218+ A8AA E1                                   pop	    hl
 219+ A8AB C9                                   ret

 261+ A8BA              ; *******************************************************************************************************

 263+ A8BA              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 264+ A8BA CD 77 A8     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive

 266+ A8BE
 267+ A8BE              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 268+ A8BE              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 269+ A8BE              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 270+ A8BE              ;		    ix = address to load to
 271+ A8BE              ;           bc = filelength
 272+ A8BE              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 273+ A8BE CD 77 A8     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 274+ A8C1 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 275+ A8C4                                      ; get file size
 276+ A8C4 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 277+ A8C7 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 278+ A8CA 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 279+ A8CC CD 8A A8                             call    fOpen
 280+ A8CF 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 281+ A8D1 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 282+ A8D3 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 283+ A8D5 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 284+ A8D8 F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 285+ A8D9 CD 98 A8                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 286+ A8DC 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 287+ A8DE F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 288+ A8DF CD AC A8                             call	fClose			; close file
 289+ A8E2 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 290+ A8E4 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 291+ A8E7 C9                                   ret
 292+ A8E8              ;
 293+ A8E8              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 294+ A8E8              ;
 295+ A8E8 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 296+ A8EA C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 297+ A8EB
 298+ A8EB              .error_closing:
 299+ A8EB C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 300+ A8EC D1                                   pop	de
 301+ A8ED C1                                   pop	bc
 302+ A8EE C9                                   ret
 303+ A8EF
 304+ A8EF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 305+ A8EF              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 306+ A8EF              ; In:		hl = file name
 307+ A8EF              ;		    ix = address to save from
 308+ A8EF              ;		    bc = size
 309+ A8EF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 310+ A8EF CD 77 A8     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 311+ A8F2 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 312+ A8F5 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 313+ A8F8 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 314+ A8FA CD 8A A8                             call    fOpen
 315+ A8FD 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 316+ A8FF FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 317+ A901 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 318+ A903 DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 319+ A906 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 320+ A907 CD A2 A8                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 321+ A90A 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 322+ A90C F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 323+ A90D CD AC A8                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 324+ A910 C9           .error:                 ret
 325+ A911              ;
 326+ A911              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 327+ A911              ;
 328+ A911 DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 329+ A914 C9                                   ret

  18+ AC90
  19+ AC90              print_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ AC90              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ AC90              BoilerTextLoop:
  22+ AC90 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ AC91 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ AC92 23           	inc			hl
  25+ AC93 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ AC94 23           	inc			hl
  27+ AC95 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ AC96 23           	inc			hl
  29+ AC97 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ AC98 23           	inc			hl
  31+ AC99 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ AC9A EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ AC9B 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ AC9D                  MMUSelectLayer2
  34+ AC9D ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  35+ ACA1 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  36+ ACA4 E1           	pop			hl
  37+ ACA5 C1           	pop			bc
  38+ ACA6 10 E8        	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ ACA8 C9           	ret
  40+ ACA9
  41+ ACA9
  42+ ACA9              print_boiler_text:
  43+ ACA9              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ ACA9              .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ ACA9 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ ACAA 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ ACAB 23           	inc			hl
  48+ ACAC 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ ACAD 23           	inc			hl
  50+ ACAE 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ ACAF 23           	inc			hl
  52+ ACB0 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ ACB1 23           	inc			hl
  54+ ACB2 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ ACB3 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ ACB4 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ ACB6 C5           	push		bc
  58+ ACB7 D1           	pop			de
  59+ ACB8 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  60+ ACBB E1           	pop			hl
  61+ ACBC C1           	pop			bc
  62+ ACBD 10 EA        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ ACBF C9           	ret
  64+ ACC0
  65+ ACC0              GetFuelLevel:           INCLUDE "Menus/get_fuel_level_inlineinclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/get_fuel_level_inlineinclude.asm
   1++ACC0
   2++ACC0
   3++ACC0 3A 8B 84     	ld		a,(Fuel)
   4++ACC3 11 6E AC     	ld		de,txt_fuel_level
   5++ACC6 0E 9C        	ld	c, -100
   6++ACC8 CD D2 AC     	call	.Num1
   7++ACCB 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
   8++ACCD CD D2 AC     	call	.Num1
   9++ACD0 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  10++ACD2              .Num1:
  11++ACD2 06 2F        	ld	b,'0'-1
  12++ACD4              .Num2:
  13++ACD4 04           	inc		b
  14++ACD5 81           	add		a,c
  15++ACD6 38 FC        	jr		c,.Num2
  16++ACD8 91           	sub 	c
  17++ACD9 C5           	push	bc
  18++ACDA F5           	push	af
  19++ACDB 79           	ld		a,c
  20++ACDC FE FF        	cp		-1
  21++ACDE CC E7 AC     	call	z,.InsertDot
  22++ACE1 78           	ld		a,b
  23++ACE2 12           	ld		(de),a
  24++ACE3 13           	inc		de
  25++ACE4 F1           	pop		af
  26++ACE5 C1           	pop		bc
  27++ACE6 C9           	ret
  28++ACE7              .InsertDot:
  29++ACE7 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'
  30++ACE9 12           	ld		(de),a
  31++ACEA 13           	inc		de
  32++ACEB C9           	ret
  33++ACEC
# file closed: ./Menus/get_fuel_level_inlineinclude.asm
  66+ ACEC
  67+ ACEC 2A 87 84     GetCash:                ld      hl,(Cash)
  68+ ACEF EB                                   ex      de,hl
  69+ ACF0 DD 2A 89 84                          ld      ix,(Cash+2)
  70+ ACF4 FD 21 7F AC                          ld		iy,txt_cash_amount
  71+ ACF8 CD 73 97                             call 	DispDEIXtoIY	; This will write out with 0 termination after last digit
  72+ ACFB FD 7E 00     .ShiftDecimalDigit:     ld		a,(IY+0)				;Push last digit to post decimal
  73+ ACFE 32 8B AC                             ld		(txt_cash_fraction),a
  74+ AD01 21 80 AC     .UpdateInteger:         ld		hl,txt_cash_amount+1	; Now was there only 1 digit
  75+ AD04 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)					; if so we leave it alone so its "0.0"
  76+ AD05 FE 00                                cp		0
  77+ AD07 C8                                   ret		z
  78+ AD08 FD 36 00 00                          ld		(IY),0					; Else we erase last digit as it went to fraction
  79+ AD0C C9                                   ret

 629  AE0D 00 B8                        dw      IM2Routine
 630  AE0F 60 00        IR_COUNT        dw  $0060
 631  AE11
 632  AE11 00           LAST_DELTA      db  0
 633  AE12              StartOfInterruptHandler:
 634  AE12                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code Ends At", StartOfInterruptHandler
 635  AE12
 636  AE12                  org $B800
 637  B800              IM2Routine:     ; initially do nothing
 638  B800 F5 C5 D5 E5                  push    af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
 638  B804 DD E5 FD E5
 639  B808 08                           ex      af,af'
 640  B809 D9                           exx
 641  B80A F5 C5 D5 E5                  push    af,,bc,,de,,hl
 642  B80E 3A 17 7F                     ld      a,(DELTA)
 643  B811 21 11 AE                     ld      hl,LAST_DELTA
 644  B814 BE                           cp      (hl)
 645  B815 28 06                        jr      z,.NoSpeedChange
 646  B817              .SpeedChange:   ;call    UpdateEngineSound
 647  B817 3A 17 7F                     ld      a,(DELTA)
 648  B81A 32 11 AE                     ld      (LAST_DELTA),a
 649  B81D 2A 0F AE     .NoSpeedChange: ld      hl,(IR_COUNT)
 650  B820 7C                           ld      a,h
 651  B821 B5                           or      l
 652  B822 28 04                        jr      z,.NoDec
 653  B824 2B                           dec     hl
 654  B825 22 0F AE                     ld      (IR_COUNT),hl
 655  B828                              ; NOTE play then equeue simplifies ligic, more chance slot free
 656  B828 3A 1B 7F     .NoDec:         ld      a,(SoundFxToEnqueue)        ; Check for new sound
 657  B82B FE FF                        cp      $FF
 658  B82D C4 FF E0                     call    nz,EnqueSound
 659  B830              .NoNewSound:    IFDEF   USETIMER
 660  B830 ~                               ld      hl,SoundChannelTimer
 661  B830                              ENDIF
 662  B830 11 8E E2                     ld      de,SoundChannelSeq
 663  B833 06 08                        ld      b,8
 664  B835 1A           .ResetLoop:     ld      a,(de)                  ; we only update active channels
 665  B836 FE FF                        cp      $FF
 666  B838 28 0A                        jr      z,.NextCounter
 667  B83A                              IFDEF   USETIMER
 668  B83A ~
 669  B83A ~                                dec     (hl)                    ; so update channel timer
 670  B83A ~                                jr      nz,.NextCounter         ; if its not zero then continue
 671  B83A                              ENDIF
 672  B83A 3E 08                        ld      a,8                     ; a now = channel to play
 673  B83C 90                           sub     a,b
 674  B83D                              IFDEF   USETIMER
 675  B83D ~                                push    bc,,de,,hl              ; save state
 676  B83D                              ELSE
 677  B83D C5 D5                            push    bc,,de
 678  B83F                              ENDIF
 679  B83F CD 5A E1                     call    PlaySound               ; play sound
 680  B842                              IFDEF   USETIMER
 681  B842 ~                                pop     bc,,de,,hl              ; restore state so de = correct timer & hl = correct channel, b = coutner
 682  B842                              ELSE
 683  B842 D1 C1                            pop     bc,,de              ; restore state so de = correct timer & hl = correct channel, b = coutner
 684  B844                              ENDIF
 685  B844              ; If it went negative new sound update
 686  B844                              IFDEF   USETIMER
 687  B844 ~            .ResetTimer:        ld      a,SOUNDSTEPLENGTH       ; as we fallin to this it will auto update counter
 688  B844 ~                                ld      (hl),a                  ; so may take it out of playsound routine
 689  B844                              ENDIF
 690  B844              .NextCounter    IFDEF   USETIMER
 691  B844 ~                                inc     hl
 692  B844                              ENDIF
 693  B844 13                           inc     de
 694  B845 10 EE                        djnz    .ResetLoop
 695  B847 E1 D1 C1 F1  .DoneInterrupt: pop    af,,bc,,de,,hl
 696  B84B 08                           ex      af,af'
 697  B84C D9                           exx
 698  B84D FD E1 DD E1                  pop     af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
 698  B851 E1 D1 C1 F1
 699  B855 FB                           ei
 700  B856 ED 4D                        reti
 701  B858
 702  B858              EndOfNonBanked:
 703  B858                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code + Interrupt Handler Ends At", EndOfNonBanked

  64+ C124 21 1E 8F                             ld		hl,name_expanded

  66+ C12A 21 1E 8F                             ld		hl, name_expanded
  67+ C12D 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  68+ C12F C9                                   ret
  69+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  70+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  71+ C130 ED 4B 2A 80                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  72+ C134 ED 5B 28 80                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  73+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  74+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  75+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  76+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  77+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  78+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  79+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  80+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  81+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  82+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  83+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  84+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  85+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  86+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  87+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  88+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  89+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  90+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  91+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  92+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  93+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  94+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  95+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  96+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  97+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite
  98+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a
  99+ C165 C6 60                                add		a,src_y_centre
 100+ C167 47                                   ld		b,a
 101+ C168              .RedrawSprite:          MMUSelectSpriteBank
 101+ C168 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 102+ C16C CD D0 E0                             call	sprite_lhc_move
 103+ C16F CD A1 C1                             call    src_name_current
 104+ C172 C9                                   ret
 105+ C173
 106+ C173 26 08        src_clear_name_area:    ld      h,8
 107+ C175 11 E3 A0                             ld      de,$A000 | COLOUR_TRANSPARENT
 108+ C178 01 0A A8                             ld      bc,$A80A
 109+ C17B E5           .ClearLoop:             push    hl
 110+ C17C D5                                   push    de
 111+ C17D C5                                   push    bc
 112+ C17E                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 112+ C17E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 113+ C182 CD 01 E3                             call	l2_draw_horz_line
 114+ C185 C1                                   pop     bc
 115+ C186 D1                                   pop     de
 116+ C187 E1                                   pop     hl
 117+ C188 04                                   inc     b
 118+ C189 25                                   dec     h
 119+ C18A 20 EF                                jr      nz,.ClearLoop
 120+ C18C C9                                   ret
 121+ C18D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 122+ C18D 3A 15 80     src_system_undercursor: ld      a,(Galaxy)

 129+ C1A1 CD 0D C1     src_name_current:       call    src_get_name

 132+ C1A7 E5                                   push    hl

 135+ C1AC F1                                   pop     af
 136+ C1AD E1                                   pop     hl
 137+ C1AE 01 0A A8                             ld      bc,$A80A
 138+ C1B1 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
 139+ C1B3                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 139+ C1B3 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 140+ C1B7 CD 70 E2                             call	l2_print_7at
 141+ C1BA CD CD C1                             call    src_calc_distance
 142+ C1BD 21 1A C0                             ld      hl,src_distance
 143+ C1C0 01 0A B0                             ld      bc,$B00A
 144+ C1C3 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
 145+ C1C5                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 145+ C1C5 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 146+ C1C9 CD 70 E2                             call	l2_print_7at
 147+ C1CC C9                                   ret
 148+ C1CD              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 149+ C1CD 3A 15 80     src_calc_distance:      ld      a,(Galaxy)                                      ; Default in 0 distance
 150+ C1D0                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 150+ C1D0 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 151+ C1D3 11 24 C0                             ld      de,src_dist_amount
 152+ C1D6 21 36 C0                             ld      hl,src_default_dist
 153+ C1D9 ED A0                                ldi
 154+ C1DB ED A0                                ldi
 155+ C1DD ED A0                                ldi
 156+ C1DF ED A0                                ldi
 157+ C1E1 ED A0                                ldi
 158+ C1E3 ED 4B 28 80                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)
 159+ C1E7 ED 43 57 E8                          ld      (GalaxyPresentSystem),bc
 160+ C1EB ED 4B 2A 80                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 161+ C1EF ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 162+ C1F3 CD F7 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance                            ; get distance into HL
 163+ C1F6 DD 2A B1 7F                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 164+ C1FA 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
 165+ C1FD FD 21 3B C0                          ld      iy,src_distance_val
 166+ C201 CD 73 97                             call    DispDEIXtoIY                                    ; use DEIX as distance and write to string at location IY
 167+ C204 FD E5                                push    iy
 168+ C206 E1                                   pop     hl                                              ; hl = iy
 169+ C207 11 3B C0                             ld      de,src_distance_val
 170+ C20A 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				                            ;Push last digit to post decimal
 171+ C20B 32 28 C0                             ld		(src_fraction),a
 172+ C20E 2B                                   dec     hl
 173+ C20F CD 27 96                             call    compare16HLDE
 174+ C212 38 18                                jr      c,.done_number
 175+ C214 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 176+ C215 32 26 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+2),a
 177+ C218 2B                                   dec     hl
 178+ C219 CD 27 96                             call    compare16HLDE
 179+ C21C 38 0E                                jr      c,.done_number
 180+ C21E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 181+ C21F 32 25 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+1),a
 182+ C222 2B                                   dec     hl
 183+ C223 CD 27 96                             call    compare16HLDE
 184+ C226 38 04                                jr      c,.done_number
 185+ C228 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 186+ C229 32 24 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount),a
 187+ C22C C9           .done_number:           ret
 188+ C22D
 189+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 190+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 191+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 192+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 193+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 194+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 195+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 196+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 198+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 199+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 200+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 201+ C236 83                                   add     e
 202+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 203+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 204+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 205+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 206+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 207+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 208+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 209+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 210+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 211+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 212+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 214+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 215+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 216+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 217+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 218+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 219+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 220+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 221+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 221+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 221+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 222+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 223+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 223+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 223+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 224+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 225+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 226+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 226+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 226+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 227+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 228+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 228+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 228+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 229+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 230+ C284 C9                                   ret
 231+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 232+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 233+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 234+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 236+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text
 237+ C292 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 238+ C295 57                                   ld      d,a
 239+ C296 1E 04                                ld      e,4
 240+ C298 ED 30                                mul
 241+ C29A 19                                   add     hl,de
 242+ C29B ED 5B 2D C2                          ld      de,(PosScan1)
 243+ C29F 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 244+ C2A3 23                                   inc     hl
 245+ C2A4 23                                   inc     hl
 246+ C2A5 ED 5B 2F C2                          ld      de,(PosScan2)
 247+ C2A9 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 248+ C2AD 21 C1 C0                             ld      hl,src_buffer_size
 249+ C2B0 34                                   inc     (hl)
 250+ C2B1 AF                                   xor     a
 251+ C2B2 C9                                   ret
 252+ C2B3
 253+ C2B3 CD 48 85     src_label_ssytem:       call	copy_system_to_working
 254+ C2B6 3A 15 80                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 255+ C2B9                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 255+ C2B9 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 256+ C2BC CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed

 261+ C2CA 47                                   ld		b,a					    ; b = effective pixel row
 262+ C2CB 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)

 264+ C2D0 4F                                   ld		c,a                     ; c = effective pixel col
 265+ C2D1 1E 00        .GetStringName:         ld      e,0
 266+ C2D3 21 1E 8F                             ld      hl,name_expanded
 267+ C2D6 7E           .getStringLoop:         ld      a,(hl)
 268+ C2D7 23                                   inc     hl

 270+ C2D9 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; String must have a terminator to work
 271+ C2DB 20 F9                                jr      nz,.getStringLoop
 272+ C2DD 16 08                                ld      d,8
 273+ C2DF C5                                   push    bc
 274+ C2E0 CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; first attemps
 275+ C2E3 C1                                   pop     bc
 276+ C2E4 FE 00                                cp      0
 277+ C2E6 28 19                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 278+ C2E8 78                                   ld      a,b
 279+ C2E9 C6 08                                add     8
 280+ C2EB 47                                   ld      b,a
 281+ C2EC C5                                   push    bc
 282+ C2ED CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 283+ C2F0 C1                                   pop     bc
 284+ C2F1 FE 00                                cp      0
 285+ C2F3 28 0C                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 286+ C2F5 78                                   ld      a,b

 288+ C2F8 47                                   ld      b,a
 289+ C2F9 C5                                   push    bc
 290+ C2FA CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 291+ C2FD C1                                   pop     bc
 292+ C2FE FE 00                                cp      0
 293+ C300 C0                                   ret     nz

 295+ C303 21 1E 8F                             ld		hl,name_expanded

 304+ C314 CB 3F                                srl		a

 362+ C38F 3A 29 80     SRCcalcLocaldy:         ld		a,(PresentSystemY)

 432+ C445 06 01                                ld		b,1
 433+ C447 21 10 C0                             ld		hl,short_range_boiler_text
 434+ C44A CD C2 C0                             call	SRM_print_boiler_text
 435+ C44D CD 15 85     SRCSetUpChart:          call	copy_galaxy_to_system
 436+ C450 CD 65 C3                             call	plot_local_stars
 437+ C453 CD DD C0     .CircleandCrosshair:    call	SRM_draw_chart_circle_and_crosshair
 438+ C456 CD F9 C0                             call	SRM_draw_hyperspace_cross_hair
 439+ C459 C9                                   ret
 440+ C45A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 441+ C45A 3A 0C 80     local_chart_cursors:    ld     a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 442+ C45D                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 442+ C45D A7          >                        and     a
 442+ C45E C8          >                        ret     z
 443+ C45F 17                                   rla
 444+ C460 DC 78 C4                             call   c,src_UpPressed
 445+ C463 17                                   rla
 446+ C464 DC 95 C4                             call   c,src_DownPressed
 447+ C467 17                                   rla
 448+ C468 DC B4 C4                             call   c,src_LeftPressed
 449+ C46B 17                                   rla
 450+ C46C DC D1 C4                             call   c,src_RightPressed
 451+ C46F 17                                   rla
 452+ C470 DC F0 C4                             call   c,src_HomePressed
 453+ C473 17                                   rla
 454+ C474 DC FA C4                             call   c,src_RecenterPressed
 455+ C477 C9                                   ret
 456+ C478              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 457+ C478 3A 2B 80     src_UpPressed:          ld     a,(TargetSystemY)
 458+ C47B                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 458+ C47B A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 458+ C47C CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 459+ C47F 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 460+ C480 3A 29 80                             ld      a,(PresentSystemY)
 461+ C483 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 462+ C484 FA 8C C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 463+ C487                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 463+ C487 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 463+ C489 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 464+ C48C 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 465+ C48D 3D                                   dec     a
 466+ C48E 32 2B 80                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 467+ C491 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 468+ C494 C9                                   ret
 469+ C495              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 470+ C495 3A 29 80     src_DownPressed:        ld     a,(PresentSystemY)
 471+ C498 47                                   ld      b,a
 472+ C499 3A 2B 80                             ld      a,(TargetSystemY)
 473+ C49C 4F                                   ld      c,a
 474+ C49D                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 128,src_BoundsLimit
 474+ C49D FE 80       >                        cp     128
 474+ C49F CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 475+ C4A2 90                                   sub     b
 476+ C4A3 FA AB C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 477+ C4A6                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit
 477+ C4A6 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 477+ C4A8 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 478+ C4AB 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 479+ C4AC 3C                                   inc    a
 480+ C4AD 32 2B 80                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 481+ C4B0 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 482+ C4B3 C9                                   ret
 483+ C4B4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 484+ C4B4 3A 2A 80     src_LeftPressed:        ld      a,(TargetSystemX)           ; we can't move left if target is zero
 485+ C4B7                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 485+ C4B7 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 485+ C4B8 CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 486+ C4BB 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 487+ C4BC 3A 28 80                             ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 488+ C4BF 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 489+ C4C0 FA C8 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 490+ C4C3                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 490+ C4C3 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 490+ C4C5 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 491+ C4C8 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 492+ C4C9 3D                                   dec     a
 493+ C4CA 32 2A 80                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 494+ C4CD CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 495+ C4D0 C9                                   ret
 496+ C4D1              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 497+ C4D1 3A 28 80     src_RightPressed:       ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 498+ C4D4 47                                   ld      b,a
 499+ C4D5 3A 2A 80                             ld      a,(TargetSystemX)
 500+ C4D8 4F                                   ld      c,a
 501+ C4D9                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,src_BoundsLimit
 501+ C4D9 FE FF       >                        cp     255
 501+ C4DB CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 502+ C4DE 90                                   sub     b
 503+ C4DF FA E7 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 504+ C4E2                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit
 504+ C4E2 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 504+ C4E4 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 505+ C4E7 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 506+ C4E8 3C                                   inc    a
 507+ C4E9 32 2A 80                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 508+ C4EC CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 509+ C4EF C9                                   ret
 510+ C4F0              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 511+ C4F0 2A 28 80     src_HomePressed:        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 512+ C4F3 22 2A 80                             ld      (TargetSystemX),hl
 513+ C4F6 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 514+ C4F9 C9                                   ret
 515+ C4FA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 516+ C4FA 3A 15 80     src_RecenterPressed:    ld      a,(Galaxy)      ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working
 517+ C4FD                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 517+ C4FD ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 518+ C500 ED 4B 2A 80                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 519+ C504 CD 70 FB                             call    find_nearest_to_bc
 520+ C507 ED 43 2A 80                          ld      (TargetSystemX),bc
 521+ C50B CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 522+ C50E C9                                   ret
 523+ C50F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 524+ C50F AF           src_BoundsLimit:        xor     a
 525+ C510 C9                                   ret

# file closed: ./Menus/short_range_chart_menu.asm

  28+ C08E                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C08E
   2++C08E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C08E              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C08E C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C08F 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C090 23           	inc			hl
   7++C091 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C092 23           	inc			hl
   9++C093 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C094 23           	inc			hl
  11++C095 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C096 23           	inc			hl
  13++C097 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C098 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C099 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C09B C5           	push		bc
  17++C09C D1           	pop			de
  18++C09D                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C0A1 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C0A4 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C0A5 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C0A6 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C0A8 C9           	ret
  24++C0A9
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

 199+ C27B A7          >                        and     a
 199+ C27C CA 95 C2    >                        jp      z, AlreadyInInputMode
 200+ C27F 3E 4E        .StartFindCheck:        ld      a,c_Pressed_Find                        ;Is F pressed
 201+ C281 CD 12 7C                             call    is_key_pressed
 202+ C284 C0                                   ret     nz                                      ;the main loop handles find key
 203+ C285 CD BE 7C                             call    initInputText                           ;Initialise find input
 204+ C288                                      SetMemTrue TextInputMode                        ;Set input mode to true
 204+ C288 AF          >                        xor     a
 204+ C289 32 0B 80    >                        ld      (TextInputMode),a
 205+ C28C                                      SetMemToN gcCursorBlink, gcBlinkVal             ; set up blink
 205+ C28C 3E 10       >                        ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 205+ C28E 32 D9 C1    >                        ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 206+ C291 CD 20 C2     .DisplayInputbar:       call    gc_display_find_text                    ; now prep the boiler plate input text
 207+ C294 C9                                   ret                                             ; and exit so next interation handles new input as we have to rescan keyboard
 208+ C295              ;Already in input mode post pressing find
 209+ C295 CD D6 7C     AlreadyInInputMode:     call    InputName                               ; Call input routine to parse a key
 210+ C298                                      JumpIfMemFalse InputChanged, .blinkNoDelay      ; no key they bypass rest of input
 210+ C298 3A AA 7C    >                        ld      a,(InputChanged)
 210+ C29B A7          >                        and     a
 210+ C29C C2 A9 C2    >                        jp      nz, .blinkNoDelay
 211+ C29F              .WasItEnter:            JumpIfMemTrue EnterPressed, .FindEnterPressed   ; if enter was pressed then find
 211+ C29F 3A A9 7C    >                        ld      a,(EnterPressed)
 211+ C2A2 A7          >                        and     a
 211+ C2A3 CA B5 C2    >                        jp      z, .FindEnterPressed
 212+ C2A6 CD 2E C2                             call    gc_display_find_string                  ; update string
 213+ C2A9 CD 58 C2     .blinkNoDelay:          call    blink_cursor
 214+ C2AC                                      CallIfMemEqNusng    gcCursorBlink, gcBlinkVal, gc_display_find_string ; on blink we get a double update but we can live with that
 214+ C2AC 3A D9 C1    >                        ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)
 214+ C2AF FE 10       >                        cp      gcBlinkVal
 214+ C2B1 CC 2E C2    >                        call    z,gc_display_find_string
 215+ C2B4 C9                                   ret
 216+ C2B5              .FindEnterPressed:      SetMemFalse EnterPressed                        ; reset enter
 216+ C2B5 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 216+ C2B7 32 A9 7C    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 217+ C2BA                                      SetMemFalse TextInputMode                       ; leave input mode
 217+ C2BA 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 217+ C2BC 32 0B 80    >                        ld      (TextInputMode),a
 218+ C2BF 3A 15 80                             ld      a,(Galaxy)                              ; Fetch correct galaxy seed bank into memory
 219+ C2C2                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 219+ C2C2 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 220+ C2C5 21 89 7C                             ld      hl,InputString
 221+ C2C8 11 5E E8                             ld      de,GalaxySearchString
 222+ C2CB CD D0 F6                             call    GalaxyCopyLoop
 223+ C2CE CD 39 FB                             call    find_system_by_name
 224+ C2D1 FE FF                                cp      $FF                                     ; 0 denotes found FF, failure
 225+ C2D3 28 1D                                jr      z,.FindNoMatch
 226+ C2D5 3A FB E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+3)
 227+ C2D8 4F                                   ld      c,a
 228+ C2D9 3A F9 E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+1)
 229+ C2DC 47                                   ld      b,a
 230+ C2DD ED 43 2A 80                          ld      (TargetSystemX),bc
 231+ C2E1 CD 84 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 232+ C2E4 11 08 B0                             ld		de,galactic_find_position               ; Wipe input area on screen
 233+ C2E7 21 73 C0                             ld      hl,galactic_find_match
 234+ C2EA                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 234+ C2EA ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 235+ C2EE CD C8 E0                             call	l1_print_at
 236+ C2F1 C9                                   ret
 237+ C2F2              .FindNoMatch:           ; if not found display "Not found"
 238+ C2F2                                      ; move curor if found
 239+ C2F2 11 08 B0                             ld		de,galactic_find_position   ; Wipe input area on screen
 240+ C2F5 21 58 C0                             ld      hl,galactic_find_no_match
 241+ C2F8                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 241+ C2F8 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 242+ C2FC CD C8 E0                             call	l1_print_at
 243+ C2FF C9                                   ret; DOSTUFFHERE
 244+ C300              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 245+ C300              galctic_chart_cursors:  ReturnIfMemTrue TextInputMode
 245+ C300 3A 0B 80    >                        ld      a,(TextInputMode)
 245+ C303 A7          >                        and     a
 245+ C304 C8          >                        ret     z
 246+ C305 3A 0C 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 247+ C308                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 247+ C308 A7          >                        and     a
 247+ C309 C8          >                        ret     z
 248+ C30A 17                                   rla
 249+ C30B DC 23 C3                             call   c,gc_UpPressed
 250+ C30E 17                                   rla
 251+ C30F DC 33 C3                             call   c,gc_DownPressed
 252+ C312 17                                   rla
 253+ C313 DC 43 C3                             call   c,gc_LeftPressed
 254+ C316 17                                   rla
 255+ C317 DC 53 C3                             call   c,gc_RightPressed
 256+ C31A 17                                   rla
 257+ C31B DC 63 C3                             call   c,gc_HomePressed
 258+ C31E 17                                   rla
 259+ C31F DC 6D C3                             call   c,gc_RecenterPressed
 260+ C322 C9                                   ret
 261+ C323              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 262+ C323 3A 2B 80     gc_UpPressed:           ld     a,(TargetSystemX+1)
 263+ C326                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 1,gc_BoundsLimit
 263+ C326 FE 01       >                        cp     1
 263+ C328 CA 82 C3    >                        jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit
 264+ C32B 3D                                   dec     a
 265+ C32C 32 2B 80                             ld      (TargetSystemX+1),a
 266+ C32F CD 84 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 267+ C332 C9                                   ret
 268+ C333              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 269+ C333 3A 2B 80     gc_DownPressed:         ld     a,(TargetSystemX+1)
 270+ C336                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,gc_BoundsLimit
 270+ C336 FE FF       >                        cp     255
 270+ C338 CA 82 C3    >                        jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit
 271+ C33B 3C                                   inc    a
 272+ C33C 32 2B 80                             ld      (TargetSystemX+1),a
 273+ C33F CD 84 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 274+ C342 C9                                   ret
 275+ C343              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 276+ C343 3A 2A 80     gc_LeftPressed:         ld     a,(TargetSystemX)
 277+ C346                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 2,gc_BoundsLimit
 277+ C346 FE 02       >                        cp     2
 277+ C348 CA 82 C3    >                        jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit
 278+ C34B 3D                                   dec    a
 279+ C34C 32 2A 80                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 280+ C34F CD 84 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 281+ C352 C9                                   ret
 282+ C353              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 283+ C353 3A 2A 80     gc_RightPressed:        ld     a,(TargetSystemX)
 284+ C356                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 253,gc_BoundsLimit
 284+ C356 FE FD       >                        cp     253
 284+ C358 CA 82 C3    >                        jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit
 285+ C35B 3C                                   inc    a
 286+ C35C 32 2A 80                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 287+ C35F CD 84 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 288+ C362 C9                                   ret
 289+ C363              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 290+ C363 2A 28 80     gc_HomePressed:         ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)

 300+ C37E CD 84 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 301+ C381 C9                                   ret
 302+ C382              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 304+ C383 C9                                   ret

 372+ C428 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				;Push last digit to post decimal

  43+ C070              INM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C070
   2++C070              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C070              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C070 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C071 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C072 23           	inc			hl
   7++C073 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C074 23           	inc			hl
   9++C075 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C076 23           	inc			hl
  11++C077 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C078 23           	inc			hl
  13++C079 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C07A EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C07B 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C07D C5           	push		bc
  17++C07E D1           	pop			de
  18++C07F                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C07F ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C083 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C086 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C087 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C088 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C08A C9           	ret
  24++C08B
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
