  34+ E2F5 C5                                   push 	bc							; save row col
  35+ E2F6 78                                   ld   	a,b
  36+ E2F7 CD 68 E0                             call 	asm_l2_row_bank_select		; now we have the correct bank, its a horizontal line so bank will not shift
  37+ E2FA C1                                   pop  	bc
  38+ E2FB 47                                   ld	 	b,a	       					; fixed row by the call we can go straight into HL with row col
  39+ E2FC D1                                   pop  	de							; get length back
  40+ E2FD CD DB E2                             call    l2_draw_horz_dma
  41+ E300 C9                                   ret
  42+ E301
  43+ E301              ; "l2_draw_horz_line"
  44+ E301              ; "bc = left side row,col, d = length, e = color"
  45+ E301              ; "optimisation if above min pix is will use dma call SCREEN_HOZ_MIN_PIX not implemented yet"
  46+ E301 7A           l2_draw_horz_line:      ld		a,d
  47+ E302 FE 00                                cp 		0							; if its zero length then just return
  48+ E304 C8           .zerolengthexit:        ret		z
  49+ E305 FE 01        .isitlen1:              cp 		1
  50+ E307 CA 29 E3                             jp 		z,.l2_draw_horz_line_1
  51+ E30A FE 0A        .longenoughtfordma:     cp  10
  52+ E30C C3 F4 E2                             jp  l2_draw_horz_dma_bank
  53+ E30F D5 C5        .plottableline:         push 	de,,bc  					; save length and colour an d row col
  54+ E311 78                                   ld   	a,b
  55+ E312 CD 68 E0                             call 	asm_l2_row_bank_select		; now we have the correct bank, its a horizontal line so bank will not shift
  56+ E315 C1                                   pop  	bc
  57+ E316 67                                   ld	 	h,a	       					; fixed row by the call we can go straight into HL with row col
  58+ E317 69                                   ld   	l,c
  59+ E318 D1                                   pop  	de							; get length back
  60+ E319 79           .cliptest:              ld	 	a,c							; get column + length
  61+ E31A 42                                   ld  	b,d  						; speculate that we don't clip by pre-loading b with length
  62+ E31B 82                                   add  	a,d
  63+ E31C 30 06                                jr   	nc, .l2_draw_horz_plot_loop	; if carry is set c+d > 255
  64+ E31E 3E FF        .clipat255:             ld   	a,$FF
  65+ E320 91                                   sub  	c							; a holds clipped length
  66+ E321 47                                   ld 		b, a 						; so now hl holds poke address  b = clipped length e = colour
  67+ E322 18 00                                jr		.l2_draw_horz_plot_loop
  68+ E324 73           .l2_draw_horz_plot_loop:ld (hl),e							; loop poking hl with e for b pixels
  69+ E325 23                                   inc hl
  70+ E326 10 FC                                djnz .l2_draw_horz_plot_loop
  71+ E328 C9                                   ret
  72+ E329 7B           .l2_draw_horz_line_1:   ld		a,e
  73+ E32A                                      l2_plot_macro; jp		l2_plot_pixel				; hijack return
  73+ E32A 78          >                        ld      a,b
  73+ E32B             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
  73+ E32B FE C0       >                        cp     192
  73+ E32D D2 39 E3    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
  73+ E330 69          >                        ld      l,c
  73+ E331 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
  73+ E334 67          >                        ld      h,a
  73+ E335 3A 7D EB    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
  73+ E338 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
  73+ E339             >.NoPlot:
  74+ E339 C9                                   ret
  75+ E33A
  76+ E33A              ; "l2_draw_horz_line_to"
  77+ E33A              ; "bc = left side row,col, d right pixel, e = color"
  78+ E33A F3           l2_draw_horz_line_to:   di
  79+ E33B 7A                                   ld 		a,d
  80+ E33C B9                                   cp 		c
  81+ E33D 30 04                                jr		nc, .noswap
  82+ E33F 28 07                                jr      z, .singlepixel
  83+ E341 51           .swap:                  ld		d,c
  84+ E342 4F                                   ld		c,a
  85+ E343 7A           .noswap:                ld		a,d
  86+ E344 91                                   sub		c
  87+ E345              ;                        dec		a							; so now its length not offset
  88+ E345 57                                   ld		d,a
  89+ E346 18 B9                                jr 		l2_draw_horz_line			; hijack routine and return statements
  90+ E348 7B           .singlepixel:           ld		a,e
  91+ E349                                      l2_plot_macro; jp		l2_plot_pixel				; hijack return
  91+ E349 78          >                        ld      a,b
  91+ E34A             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
  91+ E34A FE C0       >                        cp     192
  91+ E34C D2 58 E3    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
  91+ E34F 69          >                        ld      l,c
  91+ E350 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
  91+ E353 67          >                        ld      h,a
  91+ E354 3A 7D EB    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
  91+ E357 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
  91+ E358             >.NoPlot:
  92+ E358 C9                                   ret
  93+ E359
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_plot_horizontal.asm
 774  E359                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_plot_vertical.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_plot_vertical.asm
   1+ E359              ; ">l2_draw_vert_segment"
   2+ E359              ; ">hl = bank adjusted pixel poke address d = length, e = color"
   3+ E359              ; ">will always clip once h = 64 even if length > 64 destroys a and hl, d = resudual length not plotted"
   4+ E359 7A           l2_draw_vert_segment:   ld		a,d
   5+ E35A FE 00        .emptylinecheck:	    cp 		0
   6+ E35C C8                                   ret		z
   7+ E35D FE 01        .justonepixel	        cp		1
   8+ E35F 20 02                                jr		nz, .multiplepixelsLoop
   9+ E361 73                                   ld		(hl),e
  10+ E362 C9                                   ret
  11+ E363              .multiplepixelsLoop:
  12+ E363 7C           .endofbankcheck:        ld   	a,h
  13+ E364 FE 40                                cp   	64
  14+ E366 D0                                   ret		nc							; check before we poke data if we have hit a boundary
  15+ E367 73           .canplotapixel:         ld   	(hl),e						; set colour
  16+ E368 24                                   inc 	h							; we don't check here else we would need a dec d on ret could do for optimisation of loop though
  17+ E369 15                                   dec		d
  18+ E36A C8                                   ret		z
  19+ E36B 18 F6                                jr		.multiplepixelsLoop
  20+ E36D
  21+ E36D              ; ">l2_draw_vert_line"
  22+ E36D              ; ">bc = row col d = length, e = color"
  23+ E36D 78           l2_draw_vert_line:      ld 		a,b
  24+ E36E FE C0        .offscreencheck:        cp 		SCREEN_HEIGHT
  25+ E370 D0                                   ret 	nc							; can't start off the screen
  26+ E371 7A           .emptylinecheck:        ld		a,d
  27+ E372 FE 00                                cp		0
  28+ E374 C8                                   ret		z
  29+ E375 FE 01                                cp		1
  30+ E377 20 10                                jr		nz,.multiplepixels
  31+ E379              .itsonepixel:           l2_plot_macro; call	l2_plot_pixel
  31+ E379 78          >                        ld      a,b
  31+ E37A             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
  31+ E37A FE C0       >                        cp     192
  31+ E37C D2 88 E3    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
  31+ E37F 69          >                        ld      l,c
  31+ E380 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
  31+ E383 67          >                        ld      h,a
  31+ E384 3A 7D EB    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
  31+ E387 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
  31+ E388             >.NoPlot:
  32+ E388 C9                                   ret
  33+ E389              .multiplepixels:						; so now we have at least 2 pixels to plot
  34+ E389 7A           .clipto192:             ld		a,d							; get length
  35+ E38A 80                                   add		a,b							; a= row + length
  36+ E38B 38 04                                jr		c,.needtoclip				; if it was > 255 then there is a definite need
  37+ E38D FE C0                                cp		SCREEN_HEIGHT
  38+ E38F 38 08                                jr		c, .noclipneeded
  39+ E391 78           .needtoclip             ld		a,b
  40+ E392 82                                   add		a,d
  41+ E393 D6 C0                                sub		SCREEN_HEIGHT
  42+ E395 67                                   ld		h,a							; use h as a temp holding for (row + length) - 192
  43+ E396 7A                                   ld		a,d
  44+ E397 94                                   sub		h
  45+ E398 57                                   ld		d,a							; d = length - ((row + length) - 192)
  46+ E399              ; so now BC = row col, d = length clipped, e = color
  47+ E399 78           .noclipneeded:          ld		a,b
  48+ E39A C5 D5                                push	bc,,de
  49+ E39C CD 68 E0                             call 	asm_l2_row_bank_select
  49+ E39F               	 	; we now have poke address and a variable holding current bank number
  50+ E39F D1 C1                                pop		bc,,de
  51+ E3A1 67                                   ld		h,a							; b now tolds target pixel for first plot
  52+ E3A2 69                                   ld		l,c  						; and c holds pixel column for plotting
  53+ E3A3 CD 59 E3                             call 	l2_draw_vert_segment		; draw seg, d = pixels remaining
  54+ E3A6 7A                                   ld		a,d							; a and d = nbr pixels remaining
  55+ E3A7 FE 00                                cp		0
  56+ E3A9 28 27                                jr		z, .doneplotting
  57+ E3AB 3A 00 E0     .anotherbank:           ld		a, (varL2_BANK_SELECTED)
  58+ E3AE 3C                                   inc		a
  59+ E3AF 06 00                                ld		b,0
  60+ E3B1 C5 D5                                push	bc,,de
  61+ E3B3 CD 51 E0                             call 	asm_l2_bank_n_select
  62+ E3B6 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  63+ E3B8 60                                   ld		h,b							; b now tolds target pixel for first plot
  64+ E3B9 69                                   ld		l,c  						; and c holds pixel column for plotting
  65+ E3BA CD 59 E3                             call	l2_draw_vert_segment
  66+ E3BD 7A                                   ld		a,d
  67+ E3BE FE 00                                cp		0
  68+ E3C0 28 10                                jr		z,.doneplotting
  69+ E3C2 3A 00 E0     .yetanotherbank:        ld		a, (varL2_BANK_SELECTED)
  70+ E3C5 3C                                   inc		a
  71+ E3C6 06 00                                ld		b,0
  72+ E3C8 C5 D5                                push	bc,,de
  73+ E3CA CD 51 E0                             call 	asm_l2_bank_n_select
  74+ E3CD D1                                   pop		de
  75+ E3CE E1                                   pop		hl							; hl = bc
  76+ E3CF CD 59 E3                             call	l2_draw_vert_segment		; we have now hit 192 pixels so done
  77+ E3D2 C9           .doneplotting:	        ret
  78+ E3D3
  79+ E3D3              ; ">l2_draw_vert_line_to"
  80+ E3D3              ; ">bc = row col d = to position, e = color"
  81+ E3D3 78           l2_draw_vert_line_to:   ld		a,b
  82+ E3D4 BA                                   cp		d
  83+ E3D5 38 02                                jr		c, .noyswap
  84+ E3D7 42           .yswap:                 ld		b,d			; Swap round row numbers so we are always incrementing
  85+ E3D8 57                                   ld		d,a			; now we have a top to bottom to we we can calc length from bc
  86+ E3D9 7A           .noyswap:               ld		a,d 		; we still may have d in a but only if it was bottom to top
  87+ E3DA 90                                   sub		b
  88+ E3DB 3C                                   inc		a			; so now its length not offset
  89+ E3DC 57                                   ld		d,a
  90+ E3DD 18 8E                                jr		l2_draw_vert_line	; we can hijack its clipping, 0 check and return logic
  91+ E3DF                                      ; no return needed
  92+ E3DF
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_plot_vertical.asm
 775  E3DF                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/layer2_plot_diagonal.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/layer2_plot_diagonal.asm
   1+ E3DF
   2+ E3DF              l2_draw_box_to:
   3+ E3DF              ; ">l2_draw_box_to bc=rowcol, de=torowcol a=color"
   4+ E3DF              ; ">NOT IMPLEMENTED YET"
   5+ E3DF C9           	ret
   6+ E3E0
   7+ E3E0              ;; Note l2stepx is done via self modifying code rather than an if for speed
   8+ E3E0              ;; l2stepx1 and l2stepx2 are the addresses to stick the inc or dec in
   9+ E3E0              l2decbstep	EQU $05
  10+ E3E0              l2incbstep	EQU	$04
  11+ E3E0              l2deccstep	EQU $0D
  12+ E3E0              l2inccstep	EQU	$0C
  13+ E3E0              		; l2 deltas are signed
  14+ E3E0 00 00        l2deltaY	DW	0
  15+ E3E2 00 00        l2deltaX	DW	0
  16+ E3E4 00           l2deltaYsq	db	0
  17+ E3E5 00           l2deltaXsq	db	0
  18+ E3E6 00           l2deltaYn	db	0
  19+ E3E7 00           l2deltaXn	db	0
  20+ E3E8 00           l2deltaYsqn	db	0
  21+ E3E9 00           l2deltaXsqn	db	0
  22+ E3EA 00           l2linecolor	db	0
  23+ E3EB 00 00        l2fraction	dw	0
  24+ E3ED 00 00        l2e2		dw	0
  25+ E3EF 00           l2way		db	0
  26+ E3F0 00 00        l2targetPtr	dw	0
  27+ E3F2              ;; These arrays should be 192 but if we use 256 then getting array2 value is just inc h rather than indexing again.
  28+ E3F2 00 00 00...  l2targetArray1 ds	256
  29+ E4F2 00 00 00...  l2targetArray2 ds	256
  30+ E5F2              ;; Using Bresenham Algorithm draw a diagonal line top to bottom. First we must sort of course
  31+ E5F2              ;;plotLine(int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1)
  32+ E5F2              ;;    dx =  abs(x1-x0);
  33+ E5F2              ;;    sx = x0<x1 ? 1 : -1;
  34+ E5F2              ;;    dy = -abs(y1-y0);
  35+ E5F2              ;;    sy = y0<y1 ? 1 : -1;
  36+ E5F2              ;;    err = dx+dy;  /* error value e_xy */
  37+ E5F2              ;;    while (true)   /* loop */
  38+ E5F2              ;;        plot(x0, y0);
  39+ E5F2              ;;        if (x0==x1 && y0==y1) break;
  40+ E5F2              ;;        e2 = 2*err;
  41+ E5F2              ;;        if (e2 >= dy) /* e_xy+e_x > 0 */
  42+ E5F2              ;;            err += dy;
  43+ E5F2              ;;            x0 += sx;
  44+ E5F2              ;;        end if
  45+ E5F2              ;;        if (e2 <= dx) /* e_xy+e_y < 0 */
  46+ E5F2              ;;            err += dx;
  47+ E5F2              ;;            y0 += sy;
  48+ E5F2              ;;        end if
  49+ E5F2              ;;    end while
  50+ E5F2              ; ">l2_draw_diagonal_save, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=array nbr ESOURCE LL30 or LION"
  51+ E5F2              ; ">hl will be either l2targetArray1 or 2"
  52+ E5F2              ; NOTE IF WE INTERLEAVE THESE TWO TABLES WE COUDL READ BOTH X POS as a 16 bit read
  53+ E5F2 FE 01        l2_draw_diagonal_save:  cp		1
  54+ E5F4 28 06                                jr		z,l2S_ItsArray1
  55+ E5F6 21 F2 E4                             ld		hl,l2targetArray2
  56+ E5F9 C3 FF E5                             jp		l2S_setTarget
  57+ E5FC 21 F2 E3     l2S_ItsArray1:	        ld		hl,l2targetArray1
  58+ E5FF 22 F0 E3     l2S_setTarget:	        ld		(l2targetPtr),hl
  59+ E602              ; ">l2_draw_diagonal, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color) Thsi version performs a pre sort based on y axis"
  60+ E602 32 EA E3                             ld		(l2linecolor),a					;save colour for later
  61+ E605 21 00 00                             ld		hl,0                            ;
  62+ E608 22 E2 E3                             ld		(l2deltaX),hl                   ;
  63+ E60B 22 E0 E3                             ld		(l2deltaY),hl                   ; initlaise deltas as we will only be loading 8 bit in there but workign in 16 bit later
  64+ E60E 78           l2S_preSort:            ld		a,b								;
  65+ E60F                                      JumpIfALTNusng	d,l2S_noYSort			; we must have Y1 < Y2 (if eqyal then verical line picked up earlier
  65+ E60F BA          >                        cp      d
  65+ E610 DA 18 E6    >                        jp		c, l2S_noYSort
  66+ E613              l2S_SortBasedOnY:	    ldhlbc									;
  66+ E613 60          >                        ld		h,b
  66+ E614 69          >                        ld		l,c
  67+ E615 EB                                   ex		de,hl                           ;
  68+ E616                                      ldbchl									; swap over bc and de using hl as an intermediate
  68+ E616 44          >                        ld		b,h
  68+ E617 4D          >                        ld		c,l
  69+ E618 DD 62        l2S_noYSort:		    ld		ixh,d							; ixh now holds target Y coord post sorting
  70+ E61A DD 6B                                ld		ixl,e							; ixl now holds target X coord post sorting
  71+ E61C 79           l2S_setXLen:            ld		a,c                             ;
  72+ E61D                                      JumpIfALTNusng e,l2S_PosXLen			; if x1 < x2 then we have a positive increment
  72+ E61D BB          >                        cp      e
  72+ E61E DA 2A E6    >                        jp		c, l2S_PosXLen
  73+ E621 79           l2S_NegXLen:            ld		a,c                             ;
  74+ E622 93                                   sub     e                               ;
  75+ E623 32 E2 E3                             ld		(l2deltaX),a					; As x1 > x2 we do deltaX = X1 - X2
  76+ E626 3E 0D                                ld		a,l2deccstep					; and set the value for inc dec self modifying to Dec
  77+ E628 18 07                                jr		l2S_XINCDEC
  78+ E62A 7B           l2S_PosXLen:	        ld		a,e                             ;
  79+ E62B 91                                   sub		c                               ;
  80+ E62C 32 E2 E3                             ld 		(l2deltaX),a                    ; As x1 < x2 we do deltaX = X2 - X1
  81+ E62F 3E 0C                                ld		a,l2inccstep                    ; and set the value for inc dec self modifying to Inc
  82+ E631              l2S_XINCDEC:
  83+ E631 32 9D E6     	ld		(l2S_adjustCol),a				;
  84+ E634 32 CD E6     	ld		(l2S_adjustCol2),a				; update self modifying code for X update with inc or dec from above
  85+ E637              l2S_setYLen
  86+ E637 7A           	ld		a,d							 	; presorted on Y so it is now always positive
  87+ E638 90           	sub		b
  88+ E639 32 E0 E3     	ld 		(l2deltaY),a					; DeltaY = Y2 - Y1
  89+ E63C              l2S_setErr:									;  LD H  := (D'-E')/2    round up if +ve or down if -ve
  90+ E63C              ldS_FracDYltDX:								;
  91+ E63C 2A E0 E3     	ld		hl,(l2deltaY)					; Fraction = dY - dX
  92+ E63F ED 5B E2 E3  	ld		de,(l2deltaX)
  93+ E643              	ClearCarryFlag
  93+ E643 B7          >                        or a
  94+ E644 ED 52        	sbc		hl,de							; sbc does not have an SBC IY so need to do this in HL
  95+ E646 EB           	ex		de,hl
  96+ E647 FD 62        	ld		iyh,d							; we will use IY reg for fractions
  97+ E649 FD 6B        	ld		iyl,e
  98+ E64B F2 70 E6     	jp		p,l2S_fracIsPositive
  99+ E64E              l2S_fracIsNegative:
 100+ E64E              	NegIY
 100+ E64E AF          >                    xor a
 100+ E64F FD 95       >                    sub iyl
 100+ E651 FD 6F       >                    ld iyl,a
 100+ E653 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 100+ E654 FD 94       >                    sub iyh
 100+ E656 FD 67       >                    ld iyh,a
 101+ E658              	ShiftIYRight1
 101+ E658 FD 7C       >			   ld 	a,iyh
 101+ E65A CB 3F       >			   srl 	a
 101+ E65C FD 67       >			   ld	iyh,a
 101+ E65E FD 7D       >			   ld 	a,iyl
 101+ E660 1F          >			   rra
 101+ E661 FD 6F       >			   ld	iyl,a
 102+ E663              	NegIY
 102+ E663 AF          >                    xor a
 102+ E664 FD 95       >                    sub iyl
 102+ E666 FD 6F       >                    ld iyl,a
 102+ E668 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 102+ E669 FD 94       >                    sub iyh
 102+ E66B FD 67       >                    ld iyh,a
 103+ E66D C3 7B E6     	jp		l2S_SkipCalcInc					; so we have a negative frac
 104+ E670              l2S_fracIsPositive:
 105+ E670              	ShiftIYRight1
 105+ E670 FD 7C       >			   ld 	a,iyh
 105+ E672 CB 3F       >			   srl 	a
 105+ E674 FD 67       >			   ld	iyh,a
 105+ E676 FD 7D       >			   ld 	a,iyl
 105+ E678 1F          >			   rra
 105+ E679 FD 6F       >			   ld	iyl,a
 106+ E67B              l2S_SkipCalcInc:
 107+ E67B              l2S_Loop:									; As we loop, bc = to plot current XY
 108+ E67B 2A F0 E3     	ld		hl,(l2targetPtr)				; Insert into respective array
 109+ E67E 78           	ld		a,b
 110+ E67F ED 31        	add		hl,a
 111+ E681 71           	ld		(hl),c
 112+ E682              l2S_CheckIfEnd:
 113+ E682 DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh
 114+ E684              	JumpIfAGTENusng	  b,l2S_CheckXPos		; if Y1 < Y2 then continue regardless, when it hits Y2 then we must check X1 and X2
 114+ E684 B8          >                        cp     b
 114+ E685 D2 8B E6    >                        jp		nc,l2S_CheckXPos
 115+ E688 C3 8F E6     	jp		l2S_Continue
 116+ E68B              l2S_CheckXPos:
 117+ E68B 79           	ld		a,c
 118+ E68C              	ReturnIfAGTENusng ixl					; if X1 has reached or exceeded X2 then we are done
 118+ E68C DD BD       >                        cp    ixl
 118+ E68E D0          >                        ret	 nc
 119+ E68F              l2S_Continue:
 120+ E68F              l2S_HNegative:
 121+ E68F FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh
 122+ E691 CB 7F        	bit		7,a								; if its negative then we need to deal with delta Y, there is no bit n,iyh instrunction
 123+ E693 28 0B        	jr		z,l2S_ErrNotNegative			;
 124+ E695              l2S_ErrNegative:								; if its a negative error update X
 125+ E695 3A E0 E3     	ld		a,(l2deltaY)
 126+ E698 16 00        	ld		d,0
 127+ E69A 5F           	ld		e,a
 128+ E69B FD 19        	add		iy,de							; add deltaY(unsinged) to l2fraction
 129+ E69D              l2S_adjustCol:
 130+ E69D 00           	nop										; this is our inc/dec of X
 131+ E69E 18 DB        	jr		l2S_Loop							; repeat loop
 132+ E6A0              l2S_ErrNotNegative:
 133+ E6A0 FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh
 134+ E6A2 FD B5        	or		iyl
 135+ E6A4              	JumpIfAIsZero l2S_ErrZero					; if there is no error then goto zeroerror
 135+ E6A4 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 135+ E6A5 CA BE E6    >                        jp	    z, l2S_ErrZero
 136+ E6A8              l2S_ErrPositive:								; if its a positive error then we update Y
 137+ E6A8              	lddeiy
 137+ E6A8 FD 54       >                        ld		d,iyh
 137+ E6AA FD 5D       >                        ld		e,iyl
 138+ E6AC EB           	ex		de,hl
 139+ E6AD 16 00        	ld		d,0
 140+ E6AF 3A E2 E3     	ld		a,(l2deltaX)
 141+ E6B2 5F           	ld		e,a
 142+ E6B3              	ClearCarryFlag
 142+ E6B3 B7          >                        or a
 143+ E6B4 ED 52        	sbc		hl,de
 144+ E6B6 EB           	ex		de,hl
 145+ E6B7              	ldiyde
 145+ E6B7 FD 62       >                        ld		iyh,d
 145+ E6B9 FD 6B       >                        ld		iyl,e
 146+ E6BB              l2S_adjustRow:									; move Y down by one
 147+ E6BB 04           	inc		b
 148+ E6BC 18 BD        	jr		l2S_Loop
 149+ E6BE              l2S_ErrZero:
 150+ E6BE 2A E2 E3     	ld		hl,(l2deltaX)
 151+ E6C1 EB           	ex		de,hl
 152+ E6C2 2A E0 E3     	ld		hl,(l2deltaY)
 153+ E6C5              	ClearCarryFlag
 153+ E6C5 B7          >                        or a
 154+ E6C6 ED 52        	sbc		hl,de
 155+ E6C8 EB           	ex		de,hl
 156+ E6C9              	ldiyde
 156+ E6C9 FD 62       >                        ld		iyh,d
 156+ E6CB FD 6B       >                        ld		iyl,e
 157+ E6CD              l2S_adjustCol2:
 158+ E6CD 00           	nop										; update X and Y
 159+ E6CE 04           	inc		b
 160+ E6CF 18 AA        	jr		l2S_Loop
 161+ E6D1
 162+ E6D1              ; ">l2_draw_diagonal, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color) Thsi version performs a pre sort based on y axis"
 163+ E6D1 32 EA E3     l2_draw_diagonal:       ld		(l2linecolor),a					;save colour for later
 164+ E6D4 21 00 00                             ld		hl,0                            ;
 165+ E6D7 22 E2 E3                             ld		(l2deltaX),hl                   ;
 166+ E6DA 22 E0 E3                             ld		(l2deltaY),hl                   ; initlaise deltas as we will only be loading 8 bit in there but workign in 16 bit later
 167+ E6DD 78           l2D_preSort:            ld		a,b								;
 168+ E6DE                                      JumpIfALTNusng	d,l2D_noYSort			; we must have Y1 < Y2 (if equal then verical line picked up earlier
 168+ E6DE BA          >                        cp      d
 168+ E6DF DA E7 E6    >                        jp		c, l2D_noYSort
 169+ E6E2              l2D_SortBasedOnY:	    ldhlbc									;
 169+ E6E2 60          >                        ld		h,b
 169+ E6E3 69          >                        ld		l,c
 170+ E6E4 EB                                   ex		de,hl                           ;
 171+ E6E5                                      ldbchl									; swap over bc and de using hl as an intermediate
 171+ E6E5 44          >                        ld		b,h
 171+ E6E6 4D          >                        ld		c,l
 172+ E6E7 DD 62        l2D_noYSort:		    ld		ixh,d							; ixh now holds target Y coord post sorting
 173+ E6E9 DD 6B                                ld		ixl,e							; ixl now holds target X coord post sorting
 174+ E6EB 79           l2D_setXLen:            ld		a,c                             ;
 175+ E6EC                                      JumpIfALTNusng e,l2D_PosXLen			; if x1 < x2 then we have a positive increment
 175+ E6EC BB          >                        cp      e
 175+ E6ED DA F9 E6    >                        jp		c, l2D_PosXLen
 176+ E6F0 79           l2D_NegXLen:            ld		a,c                             ;
 177+ E6F1 93                                   sub     e                               ;
 178+ E6F2 32 E2 E3                             ld		(l2deltaX),a					; As x1 > x2 we do deltaX = X1 - X2
 179+ E6F5 3E 0D                                ld		a,l2deccstep					; and set the value for inc dec self modifying to Dec
 180+ E6F7 18 07                                jr		l2D_XINCDEC
 181+ E6F9 7B           l2D_PosXLen:	        ld		a,e                             ;
 182+ E6FA 91                                   sub		c                               ;
 183+ E6FB 32 E2 E3                             ld 		(l2deltaX),a                    ; As x1 < x2 we do deltaX = X2 - X1
 184+ E6FE 3E 0C                                ld		a,l2inccstep                    ; and set the value for inc dec self modifying to Inc
 185+ E700 32 6F E7     l2D_XINCDEC:	        ld		(l2D_adjustCol),a				;
 186+ E703 32 9F E7                             ld		(l2D_adjustCol2),a				; update self modifying code for X update with inc or dec from above
 187+ E706 7A           l2D_setYLen				ld		a,d							 	; presorted on Y so it is now always positive
 188+ E707 90                                   sub		b
 189+ E708 32 E0 E3                             ld 		(l2deltaY),a					; DeltaY = Y2 - Y1
 190+ E70B              l2D_setErr:									;  LD H  := (D'-E')/2    round up if +ve or down if -ve
 191+ E70B 2A E0 E3     ldD_FracDYltDX:			ld		hl,(l2deltaY)					; Fraction = dY - dX
 192+ E70E ED 5B E2 E3                          ld		de,(l2deltaX)
 193+ E712                                      ClearCarryFlag
 193+ E712 B7          >                        or a
 194+ E713 ED 52                                sbc		hl,de							; sbc does not have an SBC IY so need to do this in HL
 195+ E715 EB                                   ex		de,hl
 196+ E716 FD 62                                ld		iyh,d							; we will use IY reg for fractions
 197+ E718 FD 6B                                ld		iyl,e
 198+ E71A F2 3F E7                             jp		p,l2D_fracIsPositive
 199+ E71D              l2D_fracIsNegative:     NegIY
 199+ E71D AF          >                    xor a
 199+ E71E FD 95       >                    sub iyl
 199+ E720 FD 6F       >                    ld iyl,a
 199+ E722 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 199+ E723 FD 94       >                    sub iyh
 199+ E725 FD 67       >                    ld iyh,a
 200+ E727                                      ShiftIYRight1
 200+ E727 FD 7C       >			   ld 	a,iyh
 200+ E729 CB 3F       >			   srl 	a
 200+ E72B FD 67       >			   ld	iyh,a
 200+ E72D FD 7D       >			   ld 	a,iyl
 200+ E72F 1F          >			   rra
 200+ E730 FD 6F       >			   ld	iyl,a
 201+ E732                                      NegIY
 201+ E732 AF          >                    xor a
 201+ E733 FD 95       >                    sub iyl
 201+ E735 FD 6F       >                    ld iyl,a
 201+ E737 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 201+ E738 FD 94       >                    sub iyh
 201+ E73A FD 67       >                    ld iyh,a
 202+ E73C C3 4A E7                             jp		l2D_SkipCalcInc					; so we have a negative frac
 203+ E73F              l2D_fracIsPositive:     ShiftIYRight1
 203+ E73F FD 7C       >			   ld 	a,iyh
 203+ E741 CB 3F       >			   srl 	a
 203+ E743 FD 67       >			   ld	iyh,a
 203+ E745 FD 7D       >			   ld 	a,iyl
 203+ E747 1F          >			   rra
 203+ E748 FD 6F       >			   ld	iyl,a
 204+ E74A              l2D_SkipCalcInc:
 205+ E74A C5 D5        l2D_Loop:				push	bc,,de                 			; l2DeltaY and l2DeltaX are set
 206+ E74C 3A EA E3                             ld		a,(l2linecolor)     			;
 207+ E74F CD 83 E1                             call	l2_plot_pixel       			; Plot Pixel
 208+ E752 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
 209+ E754 DD 7C        l2D_CheckIfEnd:	        ld		a,ixh
 210+ E756                                      JumpIfAGTENusng	  b,l2D_CheckXPos		; if Y1 < Y2 then continue regardless, when it hits Y2 then we must check X1 and X2
 210+ E756 B8          >                        cp     b
 210+ E757 D2 5D E7    >                        jp		nc,l2D_CheckXPos
 211+ E75A C3 61 E7                             jp		l2D_Continue
 212+ E75D 79           l2D_CheckXPos:          ld		a,c
 213+ E75E                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ixl					; if X1 has reached or exceeded X2 then we are done
 213+ E75E DD BD       >                        cp      ixl
 213+ E760 C8          >                        ret     z
 214+ E761              l2D_Continue:
 215+ E761 FD 7C        l2D_HNegative:			ld		a,iyh
 216+ E763 CB 7F                                bit		7,a								; if its negative then we need to deal with delta Y, there is no bit n,iyh instrunction
 217+ E765 28 0B                                jr		z,l2D_ErrNotNegative			;
 218+ E767 3A E0 E3     l2D_ErrNegative:		ld		a,(l2deltaY)
 219+ E76A 16 00                                ld		d,0
 220+ E76C 5F                                   ld		e,a
 221+ E76D FD 19                                add		iy,de							; add deltaY(unsinged) to l2fraction
 222+ E76F 00           l2D_adjustCol:          nop										; this is our inc/dec of X
 223+ E770 18 D8                                jr		l2D_Loop							; repeat loop
 224+ E772 FD 7C        l2D_ErrNotNegative:     ld		a,iyh
 225+ E774 FD B5                                or		iyl
 226+ E776                                      JumpIfAIsZero l2D_ErrZero					; if there is no error then goto zeroerror
 226+ E776 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 226+ E777 CA 90 E7    >                        jp	    z, l2D_ErrZero
 227+ E77A              l2D_ErrPositive:		lddeiy
 227+ E77A FD 54       >                        ld		d,iyh
 227+ E77C FD 5D       >                        ld		e,iyl
 228+ E77E EB                                   ex		de,hl
 229+ E77F 16 00                                ld		d,0
 230+ E781 3A E2 E3                             ld		a,(l2deltaX)
 231+ E784 5F                                   ld		e,a
 232+ E785                                      ClearCarryFlag
 232+ E785 B7          >                        or a
 233+ E786 ED 52                                sbc		hl,de
 234+ E788 EB                                   ex		de,hl
 235+ E789                                      ldiyde
 235+ E789 FD 62       >                        ld		iyh,d
 235+ E78B FD 6B       >                        ld		iyl,e
 236+ E78D 04           l2D_adjustRow:			inc		b
 237+ E78E 18 BA                                jr		l2D_Loop
 238+ E790 2A E2 E3     l2D_ErrZero:            ld		hl,(l2deltaX)
 239+ E793 EB                                   ex		de,hl
 240+ E794 2A E0 E3                             ld		hl,(l2deltaY)
 241+ E797                                      ClearCarryFlag
 241+ E797 B7          >                        or a
 242+ E798 ED 52                                sbc		hl,de
 243+ E79A EB                                   ex		de,hl
 244+ E79B                                      ldiyde
 244+ E79B FD 62       >                        ld		iyh,d
 244+ E79D FD 6B       >                        ld		iyl,e
 245+ E79F 00           l2D_adjustCol2:         nop										; update X and Y
 246+ E7A0 04                                   inc		b
 247+ E7A1 18 A7                                jr		l2D_Loop
 248+ E7A3              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 249+ E7A3
 250+ E7A3
 251+ E7A3
 252+ E7A3
 253+ E7A3              ;Loin:				; BBC version of line draw
 254+ E7A3              ;; ">l2_draw_diagonal, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color)"
 255+ E7A3              ;	ld		(l2linecolor),a					; save colour as a reg gets used alot, coudl move this into interrupt flag and disable interrups
 256+ E7A3              ;	ld		ixh,0							; ixh = s
 257+ E7A3              ;	ld		iyh,0							; iyh = swap
 258+ E7A3              ;	ld		l,0								; l will hold delta sign flags
 259+ E7A3              ;LoinCalcDeltaX:
 260+ E7A3              ;	ld		a,e
 261+ E7A3              ;	sub		c								; a = deltaX
 262+ E7A3              ;	JumpIfPositive LoinPosDx
 263+ E7A3              ;LoinNegDx:
 264+ E7A3              ;	neg										; carry flag will indicate deltaX was negative
 265+ E7A3              ;	ld		l,$80							; set bit 7 of l for negative
 266+ E7A3              ;LoinPosDx:
 267+ E7A3              ;	ld		ixl,a							; ixl = varP = deltaX
 268+ E7A3              ;LoinCalcDeltaY:
 269+ E7A3              ;	ld		a,d
 270+ E7A3              ;	sub		b								; a= deltaY
 271+ E7A3              ;	JumpIfPositive LoinPosDy
 272+ E7A3              ;LoinNegDy:
 273+ E7A3              ;	neg
 274+ E7A3              ;	set		6,l								; set bit 6 of l for negative deltaY
 275+ E7A3              ;LoinPosDy:
 276+ E7A3              ;	ld		iyl,a							; iyl = varQ = deltaY
 277+ E7A3              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng ixl, LoinSTPy			; if deltaY >= DeltaX then step along Y
 278+ E7A3              ;LoinSTPx:									; step along X
 279+ E7A3              ;	JumpOnBitClear l,7						; if l flags were clear then X2 < X2
 280+ E7A3              ;LoinSTPxSwapCoords:
 281+ E7A3              ;	dec		iyh								; swap flag now becomes FF
 282+ E7A3              ;	ld		a,l								; save l flags
 283+ E7A3              ;	ex		de,hl							; save de to hl
 284+ E7A3              ;	lddebc									; Point2 = point1
 285+ E7A3              ;	ldbchl									; Point1 = point2 that was saved
 286+ E7A3              ;	ld		l,a								; get back l flags
 287+ E7A3              ;LoinSTPxCorrectOrder:
 288+ E7A3              ;	l2_point_pixel_y_safe					; call plot pixel preseving bc hl
 289+ E7A3              ;	ld		a,iyl							; get delta Y back
 290+ E7A3              ;	ld		iy1,$FE							; roll counter
 291+ E7A3              ;LionSTPxRollQ:
 292+ E7A3              ;	sla		a								; highest bit of delta-Y
 293+ E7A3              ;	jp		c,LoinSTPxSteep
 294+ E7A3              ;	cp		ixl								; compare with DeltaX
 295+ E7A3              ;	jp		cs,LoinSTPxShallow
 296+ E7A3              ;LoinSTPxSteep:								;; LI4
 297+ E7A3              ;	sbc		a,ixl							; deltaYwork -= (deltaX+1)
 298+ E7A3              ;	scf										; force carry flag set
 299+ E7A3              ;LoinSTPxShallow:							;; LI5
 300+ E7A3              ;	rl		iyl								; rotate iyl which started as FE
 301+ E7A3              ;	jp		c,LionSTPxRollQ					; so we are doing a 6 bit loop
 302+ E7A3              ;	inc		ihl								; DeltaX += 1
 303+ E7A3              ;LoinSTPxYDirection:							; change this to self modifying code
 304+ E7A3              ;	ld		a,d
 305+ E7A3              ;	JumpIfAGTEn	b,LionDOWN:
 306+ E7A3              ;	ld		a,iyh							; swap flag
 307+ E7A3              ;	JumpIfANotZero	X1Inc  					; if swap flag was not set then no need to update R
 308+ E7A3              ;LoinSTPxX1Dec:
 309+ E7A3              ;	dec		c								; move left 1 pixel as we sawped
 310+ E7A3              ;LoinSTPxXCounter:							;; LIL2
 311+ E7A3              ;	sub		b
 312+ E7A3              ;	if
 313+ E7A3              ;
 314+ E7A3              ;85 82                   STA &82	   \ R	\ mask byte
 315+ E7A3              ;A5 81                   LDA &81	   \ Q	\ delta-Y
 316+ E7A3              ;A2 FE                   LDX #&FE	\ roll counter
 317+ E7A3              ;86 81                   STX &81		\ Q
 318+ E7A3              ;.LIL1	\ roll Q
 319+ E7A3              ;0A                      ASL A		\ highest bit of delta-Y
 320+ E7A3              ;B0 04                   BCS LI4		\ steep
 321+ E7A3              ;C5 1B                   CMP &1B	   \ P	\ delta-X
 322+ E7A3              ;90 03                   BCC LI5		\ shallow
 323+ E7A3              ;.LI4	\ steep
 324+ E7A3              ;E5 1B                   SBC &1B		\ P
 325+ E7A3              ;38                      SEC
 326+ E7A3              ;.LI5	\ shallow
 327+ E7A3              ;26 81                   ROL &81	   \ Q	\ #&FE
 328+ E7A3              ;B0 F2                   BCS LIL1 	\ loop Q, end with some low bits in Q
 329+ E7A3              ;A6 1B                   LDX &1B		\ P
 330+ E7A3              ;E8                      INX 		\ Xreg is width
 331+ E7A3              ;A5 37                   LDA &37		\ Y2
 332+ E7A3              ;E5 35                   SBC &35		\ Y1
 333+ E7A3              ;B0 2C                   BCS DOWN	\ draw line to the right and down
 334+ E7A3              ;A5 90                   LDA &90		\ SWAP
 335+ E7A3              ;D0 07                   BNE LI6		\ else Xreg was correct after all, no need to update R
 336+ E7A3              ;CA                      DEX
 337+ E7A3              ;.LIL2	\ counter X width
 338+ E7A3              ;A5 82                   LDA &82	   \ R	\ mask byte
 339+ E7A3              ;51 07                   EOR (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 340+ E7A3              ;91 07                   STA (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 341+ E7A3              ;.LI6	\ Xreg correct
 342+ E7A3              ;46 82                   LSR &82	   \ R	\ mask byte
 343+ E7A3              ;90 08                   BCC LI7   	\ else moving to next column to right. Bring carry in back
 344+ E7A3              ;66 82                   ROR &82		\ R
 345+ E7A3              ;A5 07                   LDA &07		\ SC
 346+ E7A3              ;69 08                   ADC #8		\ next column
 347+ E7A3              ;85 07                   STA &07		\ SC
 348+ E7A3              ;.LI7	\ S += Q. this is like an overflow monitor to update Y
 349+ E7A3              ;A5 83                   LDA &83		\ S
 350+ E7A3              ;65 81                   ADC &81	   \ Q	\ some low bits
 351+ E7A3              ;85 83                   STA &83		\ S
 352+ E7A3              ;90 07                   BCC LIC2	\ skip Y adjustment
 353+ E7A3              ;88                      DEY
 354+ E7A3              ;10 04                   BPL LIC2	\ skip Y adjustment
 355+ E7A3              ;C6 08                   DEC &08		\ SC+1
 356+ E7A3              ;A0 07                   LDY #7
 357+ E7A3              ;.LIC2	\ skip Y adjustment
 358+ E7A3              ;CA                      DEX
 359+ E7A3              ;D0 DC                   BNE LIL2	\ loop X width
 360+ E7A3              ;A4 85                   LDY &85	 \ YSAV \ restore Yreg
 361+ E7A3              ;60                      RTS
 362+ E7A3              ;
 363+ E7A3              ;.DOWN	\ Line is going to the right and down
 364+ E7A3              ;A5 90                   LDA &90		\ SWAP
 365+ E7A3              ;F0 07                   BEQ LI9		\ no swap
 366+ E7A3              ;CA                      DEX
 367+ E7A3              ;.LIL3	\ counter X width
 368+ E7A3              ;A5 82                   LDA &82	    \ R \ mask byte
 369+ E7A3              ;51 07                   EOR (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 370+ E7A3              ;91 07                   STA (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 371+ E7A3              ;.LI9	\ no swap
 372+ E7A3              ;46 82                   LSR &82		\ R
 373+ E7A3              ;90 08                   BCC LI10	\ still in correct column, hop
 374+ E7A3              ;66 82                   ROR &82		\ R
 375+ E7A3              ;A5 07                   LDA &07		\ SC
 376+ E7A3              ;69 08                   ADC #8		\ next column
 377+ E7A3              ;85 07                   STA &07		\ SC
 378+ E7A3              ;.LI10	\ this is like an overflow monitor to update Y
 379+ E7A3              ;A5 83                   LDA &83		\ S
 380+ E7A3              ;65 81                   ADC &81		\ Q
 381+ E7A3              ;85 83                   STA &83		\ S
 382+ E7A3              ;90 09                   BCC LIC3	\ skip Y adjustment
 383+ E7A3              ;C8                      INY
 384+ E7A3              ;C0 08                   CPY #8
 385+ E7A3              ;D0 04                   BNE LIC3	\ have not reached bottom byte of char, hop
 386+ E7A3              ;E6 08                   INC &08		\ SC+1
 387+ E7A3              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 388+ E7A3              ;.LIC3	\ skipped Y adjustment
 389+ E7A3              ;CA                      DEX
 390+ E7A3              ;D0 DA                   BNE LIL3	\ loop X width
 391+ E7A3              ;A4 85                   LDY &85	 \ YSAV \ restore Yreg
 392+ E7A3              ;60                      RTS
 393+ E7A3              ;
 394+ E7A3              ;.STPY	\ -> &1797 \ Step along y for line, goes down and to right
 395+ E7A3              ;A4 35                   LDY &35		\ Y1
 396+ E7A3              ;98                      TYA
 397+ E7A3              ;A6 34                   LDX &34		\ X1
 398+ E7A3              ;C4 37                   CPY &37		\ Y2
 399+ E7A3              ;B0 10                   BCS LI15	\ skip swap if Y1 >= Y2
 400+ E7A3              ;C6 90                   DEC &90		\ SWAP
 401+ E7A3              ;A5 36                   LDA &36		\ X2
 402+ E7A3              ;85 34                   STA &34		\ X1
 403+ E7A3              ;86 36                   STX &36		\ X2
 404+ E7A3              ;AA                      TAX
 405+ E7A3              ;A5 37                   LDA &37		\ Y2
 406+ E7A3              ;85 35                   STA &35		\ Y1
 407+ E7A3              ;84 37                   STY &37		\ Y2
 408+ E7A3              ;A8                      TAY
 409+ E7A3              ;.LI15	\ Y1 Y2 order is now correct
 410+ E7A3              ;4A                      LSR A
 411+ E7A3              ;4A                      LSR A
 412+ E7A3              ;4A                      LSR A
 413+ E7A3              ;09 60                   ORA #&60
 414+ E7A3              ;85 08                   STA &08	 \ SC+1	\ screen hi
 415+ E7A3              ;8A                      TXA 		\ X1
 416+ E7A3              ;29 F8                   AND #&F8
 417+ E7A3              ;85 07                   STA &07	  \ SC	\ screen lo
 418+ E7A3              ;8A                      TXA
 419+ E7A3              ;29 07                   AND #7		\ mask index
 420+ E7A3              ;AA                      TAX
 421+ E7A3              ;BD AF 16                LDA &16AF,X \ TWOS,X \ Mode4 single pixel
 422+ E7A3              ;85 82                   STA &82	    \ R	\ mask
 423+ E7A3              ;A5 35                   LDA &35		\ Y1
 424+ E7A3              ;29 07                   AND #7
 425+ E7A3              ;A8                      TAY
 426+ E7A3              ;A5 1B                   LDA &1B	    \ P	\ delta-X
 427+ E7A3              ;A2 01                   LDX #1		\ roll counter
 428+ E7A3              ;86 1B                   STX &1B	    	\ P
 429+ E7A3              ;.LIL4	\ roll P
 430+ E7A3              ;0A                      ASL A
 431+ E7A3              ;B0 04                   BCS LI13	\ do subtraction
 432+ E7A3              ;C5 81                   CMP &81	    \ Q	\ delta-Y
 433+ E7A3              ;90 03                   BCC LI14	\ less than Q
 434+ E7A3              ;.LI13	\ do subtraction
 435+ E7A3              ;E5 81                   SBC &81		\ Q
 436+ E7A3              ;38                      SEC
 437+ E7A3              ;.LI14	\ less than Q
 438+ E7A3              ;26 1B                   ROL &1B		\ P
 439+ E7A3              ;90 F2                   BCC LIL4	\ loop P, end with some low bits in P
 440+ E7A3              ;A6 81                   LDX &81		\ Q
 441+ E7A3              ;E8                      INX 		\ adjust height
 442+ E7A3              ;A5 36                   LDA &36		\ X2
 443+ E7A3              ;E5 34                   SBC &34		\ X1
 444+ E7A3              ;90 2D                   BCC LFT		\ if C cleared then line moving to the left - hop down
 445+ E7A3              ;18                      CLC
 446+ E7A3              ;A5 90                   LDA &90		\ SWAP
 447+ E7A3              ;F0 07                   BEQ LI17 	\ skip first point
 448+ E7A3              ;CA                      DEX
 449+ E7A3              ;.LIL5	\ skipped first point, counter X
 450+ E7A3              ;A5 82                   LDA &82	    \ R \ mask byte
 451+ E7A3              ;51 07                   EOR (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 452+ E7A3              ;91 07                   STA (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 453+ E7A3              ;.LI17	\ skipped first point
 454+ E7A3              ;88                      DEY
 455+ E7A3              ;10 04                   BPL LI16	\ skip hi adjust
 456+ E7A3              ;C6 08                   DEC &08		\ SC+1
 457+ E7A3              ;A0 07                   LDY #7		\ new char
 458+ E7A3              ;	.LI16	\ skipped hi adjust
 459+ E7A3              ;A5 83                   LDA &83		\ S
 460+ E7A3              ;65 1B                   ADC &1B		\ P
 461+ E7A3              ;85 83                   STA &83		\ S
 462+ E7A3              ;90 0C                   BCC LIC5	\ skip, still in same column
 463+ E7A3              ;46 82                   LSR &82	  \ R	\ mask
 464+ E7A3              ;90 08                   BCC LIC5  	\ no mask bit hop
 465+ E7A3              ;66 82                   ROR &82   \ R	\ else moved over to next column, reset mask
 466+ E7A3              ;A5 07                   LDA &07	  \ SC  \ screen lo
 467+ E7A3              ;69 08                   ADC #8		\ next char below
 468+ E7A3              ;85 07                   STA &07		\ SC
 469+ E7A3              ;.LIC5	\ same column
 470+ E7A3              ;CA                      DEX
 471+ E7A3              ;D0 DC                   BNE LIL5	\ loop X height
 472+ E7A3              ;A4 85                   LDY &85	 \ YSAV	\ restore Yreg
 473+ E7A3              ;60                      RTS
 474+ E7A3              ;
 475+ E7A3              ;.LFT	\ going left
 476+ E7A3              ;A5 90                   LDA &90		\ SWAP
 477+ E7A3              ;F0 07                   BEQ LI18	\ skip first point
 478+ E7A3              ;CA                      DEX 		\ reduce height
 479+ E7A3              ;.LIL6	\ counter X height
 480+ E7A3              ;A5 82                   LDA &82	   \ R	\ mask byte
 481+ E7A3              ;51 07                   EOR (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 482+ E7A3              ;91 07                   STA (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 483+ E7A3              ;.LI18
 484+ E7A3              ;88                      DEY
 485+ E7A3              ;10 04                   BPL LI19	\ skip hi adjust
 486+ E7A3              ;C6 08                   DEC &08		\ SC+1
 487+ E7A3              ;A0 07                   LDY #7		\ rest char row
 488+ E7A3              ;.LI19	\ skipped hi adjust
 489+ E7A3              ;A5 83                   LDA &83		\ S
 490+ E7A3              ;65 1B                   ADC &1B	    \ P \ some low bits
 491+ E7A3              ;85 83                   STA &83		\ S
 492+ E7A3              ;90 0D                   BCC LIC6	\ no overflow
 493+ E7A3              ;06 82                   ASL &82	    \ R \ else move byte mask to the left
 494+ E7A3              ;90 09                   BCC LIC6	\ no overflow
 495+ E7A3              ;26 82                   ROL &82		\ R
 496+ E7A3              ;A5 07                   LDA &07		\ SC
 497+ E7A3              ;E9 07                   SBC #7		\ down 1 char
 498+ E7A3              ;85 07                   STA &07		\ SC
 499+ E7A3              ;18                      CLC
 500+ E7A3              ;.LIC6	\ no overflow
 501+ E7A3              ;CA                      DEX 		\ height
 502+ E7A3              ;D0 DB                   BNE LIL6	\ loop X
 503+ E7A3              ;A4 85                   LDY &85	 \ YSAV	\ restore Yreg
 504+ E7A3              ;.HL6
 505+ E7A3              ;60                      RTS 		\ end Line drawing
 506+ E7A3
 507+ E7A3
 508+ E7A3              ;;l2_draw_diagonalopt:
 509+ E7A3              	; ">TODO l2_draw_diagonalopt fast horz vert optmisation"
 510+ E7A3              ;;	push	af
 511+ E7A3              ;;	ld		a,b
 512+ E7A3              ;;	cp		d
 513+ E7A3              ;;	jr		z,.RegularDiagnonal
 514+ E7A3              ;;.CheckHorz:
 515+ E7A3              ;;	ld		a,c
 516+ E7A3              ;;	cp		e
 517+ E7A3              ;;	jr		z,.horizontalLine
 518+ E7A3              ;;.RegularDiagnonal:
 519+ E7A3              ;;	pop		af
 520+ E7A3              ;;	call diag
 521+ E7A3
 522+ E7A3
 523+ E7A3              ;;l2_signed_mul2a:
 524+ E7A3              ;;; ">l2_signed_mul2a - Signed a = a * 2 using shift)"
 525+ E7A3              ;;	TEST	$80
 526+ E7A3              ;;	jr		nz, .negativecalc
 527+ E7A3              ;;.positivecalc:
 528+ E7A3              ;;	ccf
 529+ E7A3              ;;	rla
 530+ E7A3              ;;	ret
 531+ E7A3              ;;.negativecalc:
 532+ E7A3              ;;	neg
 533+ E7A3              ;;	ccf
 534+ E7A3              ;;	rla
 535+ E7A3              ;;	neg
 536+ E7A3              ;;	ret
 537+ E7A3              ;;
 538+ E7A3              ;;l2_signed_mul2atohl:
 539+ E7A3              ;;; ">l2_signed_mul2ahl - Signed hl = a * 2 using shift)"
 540+ E7A3              ;;	TEST	$80
 541+ E7A3              ;;	jr		nz, .negativecalc
 542+ E7A3              ;;.positivecalc:
 543+ E7A3              ;;	ld		hl,0
 544+ E7A3              ;;	ld		l,a
 545+ E7A3              ;;	add		hl,a
 546+ E7A3              ;;	ret
 547+ E7A3              ;;.negativecalc:
 548+ E7A3              ;;	neg
 549+ E7A3              ;;	ld		hl,0
 550+ E7A3              ;;	ld		l,a
 551+ E7A3              ;;	neghl
 552+ E7A3              ;;	ret
 553+ E7A3              ;;
 554+ E7A3              ;;l2_e2fractionby2:
 555+ E7A3              ;;	ld 		hl,(l2fraction)
 556+ E7A3              ;;	push	de
 557+ E7A3              ;;	ld		d,h
 558+ E7A3              ;;	ld		e,l
 559+ E7A3              ;;	add		hl,de
 560+ E7A3              ;;	pop		de
 561+ E7A3              ;;	ld		(l2e2),hl
 562+ E7A3              ;;	ret
 563+ E7A3
 564+ E7A3
 565+ E7A3
 566+ E7A3
 567+ E7A3
 568+ E7A3              ;;//	ld		(l2linecolor),a   			; could do an ex but it will be needed multiple times between many uses of a reg
 569+ E7A3              ;;//.catchLoop:
 570+ E7A3              ;;//	jp .catchLoop
 571+ E7A3              ;;//.continue:
 572+ E7A3              ;;//    ld      A,D
 573+ E7A3              ;;//    sub     H
 574+ E7A3              ;;//    jr      NC,.DXpositive    ;delta_x > 0
 575+ E7A3              ;;//.DXNegative:
 576+ E7A3              ;;//    neg
 577+ E7A3              ;;//.DXPositive:
 578+ E7A3              ;;//    ld      B,A              ;B <- |delta_x|
 579+ E7A3              ;;//    ld      A,E
 580+ E7A3              ;;//    sub     L
 581+ E7A3              ;;//    jr      NC,.DYpositive    ;delta_y > 0
 582+ E7A3              ;;//.DYNegative:
 583+ E7A3              ;;//    neg
 584+ E7A3              ;;//.DYPositive:
 585+ E7A3              ;;//    sub     B               ;|delta_y|
 586+ E7A3              ;;//	push	af
 587+ E7A3              ;;//	jr		c,.DeltaX
 588+ E7A3              ;;//.DeltaY
 589+ E7A3              ;;//	ld      A,H             			;if |delta_x| < |delta_y| then
 590+ E7A3              ;;//    ld      H,L             			;then values x and y are swapped
 591+ E7A3              ;;//    ld      L,A             			;so the loop will always be performed on the
 592+ E7A3              ;;//    ld      A,D             			;x value. A flag must be set to
 593+ E7A3              ;;//    ld      D,E             			;remind that data must be drawn (y,x)
 594+ E7A3              ;;//    ld      E,A             			;instead of (x,y)
 595+ E7A3              ;;//.DeltaX:
 596+ E7A3              ;;//	ld		a,d
 597+ E7A3              ;;//	sub		h
 598+ E7A3              ;;//	jr		nc,.TestDY					; x1 < x2
 599+ E7A3              ;;//.TestDX:
 600+ E7A3              ;;//	ex		de,hl
 601+ E7A3              ;;//.TestDY:
 602+ E7A3              ;;//	ld		a,e
 603+ E7A3              ;;//	sub		l
 604+ E7A3              ;;//    ld      A,$01
 605+ E7A3              ;;//    jr      NC,.StoreA
 606+ E7A3              ;;//    neg                     ;y1 > y2 : in case2 the 'y' variable
 607+ E7A3              ;;//.StoreA:
 608+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      (l2way),A
 609+ E7A3              ;;//.InitLine:
 610+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      B,H
 611+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      C,L
 612+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      A,E
 613+ E7A3              ;;//        sub     L
 614+ E7A3              ;;//        jr      NC,.EndInit
 615+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      A,L
 616+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      L,E
 617+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      E,A
 618+ E7A3              ;;//.EndInit:
 619+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      A,E
 620+ E7A3              ;;//        sub     L
 621+ E7A3              ;;//        rla
 622+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      L,A             ;value to add in case1 (d < 0)
 623+ E7A3              ;;//        add     A,H
 624+ E7A3              ;;//        sub     D
 625+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      E,A             ;'d' variable is initialised
 626+ E7A3              ;;//        add     A,H
 627+ E7A3              ;;//        sub     D
 628+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      H,A             ;value to add in case2 (d >= 0)
 629+ E7A3              ;;//.Loop:
 630+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      A,B
 631+ E7A3              ;;//        sub     D
 632+ E7A3              ;;//        jr      NC,.EndLine       ;the line is completely drawn.
 633+ E7A3              ;;//        pop     AF
 634+ E7A3              ;;//        bit     7,A
 635+ E7A3              ;;//        push    AF
 636+ E7A3              ;;//        push    AF
 637+ E7A3              ;;//        push    BC
 638+ E7A3              ;;//        jr      Z,.DrawPoint
 639+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      A,B
 640+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      B,C
 641+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      C,A
 642+ E7A3              ;;//.DrawPoint:
 643+ E7A3              ;;//		push	hl
 644+ E7A3              ;;//		pushbcdeaf
 645+ E7A3              ;;//		ld		b,e
 646+ E7A3              ;;//		ld		c,d
 647+ E7A3              ;;//	ld 		a,(l2linecolor)
 648+ E7A3              ;;//	call	l2_plot_pixel
 649+ E7A3              ;;//		popafdebc
 650+ E7A3              ;;//		pop		hl
 651+ E7A3              ;;//        pop     BC
 652+ E7A3              ;;//        pop     AF
 653+ E7A3              ;;//.TestD:
 654+ E7A3              ;;//        bit     7,E
 655+ E7A3              ;;//        jr      NZ,.Case1
 656+ E7A3              ;;//.Case2:                          ;d >= 0
 657+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      A,E
 658+ E7A3              ;;//        add     A,H
 659+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      E,A
 660+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      A,(l2way)
 661+ E7A3              ;;//        add     A,C
 662+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      C,A
 663+ E7A3              ;;//        jr      .EndLoop
 664+ E7A3              ;;//.Case1:                          ;d < 0
 665+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      A,E
 666+ E7A3              ;;//        add     A,L
 667+ E7A3              ;;//        ld      E,A
 668+ E7A3              ;;//.EndLoop:
 669+ E7A3              ;;//        inc     B
 670+ E7A3              ;;//        jr      .Loop
 671+ E7A3              ;;//.EndLine:
 672+ E7A3              ;;//        pop     AF              ;MUST NOT BE REMOVED
 673+ E7A3              ;;//        pop     HL              ;can be removed
 674+ E7A3              ;;//        pop     DE              ;can be removed
 675+ E7A3              ;;//        ret
 676+ E7A3
 677+ E7A3              ;;	ld		(.l2yadjust),a
 678+ E7A3              ;;	call	calcdeltax:
 679+ E7A3              ;;	ld		(.l2xadjust),a
 680+ E7A3              ;;.calcfraction:							; err(or fraction) = dx+dy;
 681+ E7A3              ;;	push	hl
 682+ E7A3              ;;	push	de
 683+ E7A3              ;;	ld		hl,(l2deltaX)
 684+ E7A3              ;;	ld		de,(l2deltaY)
 685+ E7A3              ;;	add		hl,de
 686+ E7A3              ;;	ld		(l2fraction),hl
 687+ E7A3              ;;	pop		de
 688+ E7A3              ;;	pop		hl
 689+ E7A3              ;;.mainloop:
 690+ E7A3              ;;	push	bc
 691+ E7A3              ;;	push	de
 692+ E7A3              ;;	ld 		a,(l2linecolor)
 693+ E7A3              ;;	call	l2_plot_pixel
 694+ E7A3              ;;	pop		de
 695+ E7A3              ;;	pop		bc
 696+ E7A3              ;;.arewefinishedtest
 697+ E7A3              ;;	ld		a,b
 698+ E7A3              ;;	cp		d
 699+ E7A3              ;;	jr		nz,.notthereyet
 700+ E7A3              ;;	ld		a,c
 701+ E7A3              ;;	cp		e
 702+ E7A3              ;;	ret		z
 703+ E7A3              ;;.notthereyet:
 704+ E7A3              ;;	push	de
 705+ E7A3              ;;	call	l2_e2fractionby2			; e2 = 2*err;
 706+ E7A3              ;;	pop		de
 707+ E7A3              ;;.e2dytest:								; if (e2 >= dy) /* e_xy+e_x > 0 */  then S and P/V are the same
 708+ E7A3              ;;	push	de							; so if m & pe  or p & po calc (m = sign set p = 0)
 709+ E7A3              ;;	ld		de,(l2deltaY)				;    if m & po  or p & pe skip  (pe = pv set po = pv 0)
 710+ E7A3              ;;	or		a							;
 711+ E7A3              ;;	sbc		hl,de						;
 712+ E7A3              ;;	pop		de
 713+ E7A3              ;;	jr		z,  .dodycalc				; if equal then calc
 714+ E7A3              ;;	jp		p,	.dodycalc				; sign clear to H>D even with negtives
 715+ E7A3              ;;	jr		.skipdycalc         		; sign = 0     so  skip as pe
 716+ E7A3              ;;.dodycalc:
 717+ E7A3              ;;	ld		hl,(l2fraction)
 718+ E7A3              ;;	push	de
 719+ E7A3              ;;	ld		de,(l2deltaY)
 720+ E7A3              ;;	add		hl,de
 721+ E7A3              ;;	ld		(l2fraction),de
 722+ E7A3              ;;	pop		de
 723+ E7A3              ;;.l2yadjust:
 724+ E7A3              ;;	nop
 725+ E7A3              ;;.skipdycalc:
 726+ E7A3              ;;.e2dxtest:								;  if (e2 <= dx) /* e_xy+e_y < 0 */ then S and P/V are different.
 727+ E7A3              ;;	ld		hl,(l2e2)
 728+ E7A3              ;;	push	de							;
 729+ E7A3              ;;	ld		de,(l2deltaX)				;
 730+ E7A3              ;;	or		a							; clear carry flag
 731+ E7A3              ;;	sbc		hl,de						; hl = hl - de is if de > hl will get pv and signed different?
 732+ E7A3              ;;	pop		de
 733+ E7A3              ;;	jr		z,.dodxcalc					; e2 == dx so do calc
 734+ E7A3              ;;	jp		m,.dodxcalc					; was sign bit set
 735+ E7A3              ;;	jr		.skipdxcalc         	    ; diff so skip ; pvclear = po        pvset = pe
 736+ E7A3              ;;.dodxcalc:
 737+ E7A3              ;;	ld		hl,(l2fraction)
 738+ E7A3              ;;	push	de
 739+ E7A3              ;;	ld		de,(l2deltaX)
 740+ E7A3              ;;	add		hl,de
 741+ E7A3              ;;	ld		(l2fraction),de
 742+ E7A3              ;;	pop		de
 743+ E7A3              ;;.l2xadjust:
 744+ E7A3              ;;	nop
 745+ E7A3              ;;.skipdxcalc:
 746+ E7A3              ;;	jr 		.mainloop
 747+ E7A3
 748+ E7A3
 749+ E7A3              ;;/l2_draw_diagonalold:
 750+ E7A3              ;;/MESSAGE ">l2_draw_diagonal, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color)"
 751+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2linecolor),a   			; could do an ex but it will be needed multiple times between many uses of a reg
 752+ E7A3              ;;/.sortycoords:
 753+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,b							; Sort to Y0 is always > y1 so we don't have to deal with step y and only step x
 754+ E7A3              ;;/	cp		d
 755+ E7A3              ;;/	jr		nc, .nocoordswap
 756+ E7A3              ;;/.swapcoords:
 757+ E7A3              ;;/	ex		de,hl						; save de to hl ! effective code line 98 after macros
 758+ E7A3              ;;/	lddebc
 759+ E7A3              ;;/	ldbchl
 760+ E7A3              ;;/.nocoordswap:
 761+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,d							; l2_dy = -ABS(l2_vy1 - l2_vy0)
 762+ E7A3              ;;/	sub		b							; we have already sorted  so y1 > y0
 763+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaY),a
 764+ E7A3              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
 765+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaYn),a				; DEBUG
 766+ E7A3              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
 767+ E7A3              ;;/.deltaxequABSx0Minusx1:						; we need to set l2dx to abs x1-x0 and set
 768+ E7A3              ;;/    ld		a,c
 769+ E7A3              ;;/	cp		e
 770+ E7A3              ;;/	jr		c, .x1GTx0
 771+ E7A3              ;;/.x1LTx0
 772+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,c
 773+ E7A3              ;;/	sub		e
 774+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaX),a				; just 8 bit for now should it be 16?
 775+ E7A3              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
 776+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaXn),a				; DEBUG
 777+ E7A3              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
 778+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,l2incbstep
 779+ E7A3              ;;/	jr		.setlayershift0
 780+ E7A3              ;;/.x1GTx0:
 781+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,e
 782+ E7A3              ;;/	sub		c
 783+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaX),a					; just 8 bit for now should it be 16?
 784+ E7A3              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
 785+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaXn),a				; DEBUG
 786+ E7A3              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
 787+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,l2decbstep
 788+ E7A3              ;;/.setlayershift0:
 789+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,0
 790+ E7A3              ;;/	pushbcde
 791+ E7A3              ;;/	call	asm_l2_bank_n_select		; l2_layer_shift = 0 and bank 0 selected
 792+ E7A3              ;;/	popdebc
 793+ E7A3              ;;/; so now we have set inc or dec instruction, l2dy, l2dx and on bank 0,
 794+ E7A3              ;;/.dymuliplyby2:
 795+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a, (l2deltaY)				; dy *= 2
 796+ E7A3              ;;/	call	l2_signed_mul2a
 797+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaYsq),a
 798+ E7A3              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
 799+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaYsqn),a				; DEBUG
 800+ E7A3              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
 801+ E7A3              ;;/.dxmuliplyby2:
 802+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a, (l2deltaX)				; dx *= 2
 803+ E7A3              ;;/	call	l2_signed_mul2a
 804+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaXsq),a
 805+ E7A3              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
 806+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaXsqn),a				; DEBUG
 807+ E7A3              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
 808+ E7A3              ;;/.plotfirstpixel:
 809+ E7A3              ;;/	pushbcde
 810+ E7A3              ;;/	ld a,(l2linecolor)
 811+ E7A3              ;;/	call	l2_plot_pixel
 812+ E7A3              ;;/	popdebc
 813+ E7A3              ;;/.mainloop:								; if (l2_dx > l2_dy) signed
 814+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,(l2deltaX)				;If A < N, then S and P/V are different.
 815+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		hl,l2deltaY					;A >= N, then S and P/V are the same
 816+ E7A3              ;;/	cp		(hl)
 817+ E7A3              ;;/	jp		m,	.signset
 818+ E7A3              ;;/.signclear:
 819+ E7A3              ;;/	jp		pe,	.dxLTEdybranch
 820+ E7A3              ;;/	jr		.dxGTdybranch
 821+ E7A3              ;;/.signset:
 822+ E7A3              ;;/	jp		po,	.dxLTEdybranch
 823+ E7A3              ;;/.dxGTdybranch:
 824+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,(l2deltaYsq)
 825+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		hl,l2deltaX
 826+ E7A3              ;;/	sub		(hl)
 827+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2fraction),a				; faction = dy - 1/2 dx
 828+ E7A3              ;;/.BranchAwhile							; while (l2_vx0 != l2_vx1)
 829+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,c
 830+ E7A3              ;;/	cp		e
 831+ E7A3              ;;/	ret		z							; if x0 = x1 then done
 832+ E7A3              ;;/.BranchAtestfraction:					; if (l2_fraction >= 0)
 833+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,(l2fraction)
 834+ E7A3              ;;/	TEST	$80
 835+ E7A3              ;;/	jr		nz,.BranchAskipYstep
 836+ E7A3              ;;/	inc		b							; 		++l2_vy0;
 837+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		hl,l2deltaXsq
 838+ E7A3              ;;/	sub		(hl)						; 		l2_fraction -= l2_dx;
 839+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2fraction),a
 840+ E7A3              ;;/.BranchAskipYstep:
 841+ E7A3              ;;/.l2stepx1:
 842+ E7A3              ;;/	inc		b							; this is self modifying code point 1 l2_vx0 += l2_stepx
 843+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,(l2fraction)				; l2_fraction += l2_dy can optimise later as a already has this?
 844+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		hl,l2deltaYsq
 845+ E7A3              ;;/	add		a,(hl)
 846+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2fraction),a
 847+ E7A3              ;;/.BranchAplotBCColA:						; l2_plot_pixel(l2_vx0,l2_vy0,color);
 848+ E7A3              ;;/	pushbcde
 849+ E7A3              ;;/	ld a,(l2linecolor)
 850+ E7A3              ;;/	call	l2_plot_pixel
 851+ E7A3              ;;/	popdebc
 852+ E7A3              ;;/.BranchAloop:
 853+ E7A3              ;;/	jr		.BranchAwhile
 854+ E7A3              ;;/.dxLTEdybranch:
 855+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,(l2deltaXsq)				; l2_fraction = l2_dx - (l2_dy >> 1);
 856+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		hl, l2deltaY
 857+ E7A3              ;;/	sub		(hl)
 858+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2fraction),a				; faction = dy - 1/2 d
 859+ E7A3              ;;/.BranchBwhile:							; while (l2_vy0 != l2_vy1)
 860+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,b
 861+ E7A3              ;;/	cp		d
 862+ E7A3              ;;/	ret		z							; if x0 = x1 then done
 863+ E7A3              ;;/.BranchBtestfraction:					; if (l2_fraction >= 0)
 864+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,(l2fraction)
 865+ E7A3              ;;/	TEST	$80
 866+ E7A3              ;;/	jr		nz,.BranchBskipYstep
 867+ E7A3              ;;/.l2stepx2
 868+ E7A3              ;;/	inc		b							; l2_vx0 += l2_stepx; this is self modifying code point 2
 869+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		a,(l2fraction)				; l2_fraction -= l2_dy
 870+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		hl,l2deltaYsq
 871+ E7A3              ;;/	sub		(hl)
 872+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2fraction),a
 873+ E7A3              ;;/.BranchBskipYstep:
 874+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		hl, l2deltaYsq
 875+ E7A3              ;;/	add		a,(hl)
 876+ E7A3              ;;/	ld		(l2fraction),a
 877+ E7A3              ;;/	inc		b							; ++l2_vy0;
 878+ E7A3              ;;/.BranchBplotBCColA:
 879+ E7A3              ;;/	pushbcde
 880+ E7A3              ;;/	ld a,(l2linecolor)
 881+ E7A3              ;;/	call	l2_plot_pixel
 882+ E7A3              ;;/	popdebc
 883+ E7A3              ;;/.BranchBloop:
 884+ E7A3              ;;/	jr		.BranchBwhile
 885+ E7A3
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/layer2_plot_diagonal.asm
 776  E7A3                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_plot_triangle.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_plot_triangle.asm
   1+ E7A3
   2+ E7A3
   3+ E7A3
   4+ E7A3 00 00        l2trianglebc	        DW 0
   5+ E7A5 00 00        l2trianglede	        DW 0
   6+ E7A7 00 00        l2trianglehl	        DW 0
   7+ E7A9
   8+ E7A9              ; "l2_draw_triangle, BC = y1x1, DE=y2x2, HL=y3x3 a = Color"
   9+ E7A9 C5 D5 E5 F5  l2_draw_triangle:       push	bc,,de,,hl,,af
  10+ E7AD CD D1 E6                             call	l2_draw_diagonal		; BC to DE
  11+ E7B0 F1                                   pop		af
  12+ E7B1 D1                                   pop		de						; swap DE and HL
  13+ E7B2 E1                                   pop		hl						; so BC to DE is really to HL
  14+ E7B3 C1                                   pop		bc
  15+ E7B4 D5 E5                                push    de,,hl                    ; which is pushing original hl then original de
  16+ E7B6 F5                                   push	af
  17+ E7B7 CD D1 E6                             call	l2_draw_diagonal		; BC to HL (leaving DE and HL swapped)
  18+ E7BA F1                                   pop		af
  19+ E7BB C1                                   pop		bc						; Now bc = original de
  20+ E7BC D1                                   pop		de						; de = original hl
  21+ E7BD CD D1 E6                             call	l2_draw_diagonal		; BC to HL (leaving DE and HL swapped)
  22+ E7C0 C9                                   ret
  23+ E7C1
  24+ E7C1
  25+ E7C1
  26+ E7C1
  27+ E7C1
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_plot_triangle.asm
 777  E7C1                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_fill_triangle.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_fill_triangle.asm
   1+ E7C1              ; ">l2_fillBottomFlatTriangle BC y0x0 DE x1x2, H YCommon, L Colour"
   2+ E7C1              ; "note >l2_draw_diagonal_save, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=array nbr ESOURCE LL30 or LION"
   3+ E7C1              ; "note line to   bc = left side row,col, d right pixel, e = color"
   4+ E7C1              l2_fillBottomFlatTriangle:;break
   5+ E7C1 7D                                   ld		a,l
   6+ E7C2 32 EA E3                             ld		(l2linecolor),a
   7+ E7C5 79                                   ld		a,c
   8+ E7C6 BB                                   cp		e
   9+ E7C7 30 08                                jr		nc, .x2gtex1
  10+ E7C9 DD 26 01     .x1ltx2:                ld		ixh,1                           ; list 1 holds x0 down to x1
  11+ E7CC DD 2E 02                             ld		ixl,2                           ; list 2 hols  x0 down to x2
  12+ E7CF 18 06                                jr		.storepoints
  13+ E7D1 DD 26 02     .x2gtex1:               ld		ixh,2
  14+ E7D4 DD 2E 01                             ld		ixl,1
  15+ E7D7 C5 D5 E5     .storepoints:           push	bc,,de,,hl
  16+ E7DA DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh
  17+ E7DC 5A                                   ld		e,d                             ; we alreay have bc so its now bc -> hd
  18+ E7DD 54                                   ld		d,h
  19+ E7DE CD F2 E5                             call	l2_draw_diagonal_save			;l2_store_diagonal(x0,y0,x1,ycommon,l2_LineMinX);
  20+ E7E1 E1 D1 C1                             pop		bc,,de,,hl
  21+ E7E4 C5 E5                                push	bc,,hl
  22+ E7E6 54                                   ld		d,h                             ; now its bc -> he
  23+ E7E7 DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl
  24+ E7E9 CD F2 E5                             call	l2_draw_diagonal_save			;l2_store_diagonal(x0,y0,x2,ycommon,l2_LineMaxX);
  25+ E7EC E1 C1                                pop		bc,,hl
  26+ E7EE 50           .SaveForLoop:           ld		d,b
  27+ E7EF 5C                                   ld		e,h								; save loop counters
  28+ E7F0 D5                                   push	de								; de = y0ycommon
  29+ E7F1 21 F2 E3     .GetFirstHorizontalRow:	ld		hl,l2targetArray1               ; get first row for loop
  30+ E7F4 78                                   ld		a,b
  31+ E7F5 ED 31                                add		hl,a							; hl = l2targetArray1 row b
  32+ E7F7 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)							;
  33+ E7F8 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c = col1 i.e. l2targetarray1[b]
  34+ E7F9 21 F2 E4                             ld      hl,l2targetArray2
  35+ E7FC 78                                   ld      a,b
  36+ E7FD ED 31                                add     hl,a
  37+ E7FF              ;                        inc		h								; hl = l2targetArray2 row b if we interleave
  38+ E7FF 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  39+ E800 57                                   ld		d,a								; d = col2 i.e. l2targetarray2[b]
  40+ E801 3A EA E3     .SetColour:             ld		a,(l2linecolor)
  41+ E804 5F                                   ld		e,a								; de = to colour
  42+ E805 C5           .SavePoints:            push	bc								; bc = rowcol
  43+ E806 25                                   dec		h
  44+ E807 E5                                   push	hl								; hl = l2targetArray1[b]
  45+ E808 CD 3A E3     .DoLine:	            call	l2_draw_horz_line_to
  46+ E80B E1                                   pop		hl
  47+ E80C C1                                   pop		bc
  48+ E80D 04                                   inc		b								; down a rowc
  49+ E80E D1                                   pop		de								; de = from to (and b also = current)
  50+ E80F 14                                   inc		d
  51+ E810 7B                                   ld		a,e								; while e >= d
  52+ E811 BA                                   cp		d
  53+ E812 30 DA                                jr 		nc,.SaveForLoop					; Is this the right point??
  54+ E814 C9                                   ret
  55+ E815
