 778  E815                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/layer2_plot_circle.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/layer2_plot_circle.asm
   1+ E815
   2+ E815 00 00        l2_circle_pos		DW 0
   3+ E817 00           l2_circle_colour	DB 0
   4+ E818 00           l2_circle_radius	DB 0
   5+ E819 00           l2_circle_x			DB 0
   6+ E81A 00           l2_circle_y			DB 0
   7+ E81B 00           l2_circle_d			DB 0
   8+ E81C
   9+ E81C              ; ">l2_draw_circle BC = center row col, d = radius, e = colour"
  10+ E81C 7B           l2_draw_circle:     ld		a,e
  11+ E81D 32 C3 E8                         ld		(.PlotPixel+1),a
  12+ E820 7A                               ld		a,d								; get radius
  13+ E821 A7                               and		a
  14+ E822 C8                               ret		z
  15+ E823 FE 01                            cp		1
  16+ E825 CA DA E8                         jp		z,CircleSinglepixel
  17+ E828 ED 43 52 E8                      ld		(.Plot1+1),bc					; save origin into DE reg in code
  18+ E82C DD 67                            ld		ixh,a							; ixh = raidus
  19+ E82E DD 2E 00                         ld		ixl,0
  20+ E831 26 00        .calcd:	            ld		h,0
  21+ E833 6F                               ld		l,a
  22+ E834 29                               add		hl,hl							; hl = r * 2
  23+ E835 EB                               ex		de,hl							; de = r * 2
  24+ E836 21 03 00                         ld		hl,3
  25+ E839 A7                               and		a
  26+ E83A ED 52                            sbc		hl,de							; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
  27+ E83C 44                               ld		b,h
  28+ E83D 4D                               ld		c,l								; bc = 3 - (r * 2)
  29+ E83E 21 01 00     .calcdelta:         ld		hl,1
  30+ E841 16 00                            ld		d,0
  31+ E843 DD 5D                            ld		e,ixl
  32+ E845 A7                               and		a
  33+ E846 ED 52                            sbc		hl,de
  34+ E848 11 01 00     .Setde1:            ld		de,1
  35+ E84B DD 7C        .CircleLoop:        ld		a,ixh
  36+ E84D DD BD                            cp		ixl
  37+ E84F D8                               ret		c
  38+ E850 D9           .ProcessLoop:	    exx
  39+ E851 11 00 00     .Plot1:             ld		de,0
  40+ E854 7B                               ld		a,e
  41+ E855 DD 85                            add		a,ixl
  42+ E857 4F                               ld		c,a
  43+ E858 7A                               ld		a,d
  44+ E859 DD 84                            add		a,ixh
  45+ E85B 47                               ld		b,a
  46+ E85C CD C2 E8                         call	.PlotPixel			;CX+X,CY+Y
  47+ E85F 7B           .Plot2:             ld 		a,e
  48+ E860 DD 95                            sub 	ixl
  49+ E862 4F                               ld 		c,a
  50+ E863 7A                               ld 		a,d
  51+ E864 DD 84                            add 	a,ixh
  52+ E866 47                               ld		b,a
  53+ E867 CD C2 E8                         call	.PlotPixel			;CX-X,CY+Y
  54+ E86A 7B           .Plot3:             ld 		a,e
  55+ E86B DD 85                            add		a,ixl
  56+ E86D 4F                               ld 		c,a
  57+ E86E 7A                               ld 		a,d
  58+ E86F DD 94                            sub 	ixh
  59+ E871 47                               ld 		b,a
  60+ E872 CD C2 E8                         call	.PlotPixel			;CX+X,CY-Y
  61+ E875 7B           .Plot4:             ld 		a,e
  62+ E876 DD 95                            sub 	ixl
  63+ E878 4F                               ld 		c,a
  64+ E879 7A                               ld 		a,d
  65+ E87A DD 94                            sub 	ixh
  66+ E87C 47                               ld 		b,a
  67+ E87D CD C2 E8                         call	.PlotPixel			;CX-X,CY-Y
  68+ E880 7A           .Plot5:	            ld 		a,d
  69+ E881 DD 85                            add 	a,ixl
  70+ E883 47                               ld 		b,a
  71+ E884 7B                               ld 		a,e
  72+ E885 DD 84                            add 	a,ixh
  73+ E887 4F                               ld 		c,a
  74+ E888 CD C2 E8                         call	.PlotPixel			;CY+X,CX+Y
  75+ E88B 7A           .Plot6:	            ld 		a,d
  76+ E88C DD 95                            sub 	ixl
  77+ E88E 47                               ld 		b,a
  78+ E88F 7B                               ld 		a,e
  79+ E890 DD 84                            add 	a,ixh
  80+ E892 4F                               ld 		c,a
  81+ E893 CD C2 E8                         call	.PlotPixel			;CY-X,CX+Y
  82+ E896 7A           .Plot7:	            ld 		a,d
  83+ E897 DD 85                            add 	a,ixl
  84+ E899 47                               ld 		b,a
  85+ E89A 7B                               ld 		a,e
  86+ E89B DD 94                            sub 	ixh
  87+ E89D 4F                               ld 		c,a
  88+ E89E CD C2 E8                         call	.PlotPixel			;CY+X,CX-Y
  89+ E8A1 7A           .Plot8:	            ld 		a,d
  90+ E8A2 DD 95                            sub 	ixl
  91+ E8A4 47                               ld		b,a
  92+ E8A5 7B                               ld 		a,e
  93+ E8A6 DD 94                            sub 	ixh
  94+ E8A8 4F                               ld 		c,a
  95+ E8A9 CD C2 E8                         call	.PlotPixel			;CY-X,CX-Y
  96+ E8AC D9                               exx
  97+ E8AD CB 7C        .IncrementCircle:	bit     7,h				; Check for Hl<=0
  98+ E8AF 28 03                            jr z,   .draw_circle_1
  99+ E8B1 19                               add hl,de			; Delta=Delta+D1
 100+ E8B2 18 05                            jr      .draw_circle_2		;
 101+ E8B4 09           .draw_circle_1:		add     hl,bc			; Delta=Delta+D2
 102+ E8B5 03                               inc     bc
 103+ E8B6 03                               inc     bc				; D2=D2+2
 104+ E8B7 DD 25                            dec     ixh				; Y=Y-1
 105+ E8B9 03           .draw_circle_2:		inc bc				; D2=D2+2
 106+ E8BA 03                               inc bc
 107+ E8BB 13                               inc de				; D1=D1+2
 108+ E8BC 13                               inc de
 109+ E8BD DD 2C                            inc ixl				; X=X+1
 110+ E8BF C3 4B E8                         jp      .CircleLoop
 111+ E8C2 3E 00        .PlotPixel:         ld		a,0                  ; This was originally indirect, where as it neeed to be value
 112+ E8C4 D5 C5 E5                         push	de,,bc,,hl
 113+ E8C7                                  l2_plot_macro; call 	l2_plot_pixel_y_test
 113+ E8C7 78          >                        ld      a,b
 113+ E8C8             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 113+ E8C8 FE C0       >                        cp     192
 113+ E8CA D2 D6 E8    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 113+ E8CD 69          >                        ld      l,c
 113+ E8CE CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 113+ E8D1 67          >                        ld      h,a
 113+ E8D2 3A 7D EB    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 113+ E8D5 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 113+ E8D6             >.NoPlot:
 114+ E8D6 E1 C1 D1                         pop		de,,bc,,hl
 115+ E8D9 C9                               ret
 116+ E8DA 7B           CircleSinglepixel:  ld		a,e
 117+ E8DB                                  l2_plot_macro; call	l2_plot_pixel_y_test
 117+ E8DB 78          >                        ld      a,b
 117+ E8DC             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 117+ E8DC FE C0       >                        cp     192
 117+ E8DE D2 EA E8    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 117+ E8E1 69          >                        ld      l,c
 117+ E8E2 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 117+ E8E5 67          >                        ld      h,a
 117+ E8E6 3A 7D EB    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 117+ E8E9 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 117+ E8EA             >.NoPlot:
 118+ E8EA C9                               ret
 119+ E8EB
 120+ E8EB              ; ">l2_draw_clipped_circle HL = Center X 2's c, DE = Center Y 2's c = center , c = radius, b = colour"
 121+ E8EB 43           l2_draw_clipped_circle:     ld		b,e                     ; save Colour
 122+ E8EC 32 64 EA                         ld		(.PlotPixel+1),a
 123+ E8EF 79                               ld		a,c								; get radius
 124+ E8F0                                  ReturnIfAIsZero
 124+ E8F0 A7          >                        and     a
 124+ E8F1 C8          >                        ret     z
 125+ E8F2                                  JumpIfAEqNusng  1, .circleSinglepixel
 125+ E8F2 FE 01       >                        cp     1
 125+ E8F4 CA 7D EA    >                        jp      z,.circleSinglepixel
 126+ E8F7 ED 53 24 E9                      ld		(.Plot1Y+1),de					; save origin into DE and HL
 127+ E8FB 22 27 E9                         ld      (.Plot1X+1),hl                  ; .
 128+ E8FE DD 67                            ld		ixh,a							; ixh = raidus
 129+ E900 DD 2E 00                         ld		ixl,0						    ; ixl = 0
 130+ E903 26 00        .calcd:	            ld		h,0                             ; hl = radius
 131+ E905 6F                               ld		l,a                             ; .
 132+ E906 29                               add		hl,hl							; hl = r * 2
 133+ E907 EB                               ex		de,hl							; de = r * 2
 134+ E908 21 03 00                         ld		hl,3                            ; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
 135+ E90B A7                               and		a                               ; .
 136+ E90C ED 52                            sbc		hl,de							; .
 137+ E90E 44                               ld		b,h                             ; bc = 3 - (r * 2)
 138+ E90F 4D                               ld		c,l								; .
 139+ E910 21 01 00     .calcdelta:         ld		hl,1                            ; hl = 1
 140+ E913 16 00                            ld		d,0                             ; de = ixl
 141+ E915 DD 5D                            ld		e,ixl                           ;
 142+ E917 A7                               and		a                               ;
 143+ E918 ED 52                            sbc		hl,de                           ; hl = 1 - radius
 144+ E91A 11 01 00     .Setde1:            ld		de,1                            ; de = 1
 145+ E91D              .CircleLoop:        ReturnIfRegLTNusng ixh, ixl             ; if radius > ixl counter
 145+ E91D DD 7C       >                        ld      a,ixh
 145+ E91F DD BD       >                        cp      ixl
 145+ E921 D8          >                        ret	    c
 146+ E922 D9           .ProcessLoop:	    exx                                     ; save all bc,de,hl registers
 147+ E923 11 00 00     .Plot1Y:            ld		de,0                            ; this is Y coord
 148+ E926 21 00 00     .Plot1X:            ld      hl,0                            ; this is x coord
 149+ E929 E5 D5 C5                         push    hl,,de,,bc                      ; save bc +3
 150+ E92C 06 00                            ld      b,0
 151+ E92E DD 4D                            ld      c,ixl
 152+ E930                                  ClearCarryFlag
 152+ E930 B7          >                        or a
 153+ E931 ED 4A                            adc     hl,bc
 154+ E933 C1                               pop     bc                              ; can optimise, perhaps use iy instead of bc or just optimise push pop and jump to an overall .Plot1Done and minimise push pops + 2
 155+ E934                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot1Done        ; if h <> 0 then hl < 0 or hl > 255
 155+ E934 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 155+ E935 A7          >                        and     a
 155+ E936 C2 4B E9    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot1Done
 156+ E939 EB                               ex      de,hl                           ; now de = x coord calculated
 157+ E93A C5                               push    bc                              ; + 3
 158+ E93B                                  ClearCarryFlag
 158+ E93B B7          >                        or a
 159+ E93C 06 00                            ld      b,0
 160+ E93E DD 4D                            ld      c,ixl
 161+ E940 ED 4A                            adc     hl,bc
 162+ E942 C1                               pop     bc                              ; + 2
 163+ E943                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot1Done        ; if h <> 0 then hl < 0 or hl > 255
 163+ E943 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 163+ E944 A7          >                        and     a
 163+ E945 C2 4B E9    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot1Done
 164+ E948 CD 63 EA                         call	.PlotPixel	            		;CX+X,CY+Y using DE = x and hl = y *** Note if we order plot 1 to 8 we can selectivley jump past many on elimiation check
 165+ E94B D1 E1        .Plot1Done:         pop     hl,,de                          ; get de (y) and hl (x) back but reversed as the next plot expected the to be reversed from the ex de,hl above  + 0
 166+ E94D E5 D5 C5     .Plot2:             push    hl,,de,,bc                      ; e.g  do all CX + X first, so plot1, plot3 and just one check for cx + x off screen
 167+ E950 06 00                            ld      b,0                             ;                              plot2, plot8 for cx - x
 168+ E952 DD 4D                            ld      c,ixl                           ;                              plot4, plot5 for cy + x  ** Need to check the comments on each plot are correct
 169+ E954                                  ClearCarryFlag                          ;                              plot6        for cy - x
 169+ E954 B7          >                        or a
 170+ E955 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc                           ;                              plot7 is last one
 171+ E957 C1                               pop     bc                              ;
 172+ E958                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot2Done        ;
 172+ E958 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 172+ E959 A7          >                        and     a
 172+ E95A C2 6F E9    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot2Done
 173+ E95D EB                               ex      de,hl
 174+ E95E C5                               push    bc
 175+ E95F 06 00                            ld      b,0
 176+ E961 DD 4D                            ld      c,ixl
 177+ E963                                  ClearCarryFlag
 177+ E963 B7          >                        or a
 178+ E964 ED 4A                            adc     hl,bc
 179+ E966 C1                               pop     bc
 180+ E967                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot2Done
 180+ E967 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 180+ E968 A7          >                        and     a
 180+ E969 C2 6F E9    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot2Done
 181+ E96C CD 63 EA                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ; CX-X,CY+Y
 182+ E96F E1 D1        .Plot2Done:         pop     de,,hl
 183+ E971 E5 D5 C5     .Plot3:             push    hl,,de,,bc
 184+ E974 06 00                            ld      b,0
 185+ E976 DD 4D                            ld      c,ixl
 186+ E978                                  ClearCarryFlag

 780  EB31                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_any_line.asm"

   1+ EB31              ; ">l2_draw_any_line, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color: determines if its horizontal, vertical or diagonal then hands off the work"
   2+ EB31 08           l2_draw_any_line:       ex		af,af'              ; save colour into a'
   3+ EB32 79                                   ld		a,c                 ; if x and e are the same its horizontal
   4+ EB33 BB                                   cp		e
   5+ EB34 28 08                                jr		z,.HorizontalLineCheck
   6+ EB36 78                                   ld		a,b                 ; if b and d are the same its vertica;
   7+ EB37 BA                                   cp		d
   8+ EB38 28 0E                                jr		z,.VerticalLine
   9+ EB3A              ; use jp and get a free ret instruction optimisation
  10+ EB3A 08           .DiagonalLine:		    ex		af,af'			     ; get colour back into a
  11+ EB3B C3 D1 E6                             jp		l2_draw_diagonal
  12+ EB3E
  13+ EB3E 78           .HorizontalLineCheck:   ld      a,b
  14+ EB3F BA                                   cp      d
  15+ EB40 28 0B                                jr      z, .SinglePixel
  16+ EB42 08           .HorizontalLine:        ex		af,af'              ; get colour back into a
  17+ EB43 53                                   ld		d,e				    ; set d as target right pixel
  18+ EB44 5F                                   ld		e,a				    ; e holds colour on this call
  19+ EB45 C3 3A E3                             jp		l2_draw_horz_line_to
  20+ EB48 08           .VerticalLine:          ex		af,af'
  21+ EB49 5F                                   ld		e,a				    ; e holds colour on this call
  22+ EB4A C3 D3 E3                             jp		l2_draw_vert_line_to
  23+ EB4D 08           .SinglePixel:           ex		af,af'              ; get colour back into a
  24+ EB4E                                      l2_plot_macro; jp      l2_plot_pixel
  24+ EB4E 78          >                        ld      a,b
  24+ EB4F             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
  24+ EB4F FE C0       >                        cp     192
  24+ EB51 D2 5D EB    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
  24+ EB54 69          >                        ld      l,c
  24+ EB55 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
  24+ EB58 67          >                        ld      h,a
  24+ EB59 3A 7D EB    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
  24+ EB5C 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
  24+ EB5D             >.NoPlot:
  25+ EB5D C9                                   ret
  26+ EB5E              ;......................................................
  27+ EB5E
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_any_line.asm
 781  EB5E                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/clearLines-LL155.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/clearLines-LL155.asm
   1+ EB5E              ; ClearLines (LL155)
   2+ EB5E              ;   y = 0
   3+ EB5E              ; 	XX20 = UbnkEdgeHeapSize
   4+ EB5E              ;   exit if XX20 < 4
   5+ EB5E              ;   ++y
   6+ EB5E              ;   do
   7+ EB5E              ;		X1 = XX19(Y) ;	Y1 = XX19(++Y) ;	X2 = XX19(++Y);	Y2 = XX19(++Y)
   8+ EB5E              ;   	call DrawLine (x1,y1 to x2,y2) two's compliment (we will do 0)
   9+ EB5E              ;		++y
  10+ EB5E              ;	until Y > XX20
  11+ EB5E
  12+ EB5E              clearLines:
  13+ EB5E              layer2_clearLines:
  14+ EB5E 3A 22 C3     LL155cl:                ld		a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)
  15+ EB61 47                                   ld		b,a
  16+ EB62 21 30 C2                             ld		hl,UbnkLineArray
  17+ EB65 C5           clearLinesLoop:         push	bc
  18+ EB66 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  19+ EB67 23                                   inc		hl
  20+ EB68 4F                                   ld		c,a
  21+ EB69 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  22+ EB6A 23                                   inc		hl
  23+ EB6B 47                                   ld		b,a
  24+ EB6C 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  25+ EB6D 23                                   inc		hl
  26+ EB6E 5F                                   ld		e,a
  27+ EB6F 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  28+ EB70 23                                   inc		hl
  29+ EB71 57                                   ld		d,a
  30+ EB72 3E E3                                ld		a,COLOUR_TRANSPARENT		; we erase here
  31+ EB74 E5                                   push	hl
  32+ EB75 CD 31 EB                             call    l2_draw_any_line
  33+ EB78 E1                                   pop		hl
  34+ EB79 C1                                   pop		bc
  35+ EB7A 10 E9                                djnz	clearLinesLoop
  36+ EB7C C9                                   ret
  37+ EB7D
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/clearLines-LL155.asm
 782  EB7D                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm
   1+ EB7D              ; ******************************************************************************
   2+ EB7D              ;
   3+ EB7D              ;	Draw a pixel line from (x0,y0) defined in (COORDS) - the current plot
   4+ EB7D              ;	coordinate, to the relative distance points (x0+x,y0+y).
   5+ EB7D              ;
   6+ EB7D              ;	Design & programming by Gunther Strube,	Copyright (C) InterLogic 1995
   7+ EB7D              ;
   8+ EB7D              ;	The (COORDS+0)	pointer contains the current y coordinate, (COORDS+1) the
   9+ EB7D              ;	current x coordinate. The main program should reset the (COORDS) variables
  10+ EB7D              ;	before using line drawing.
  11+ EB7D              ;
  12+ EB7D              ;	The routine checks the range of specified coordinates which is the
  13+ EB7D              ;	boundaries of the graphics area (256x64	pixels).
  14+ EB7D              ;	If a boundary error occurs the routine exits automatically.	This may be
  15+ EB7D              ;	useful if you are trying to draw a line longer than allowed. Only the
  16+ EB7D              ;	visible part will be drawn.
  17+ EB7D              ;
  18+ EB7D              ;	The hardware graphics memory is organized as (0,0) in the top left corner.
  19+ EB7D              ;
  20+ EB7D              ;	The plot routine is	defined by an address pointer	in IX.
  21+ EB7D              ;
  22+ EB7D              ;	IN:	HL =	move	relative x horisontal points (maximum +/- 255).
  23+ EB7D              ;		DE =	move	relative y vertical	points (maximum +/-	255).
  24+ EB7D              ;		IX =	pointer to plot routine that uses HL = (x,y)	of plot coordinate.
  25+ EB7D              ;
  26+ EB7D              ;	OUT:	None.
  27+ EB7D              ;
  28+ EB7D              ;	Registers	used	by routine:
  29+ EB7D              ;		   N	:	B, loop counter
  30+ EB7D              ;		   i	:	line	balance variable
  31+ EB7D              ;		   x	:	H/L,	horisontal, vertical distance	variables
  32+ EB7D              ;		   y	:	H/L,	horisontal, vertical distance	variables
  33+ EB7D              ;	  (x0,y0)	:	(h,l)
  34+ EB7D              ;	  direc_x	:	d, horisontal step increment
  35+ EB7D              ;	  direc_y	:	e, vertical step increment
  36+ EB7D              ;		 ddx	:	b, horisontal step increment
  37+ EB7D              ;		 ddy	:	c, vertical step increment
  38+ EB7D              ;
  39+ EB7D              ;		DE, A work registers.
  40+ EB7D              ;
  41+ EB7D              ; The algorithm in pseudo-code:
  42+ EB7D              ;
  43+ EB7D              ;	direc_x =	SGN x: direc_y	= SGN y
  44+ EB7D              ;	x = ABS x: y =	ABS y
  45+ EB7D              ;
  46+ EB7D              ;	if x	>= y
  47+ EB7D              ;		if x+y=0 then return
  48+ EB7D              ;		H = x
  49+ EB7D              ;		L = y
  50+ EB7D              ;		ddx = direc_x
  51+ EB7D              ;		ddy = 0
  52+ EB7D              ;	else
  53+ EB7D              ;		H = y
  54+ EB7D              ;		L = x
  55+ EB7D              ;		ddx = 0
  56+ EB7D              ;		ddy = direc_y
  57+ EB7D              ;	endif
  58+ EB7D              ;
  59+ EB7D              ;	B = H
  60+ EB7D              ;	i = INT(B/2)
  61+ EB7D              ;	FOR N=B TO 1 STEP -1
  62+ EB7D              ;		i = i + L
  63+ EB7D              ;		if i	< H
  64+ EB7D              ;			ix =	ddx
  65+ EB7D              ;			iy =	ddy
  66+ EB7D              ;		else
  67+ EB7D              ;			i = i - H
  68+ EB7D              ;			ix =	direc_x
  69+ EB7D              ;			iy =	direc_y
  70+ EB7D              ;		endif
  71+ EB7D              ;		x0 =	x0 +	ix
  72+ EB7D              ;		y0 =	y0 +	iy
  73+ EB7D              ;		plot	(x0,y0)
  74+ EB7D              ;	NEXT	N
  75+ EB7D              ;
  76+ EB7D              ;
  77+ EB7D              ;	Registers	changed after return:
  78+ EB7D              ;		..BCDEHL/IXIY/af......	same
  79+ EB7D              ;		AF....../..../..bcdehl	different
  80+ EB7D              ;
  81+ EB7D DF           line_gfx_colour db $DF
  82+ EB7E 00 00        line_gfx_coords	dw 0
  83+ EB80              LineHLtoDE:
  84+ EB80 7C           TestMaxY:               ld	a,h ; were h = y or l = y?
  85+ EB81 FE C0                                cp	192
  86+ EB83 30 26                                jr	nc, exit_line		; y0	coordinate out	of range
  87+ EB85 7A                                   ld	a,d
  88+ EB86 FE C0                                cp	192
  89+ EB88 30 21                                jr	nc, exit_line		; y1	coordinate out	of range
  90+ EB8A 22 7E EB                             ld	(line_gfx_coords),hl		; the starting	point is now default
  91+ EB8D E5                                   push	hl
  92+ EB8E D5                                   push	de
  93+ EB8F 6C                                   ld	l,h				; L = x0
  94+ EB90 62                                   ld	h,d				; H = x1
  95+ EB91 7C           distanceX:		        ld	a,h
  96+ EB92 95                                   sub	l
  97+ EB93 6F                                   ld	l,a
  98+ EB94 26 00                                ld	h,0
  99+ EB96 30 02                                jr	nc, distanceXDone
 100+ EB98 26 FF                                ld	h,-1
 101+ EB9A D1           distanceXDone:          pop	de
 102+ EB9B E3                                   ex	(sp),hl			; L = y0
 103+ EB9C 63                                   ld	h,e				; H = y1
 104+ EB9D 7C           distanceY:		        ld	a,h
 105+ EB9E 95                                   sub	l
 106+ EB9F 6F                                   ld	l,a
 107+ EBA0 26 00                                ld	h,0
 108+ EBA2 30 02                                jr	nc, distanceYDone
 109+ EBA4 26 FF                                ld	h,-1
 110+ EBA6 D1           distanceYDone:          pop	de
 111+ EBA7 EB                                   ex	de,hl			; h.dist.	= HL, v.dist. = DE
 112+ EBA8 CD AC EB                             call	DrawLineRelative			; draw line...
 113+ EBAB C9           exit_line:              ret
 114+ EBAC
 115+ EBAC              ; ***************************************************************************
 116+ EBAC              ;
 117+ EBAC              ;	IN:	HL =	move	relative x horisontal points (maximum +/- 255).
 118+ EBAC              ;		DE =	move	relative y vertical	points (maximum +/-	255).
 119+ EBAC              ;
 120+ EBAC              ; OUT: h - l distance in	HL
 121+ EBAC              ;
 122+ EBAC
 123+ EBAC D5           DrawLineRelative:       push	de
 124+ EBAD E5                                   push	hl
 125+ EBAE D9                                   exx
 126+ EBAF E1                                   pop	hl					; get relative	horisontal movement
 127+ EBB0 CD 27 EC                             call	sgn
 128+ EBB3 57                                   ld	d,a					; direc_x	= SGN(x) installed d = +/-1 for horizontal update
 129+ EBB4 CD 34 EC                             call	absValue
 130+ EBB7 45                                   ld	b,l					; x = ABS(x)
 131+ EBB8 E1           DrawLineGetVertRelative:pop	hl					; get relative	vertical movement
 132+ EBB9 CD 27 EC                             call	sgn
 133+ EBBC 5F                                   ld	e,a					; direc_y	= SGN(y) installed  = +/-1 for vertical update
 134+ EBBD CD 34 EC                             call	absValue
 135+ EBC0 4D                                   ld	c,l					; y = ABS(y) so now bc = dxdy
 136+ EBC1              ; so by here BC = dx dy HL in increment/decrement x y
 137+ EBC1 C5                                   push	bc
 138+ EBC2 D9                                   exx
 139+ EBC3 E1                                   pop	hl					; H = absolute	x dist., L = absolute y distance
 140+ EBC4 7C                                   ld	a,h
 141+ EBC5 BD                                   cp	l
 142+ EBC6 38 0A                                jr	c, x_smaller_y		; if	x >=	y
 143+ EBC8 B4           areXandYZero:           or	h					;	if x+y = 0
 144+ EBC9 28 5B                                jr	z, exit_draw		;		return
 145+ EBCB D9           y_lessorequal_x:        exx						;	else
 146+ EBCC 42                                   ld	b,d					;		ddx = direc_x
 147+ EBCD 0E 00                                ld	c,0					;		ddy = 0
 148+ EBCF D9                                   exx
 149+ EBD0 18 08                                jr	init_drawloop		; else
 150+ EBD2 7C           x_smaller_y:	        ld	a,h
 151+ EBD3 65                                   ld	h,l					;	H = y
 152+ EBD4 6F                                   ld	l,a					;	L = x
 153+ EBD5 D9                                   exx
 154+ EBD6 06 00                                ld	b,0					;	ddx = 0
 155+ EBD8 4B                                   ld	c,e					;	ddy = direc_y
 156+ EBD9 D9                                   exx
 157+ EBDA 44           init_drawloop:	        ld	b,h
 158+ EBDB 4C                                   ld	c,h					; B = H
 159+ EBDC CB 39                                srl	c					; i = INT(B/2)
 160+ EBDE              										; FOR N=B	TO 1	STEP	-1
 161+ EBDE 79           drawloop:		        ld	a,c
 162+ EBDF 85                                   add	a,l
 163+ EBE0 38 09                                jr	c, i_greater		;	i + L > 255  (i > H)
 164+ EBE2 BC                                   cp	h
 165+ EBE3 30 06                                jr	nc, i_greater		;	if i	< H
 166+ EBE5 4F                                   ld	c,a					;		i = i + L
 167+ EBE6 D9                                   exx
 168+ EBE7 C5                                   push	bc				;		ix =	ddx:	iy =	ddy
 169+ EBE8 D9                                   exx
 170+ EBE9 18 05                                jr	check_plot			;	else
 171+ EBEB 94           i_greater:		        sub	h					;		i = i - H
 172+ EBEC 4F                                   ld	c,a
 173+ EBED D9                                   exx
 174+ EBEE D5                                   push	de				;		ix =	direc_x: iy = direc_y
 175+ EBEF D9                                   exx						;	endif
 176+ EBF0 E3           check_plot:		        ex	(sp),hl				;	preserve H,L distances on stack
 177+ EBF1 EB                                   ex	de,hl				;	D,E = ix,	iy
 178+ EBF2 2A 7E EB                             ld	hl,(line_gfx_coords)
 179+ EBF5 7D                                   ld	a,l
 180+ EBF6 83                                   add	a,e					;
 181+ EBF7 6F                                   ld	l,a					;	y0 =	y0 +	iy (y0 is	checked by plot)
 182+ EBF8 7A                                   ld	a,d
 183+ EBF9 3C                                   inc	a
 184+ EBFA 84                                   add	a,h
 185+ EBFB 38 04                                jr	c, check_range		;	check out	of range
 186+ EBFD 28 26                                jr	z, range_error		;	Fz=1	& Fc=0 denotes	x0 <	0
 187+ EBFF 18 02                                jr	plot_point
 188+ EC01 20 22        check_range:            jr	nz, range_error	;	Fz=0	& Fc=1 denotes	x0 >	255
 189+ EC03
 190+ EC03 3D           plot_point:             dec	a
 191+ EC04 C5                                   push	bc
 192+ EC05 F5                                   push	af
 193+ EC06 47                                   ld	    b,a					;	x0 =	x0 +	ix
 194+ EC07 4D                                   ld		c,l
 195+ EC08 3A 7D EB                             ld		a,(line_gfx_colour)
 196+ EC0B ED 43 7E EB                          ld      (line_gfx_coords),bc
 197+ EC0F                                      l2_plot_macro; call	l2_plot_pixel:
 197+ EC0F 78          >                        ld      a,b
 197+ EC10             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 197+ EC10 FE C0       >                        cp     192
 197+ EC12 D2 1E EC    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 197+ EC15 69          >                        ld      l,c
 197+ EC16 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 197+ EC19 67          >                        ld      h,a
 197+ EC1A 3A 7D EB    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 197+ EC1D 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 197+ EC1E             >.NoPlot:
 198+ EC1E F1                                   pop		af
 199+ EC1F C1                                   pop		bc
 200+ EC20 E1           plot_RET:		        pop	hl					;	restore H,L distances...
 201+ EC21 10 BB                                djnz	drawloop		; NEXT N
 202+ EC23 18 01                                jr	exit_draw
 203+ EC25
 204+ EC25 E1           range_error:	        pop	hl					; remove H,L distances...
 205+ EC26 C9           exit_draw:		        ret
 206+ EC27
 207+ EC27
 208+ EC27              ; ******************************************************************************
 209+ EC27              ;
 210+ EC27              ;	SGN (Signum value) of 16	bit signed integer.
 211+ EC27              ;
 212+ EC27              ;	IN:		HL =	integer
 213+ EC27              ;	OUT:		A = result: 0,1,-1 (if zero, positive, negative)
 214+ EC27              ;
 215+ EC27              ;	Registers	changed after return:
 216+ EC27              ;	..BCDEHL/IXIY	same
 217+ EC27              ;	AF....../....	different
 218+ EC27              ;
 219+ EC27 7C           sgn:				    ld	a,h
 220+ EC28 B5                                   or	l
 221+ EC29 C8                                   ret	z				; integer	is zero, return 0...
 222+ EC2A CB 7C                                bit	7,h
 223+ EC2C 20 03                                jr	nz, negative_int
 224+ EC2E 3E 01                                ld	a,1
 225+ EC30 C9                                   ret
 226+ EC31 3E FF        negative_int:		    ld	a,-1
 227+ EC33 C9                                   ret
 228+ EC34
 229+ EC34
 230+ EC34              ; ******************************************************************************
 231+ EC34              ;
 232+ EC34              ;	ABS (Absolute value) of 16 bit signed integer.
 233+ EC34              ;
 234+ EC34              ;	IN:		HL =	integer
 235+ EC34              ;	OUT:		HL =	converted	integer
 236+ EC34              ;
 237+ EC34              ;	Registers	changed after return:
 238+ EC34              ;	A.BCDE../IXIY	same
 239+ EC34              ;	.F....HL/....	different
 240+ EC34              ;
 241+ EC34 CB 7C        absValue:			    bit	7,h
 242+ EC36 C8                                   ret	z				; integer	is positive...
 243+ EC37 D5                                   push	de
 244+ EC38 EB                                   ex	de,hl
 245+ EC39 21 00 00                             ld	hl,0
 246+ EC3C BF                                   cp	a				; Fc	= 0,	may not be used...
 247+ EC3D ED 52                                sbc	hl,de			; convert	negative integer
 248+ EC3F D1                                   pop	de
 249+ EC40 C9                                   ret
 250+ EC41
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm
 783  EC41                  DISPLAY "Bank ",BankLAYER2," - Bytes free ",/D, $2000 - ($-LAYER2Addr), " - BankLAYER2"
 784  EC41              ; Bank 58  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 785  EC41                  SLOT    LAYER1Addr
 786  EC41                  PAGE    BankLAYER1
 787  EC41                  ORG     LAYER1Addr, BankLAYER1
 788  E000
 789  E000                  INCLUDE "./Layer1Graphics/layer1_attr_utils.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer1Graphics/layer1_attr_utils.asm
   1+ E000
   2+ E000 00 58        L1AttrRow00:            DW $5800                    ;Row 1    */
   3+ E002 20 58        L1AttrRow01:            DW $5820                    ;Row 2    */
   4+ E004 40 58        L1AttrRow02:            DW $5840                    ;Row 3    */
   5+ E006 60 58        L1AttrRow03:            DW $5860                    ;Row 4    */
   6+ E008 80 58        L1AttrRow04:            DW $5880                    ;Row 5    */
   7+ E00A A0 58        L1AttrRow05:            DW $58A0                    ;Row 6    */
   8+ E00C C0 58        L1AttrRow06:            DW $58C0                    ;Row 7    */
   9+ E00E E0 58        L1AttrRow07:            DW $58E0                    ;Row 8    */
  10+ E010 00 59        L1AttrRow08:            DW $5900                    ;Row 9    */
  11+ E012 20 59        L1AttrRow09:            DW $5920                    ;Row 10   */
  12+ E014 40 59        L1AttrRow10:            DW $5940                    ;Row 11   */
  13+ E016 60 59        L1AttrRow11:            DW $5960                    ;Row 12   */
  14+ E018 80 59        L1AttrRow12:            DW $5980                    ;Row 13   */
  15+ E01A A0 59        L1AttrRow13:            DW $59A0                    ;Row 14   */
  16+ E01C C0 59        L1AttrRow14:            DW $59C0                    ;Row 15   */
  17+ E01E E0 59        L1AttrRow15:            DW $59E0                    ;Row 16   */
  18+ E020 00 5A        L1AttrRow16:            DW $5A00                    ;Row 17   */
  19+ E022 20 5A        L1AttrRow17:            DW $5A20                    ;Row 18   */
  20+ E024 40 5A        L1AttrRow18:            DW $5A40                    ;Row 19   */
  21+ E026 60 5A        L1AttrRow19:            DW $5A60                    ;Row 20   */
  22+ E028 80 5A        L1AttrRow20:            DW $5A80                    ;Row 21   */
  23+ E02A A0 5A        L1AttrRow21:            DW $5AA0                    ;Row 22   */
  24+ E02C C0 5A        L1AttrRow22:            DW $5AC0                    ;Row 23   */
  25+ E02E E0 5A        L1AttrRow23:            DW $5AE0                    ;Row 23   */
  26+ E030
  27+ E030              ; "l2_hilight_row, d = row, e = colour"
  28+ E030 21 00 E0     l1_hilight_row:         ld      hl, L1AttrRow00
  29+ E033 4B                                   ld      c,e
  30+ E034 7A                                   ld      a,d
  31+ E035 CB 27                                sla     a
  32+ E037 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  33+ E039 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  34+ E03A 5F                                   ld      e,a
  35+ E03B 23                                   inc     hl
  36+ E03C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  37+ E03D 57                                   ld      d,a
  38+ E03E EB                                   ex      hl,de
  39+ E03F 79                                   ld		a,c
  40+ E040 11 20 00                             ld		de, 32
  41+ E043 CD AD 7A                             call	memfill_dma
  42+ E046 C9                                   ret
  43+ E047
# file closed: ./Layer1Graphics/layer1_attr_utils.asm
 790  E047                  INCLUDE "./Layer1Graphics/layer1_cls.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer1Graphics/layer1_cls.asm
   1+ E047 AF           l1_cls_top:             xor     a
   2+ E048 21 00 40                             ld      hl, $4000
   3+ E04B 11 00 08                             ld      de, $0800
   4+ E04E CD AD 7A                             call    memfill_dma
   5+ E051 C9                                   ret
   6+ E052
   7+ E052 AF           l1_cls_mid:             xor     a
   8+ E053 21 00 48                             ld      hl, $4800
   9+ E056 11 00 08                             ld      de, $0800
  10+ E059 CD AD 7A                             call    memfill_dma
  11+ E05C C9                                   ret
  12+ E05D
  13+ E05D AF           l1_cls_bottom:          xor     a
  14+ E05E 21 00 50                             ld      hl, $5000
  15+ E061 11 00 08                             ld      de, $0800
  16+ E064 CD AD 7A                             call    memfill_dma
  17+ E067 C9                                   ret
  18+ E068
  19+ E068              ; Designed specifically to clear a whole character aligned line
  20+ E068 1E 00        l1_cls_line_d:          ld      e,0
  21+ E06A ED 94                                pixelad
  22+ E06C 11 00 01                             ld      de,32 * 8
  23+ E06F AF                                   xor     a
  24+ E070 CD AD 7A                             call    memfill_dma
  25+ E073 C9                                   ret
  26+ E074
  27+ E074              ; Designed specifically to clear a whole character aligned 2 lines line, used for say clearing hyperspace message
  28+ E074 1E 00        l1_cls_2_lines_d:       ld      e,0
  29+ E076 ED 94                                pixelad
  30+ E078 11 00 02                             ld      de,32 * 16
  31+ E07B AF                                   xor     a
  32+ E07C CD AD 7A                             call    memfill_dma
  33+ E07F C9                                   ret
  34+ E080
  35+ E080 AF           l1_cls:                 xor		a
  36+ E081 21 00 40     l1_cls_to_a:            ld		hl,	$4000
  37+ E084 11 00 18                             ld		de, $1800
  38+ E087 CD AD 7A                             call	memfill_dma
  39+ E08A C9                                   ret
  40+ E08B
  41+ E08B 21 00 58     l1_attr_cls_2DlinesA:   ld		hl,	$5800
  42+ E08E 1E 20                                ld      e,32
  43+ E090 ED 30                                mul
  44+ E092 19                                   add     hl,de
  45+ E093 11 40 00                             ld		de, 32 * 2
  46+ E096 CD AD 7A                             call	memfill_dma
  47+ E099 C9                                   ret
  48+ E09A
  49+ E09A
  50+ E09A AF           l1_attr_cls:            xor		a
  51+ E09B 21 00 58     l1_attr_cls_to_a:       ld		hl,	$5800
  52+ E09E 11 00 03                             ld		de, $0300
  53+ E0A1 CD AD 7A                             call	memfill_dma
  54+ E0A4 C9                                   ret
  55+ E0A5
  56+ E0A5 01 FE FE     l1_set_border:          ld	    bc, 0xFEFE
  57+ E0A8 ED 79                                out		(c),a
  58+ E0AA C9                                   ret

 791  E0AB                  INCLUDE "./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm
   1+ E0AB              ; "l1 print char a = character, de = Ypixel Xchar of print"
   2+ E0AB D5 E5        l1_print_char:          push	de,,hl
   3+ E0AD ED 94                                pixelad								; hl = address of de
   4+ E0AF E5                                   push	hl							; save hl for loop
   5+ E0B0 26 00                                ld		h,0
   6+ E0B2 6F                                   ld		l,a
   7+ E0B3 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 2
   8+ E0B4 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 4
   9+ E0B5 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 8 to get byte address
  10+ E0B6 ED 34 00 3C                          add		hl,charactersetaddr			; hl = address of rom char
  11+ E0BA EB                                   ex		de,hl						; save address into de
  12+ E0BB E1                                   pop		hl							; get back hl for loop
  13+ E0BC 06 08                                ld		b,8							; do 8 rows
  14+ E0BE 1A           .PrintCharLoop:         ld		a,(de)						; row byte
  15+ E0BF 13                                   inc		de							; next byte
  16+ E0C0 77                                   ld		(hl),a						; poke to screen
  17+ E0C1 ED 93                                pixeldn								; Down 1 row
  18+ E0C3 10 F9                                djnz	.PrintCharLoop				; loop for 8 bytes
  19+ E0C5 E1 D1                                pop		de,,hl					    ; restore hl
  20+ E0C7 C9                                   ret
  21+ E0C8
  22+ E0C8              ; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
  23+ E0C8              ; now skips ascii code < 32 but moves on cursor by 1 char
  24+ E0C8              l1_print_at:
  25+ E0C8 7E           .PrintLoop:             ld		a,(hl)
  26+ E0C9 FE 00                                cp		0
  27+ E0CB C8                                   ret		z
  28+ E0CC                                      CallIfAGTENusng " ", l1_print_char
  28+ E0CC FE 20       >                        cp      " "
  28+ E0CE D4 AB E0    >                        call	nc,l1_print_char
  29+ E0D1 23                                   inc		hl							; move 1 message character right
  30+ E0D2 7B                                   ld		a,e
  31+ E0D3 C6 08                                add		a,8
  32+ E0D5 5F                                   ld		e,a							; move 1 screen character right
  33+ E0D6 18 F0                                jr		.PrintLoop
  34+ E0D8              .Clearstackandfinish:   ;pop		de                      ; TODO LOOOKS TO BE A ROGUE POPDE
  35+ E0D8 C9                                   ret
  36+ E0D9
  37+ E0D9              ;l1_print_at_wrap:
  38+ E0D9              ;; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
  39+ E0D9              ;	ld      iyh,e
  40+ E0D9              ;.PrintLoop:
  41+ E0D9              ;	ld		a,(hl)
  42+ E0D9              ;	cp		0
  43+ E0D9              ;	ret		z
  44+ E0D9              ;.CountWordCharLen
  45+ E0D9              ;; Need to change to word wrap, so it will loop through string as before
  46+ E0D9              ;; but read up until a null or space, take the character count * 8 for pixels
  47+ E0D9              ;; if that is > 238 then force a premature line wrap
  48+ E0D9              ;
  49+ E0D9              ;
  50+ E0D9              ;    push    iy
  51+ E0D9              ;    call	l1_print_char
  52+ E0D9              ;    pop     iy
  53+ E0D9              ;	inc		hl							; move 1 message character right
  54+ E0D9              ;	ld		a,e
  55+ E0D9              ;    cp      238
  56+ E0D9              ;    jr      nc,.NextLine
  57+ E0D9              ;	add		a,8
  58+ E0D9              ;	ld		e,a							; move 1 screen character right
  59+ E0D9              ;	jr		.PrintLoop
  60+ E0D9              ;.Clearstackandfinish:
  61+ E0D9              ;	pop		de
  62+ E0D9              ;	ret
  63+ E0D9              ;.NextLine:
  64+ E0D9              ;    ld      a,(hl)
  65+ E0D9              ;    cp      " "
  66+ E0D9              ;    ld      e,iyh
  67+ E0D9              ;    ld      a,d
  68+ E0D9              ;    add     a,8
  69+ E0D9              ;    ld      d,a
  70+ E0D9              ;    jr		.PrintLoop
  71+ E0D9
  72+ E0D9              ; Counts next word at hl, uses e and forces a wrap if it would over flow puts value in c
  73+ E0D9 E5           L1LenWordAtHL:          push    hl
  74+ E0DA D5                                   push    de
  75+ E0DB 7E           .CountLoop:             ld      a,(hl)
  76+ E0DC FE 00                                cp      0
  77+ E0DE 28 0F                                jr      z,.CountDone
  78+ E0E0 FE 20                                cp      32
  79+ E0E2 28 0B                                jr      z,.CountDone
  80+ E0E4 7B                                   ld      a,e
  81+ E0E5 C6 08                                add     a,8
  82+ E0E7 5F                                   ld      e,a
  83+ E0E8 FE EE                                cp      238
  84+ E0EA 30 07                                jr      nc,.TooLong
  85+ E0EC 23                                   inc     hl
  86+ E0ED 18 EC                                jr      .CountLoop
  87+ E0EF D1           .CountDone:             pop     de
  88+ E0F0 E1                                   pop     hl
  89+ E0F1 AF                                   xor     a
  90+ E0F2 C9                                   ret
  91+ E0F3 D1           .TooLong                pop     de
  92+ E0F4 E1                                   pop     hl
  93+ E0F5 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  94+ E0F7 C9                                   ret
  95+ E0F8
  96+ E0F8 7E           L1PrintWordAtHL:        ld      a,(hl)
  97+ E0F9 FE 00                                cp      0
  98+ E0FB C8                                   ret     z
  99+ E0FC FE 20                                cp      32
 100+ E0FE 28 0F                                jr      z,.ItsASpace
 101+ E100 FD E5                                push    iy
 102+ E102 CD AB E0                             call	l1_print_char
 103+ E105 FD E1                                pop     iy
 104+ E107 7B                                   ld      a,e
 105+ E108 C6 08                                add     a,8
 106+ E10A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 107+ E10B 23                                   inc     hl
 108+ E10C C3 F8 E0                             jp      L1PrintWordAtHL
 109+ E10F 23           .ItsASpace:             inc     hl      ;  Just a bodge for now
 110+ E110 7B                                   ld      a,e
 111+ E111 C6 08                                add     a,8
 112+ E113 5F                                   ld      e,a
 113+ E114 C9                                   ret
 114+ E115
 115+ E115
 116+ E115              ; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
 117+ E115              ; Now has full word level wrapping
 118+ E115 FD 63        l1_print_at_wrap:       ld      iyh,e
 119+ E117 7E           .PrintLoop:             ld		a,(hl)
 120+ E118 FE 00                                cp		0
 121+ E11A C8                                   ret		z
 122+ E11B CD D9 E0     .CountWordCharLen:      call    L1LenWordAtHL
 123+ E11E FE FF                                cp      $FF
 124+ E120 28 06                                jr      z,.WrapNextLine
 125+ E122 CD F8 E0     .NotTooLong:            call    L1PrintWordAtHL
 126+ E125              ; Need to change to word wrap, so it will loop through string as before
 127+ E125              ; but read up until a null or space, take the character count * 8 for pixels
 128+ E125              ; if that is > 238 then force a premature line wrap
 129+ E125 18 F0                                jr		.PrintLoop
 130+ E127              .Clearstackandfinish:   ;op		de
 131+ E127 C9                                   ret
 132+ E128              .WrapNextLine:
 133+ E128 FD 5C        .NextLine:              ld      e,iyh
 134+ E12A 7A                                   ld      a,d
 135+ E12B C6 08                                add     a,8
 136+ E12D 57                                   ld      d,a
 137+ E12E 18 E7                                jr		.PrintLoop
 138+ E130
 139+ E130
# file closed: ./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm
 792  E130                  DISPLAY "Bank ",BankLAYER1," - Bytes free ",/D, $2000 - ($-LAYER1Addr), " - BankLAYER1"
 793  E130              ; Bank 59  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 794  E130              ; In the first copy of the banks the "Non number" labels exist. They will map directly in other banks
 795  E130              ; as the is aligned and data tables are after that
 796  E130              ; need to make the ship index tables same size in each to simplify further
 797  E130                  SLOT    ShipModelsAddr
 798  E130                  PAGE    BankShipModels1
 799  E130              	ORG     ShipModelsAddr, BankShipModels1
 800  E000                  INCLUDE "./Data/ShipModelMacros.asm"
# file opened: ./Data/ShipModelMacros.asm
   1+ E000              MShipBankTable          MACRO
   2+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels1
   3+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels2
   4+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels3
   5+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels4
   6+ E000                                      ENDM
   7+ E000              ; For ship number A fetch
   8+ E000              ;           the adjusted ship number in B , C = original number
   9+ E000              ;           bank number in A for the respective ship based on the ship table
  10+ E000              MGetShipBankId:         MACRO   banktable
  11+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,0
  12+ E000 ~                                    ld      c,a                                 ; c= original ship id
  13+ E000 ~            .ShiftLoop:             srl     a
  14+ E000 ~                                    srl     a
  15+ E000 ~                                    srl     a
  16+ E000 ~                                    srl     a                                   ; divide by 16
  17+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,a                                 ; b = bank nbr
  18+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,c
  19+ E000 ~                                    ld      d,b
  20+ E000 ~                                    ld      e,16
  21+ E000 ~                                    mul                                         ; de = 16 * bank number (max is about 15 banks)
  22+ E000 ~                                    sub     e                                   ; a= actual model id now
  23+ E000 ~            .SelectedBank:          ld      d,b                                 ; save current bank number
  24+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,a                                 ; b = adjusted ship nbr
  25+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,d                                 ; a = bank number
  26+ E000 ~            ;.. Now b = bank and a = adjusted ship nbr
  27+ E000 ~                                    ld      hl,banktable                        ; a= bank index
  28+ E000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  29+ E000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  30+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)                              ; a = actual bank now
  31+ E000 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag
  32+ E000 ~                                    ret
  33+ E000                                      ENDM
  34+ E000
  35+ E000              McopyVertsToUniverse:   MACRO
  36+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,(VerticesAddyAddr)       ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
  37+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullVerticies
  38+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,0
  39+ E000 ~                                    ld			a,(VertexCtX6Addr)
  40+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,a
  41+ E000 ~                                    ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
  42+ E000 ~                                    call        memcopy_dma
  43+ E000 ~                                    ret
  44+ E000                                      ENDM
  45+ E000
  46+ E000              McopyEdgesToUniverse:   MACRO
  47+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,(EdgeAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
  48+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullEdges
  49+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,0
  50+ E000 ~                                    ld			a,(LineX4Addr)
  51+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,a
  52+ E000 ~                                    ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
  53+ E000 ~                                    call        memcopy_dma
  54+ E000 ~                                    ret
  55+ E000                                      ENDM
  56+ E000
  57+ E000              McopyNormsToUniverse:   MACRO
  58+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,(FaceAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
  59+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullNormals
  60+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,0
  61+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
  62+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,a
  63+ E000 ~                                    ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
  64+ E000 ~                                    call        memcopy_dma
  65+ E000 ~                                    ret
  66+ E000                                      ENDM
  67+ E000
  68+ E000              ; Passes in ship nbr in A and bank is part of MACRO
  69+ E000              MCopyShipToUniverse:    MACRO       banklabel
  70+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,UBnkShipModelBank
  71+ E000 ~                                    ld          (hl),banklabel
  72+ E000 ~                                    push        af
  73+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,iyl
  74+ E000 ~                                    ld          (UBnKShipModelId),a
  75+ E000 ~                                    pop         af
  76+ E000 ~                                    ld          (UBnKShipModelNbr),a
  77+ E000 ~            .GetHullDataLength:     ld          hl,ShipModelSizeTable
  78+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a
  79+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a                        ; we won't multiply by 2 as GetInfo is a general purpose routines so would end up x 4
  80+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,(hl)
  81+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
  82+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,(hl)                      ; bc now equals length of data set
  83+ E000 ~            .GetHullDataAddress:    ld          hl,ShipModelTable
  84+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a
  85+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a                        ; now hl = address of ship data value
  86+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,(hl)
  87+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
  88+ E000 ~                                    ld          h,(hl)
  89+ E000 ~                                    ld          l,a                         ; now hl = address of ship hull data
  90+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullCopy             ; Universe bank
  91+ E000 ~                                    ld          bc,ShipDataLength
  92+ E000 ~                                    ldir
  93+ E000 ~                                    call        CopyVertsToUniv
  94+ E000 ~                                    call        CopyEdgesToUniv
  95+ E000 ~                                    call        CopyNormsToUniv
  96+ E000 ~            .ClearName:             ld          hl,StartOfUnivName
  97+ E000 ~                                    ld          a," "
  98+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,16
  99+ E000 ~            .fillLoop:              ld          (hl),a
 100+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
 101+ E000 ~                                    djnz        .fillLoop
 102+ E000 ~            .SetName:               ld          a,(UBnKShipModelId)
 103+ E000 ~                                    call        ShipIndexToAddress
 104+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,StartOfUnivName
 105+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,16
 106+ E000 ~            .CopyLoop:              ld          a,(hl)
 107+ E000 ~                                    cp          0
 108+ E000 ~                                    jr          z,.CopyDone
 109+ E000 ~                                    ld          (de),a
 110+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
 111+ E000 ~                                    inc         de
 112+ E000 ~                                    djnz        .CopyLoop
 113+ E000 ~            .CopyDone:              ret
 114+ E000                                      ENDM
 115+ E000
 116+ E000              MCopyBodyToUniverse:    MACRO       copyRoutine
 117+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,13
 118+ E000 ~                                    call        copyRoutine
 119+ E000 ~                                    ret
 120+ E000                                      ENDM
 121+ E000
 122+ E000
 123+ E000              MCopyShipIdToUniverse:  MACRO
 124+ E000 ~                                    call        GetShipModelId
 125+ E000 ~                                    MMUSelectShipBankA
 126+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,b
 127+ E000 ~                                    jp          CopyShipToUniverse
 128+ E000                                      ENDM
# file closed: ./Data/ShipModelMacros.asm

 813  E0B0 11 10 C0    >                        ld          de,StartOfUnivName
 813  E0B3 06 10       >                        ld          b,16
 813  E0B5 7E          >.CopyLoop:              ld          a,(hl)
 813  E0B6 FE 00       >                        cp          0
 813  E0B8 28 05       >                        jr          z,.CopyDone
 813  E0BA 12          >                        ld          (de),a
 813  E0BB 23          >                        inc         hl
 813  E0BC 13          >                        inc         de
 813  E0BD 10 F6       >                        djnz        .CopyLoop
 813  E0BF C9          >.CopyDone:              ret
 814  E0C0              CopyBodyToUniverse:
 815  E0C0              CopyBodyToUniverse1:    MCopyBodyToUniverse     CopyShipToUniverse1
 815  E0C0 3E 0D       >                        ld          a,13
 815  E0C2 CD 6A E0    >                        call        CopyShipToUniverse1
 815  E0C5 C9          >                        ret

# file opened: ./Data/ships/CargoType5.asm
   1++E5CC 00           CargoType5              DB $00                         ; Number of cargo canisters released when destroyed
   2++E5CD 90 01                                DW 20 * 20                     ; Ship's targetable area LoHi
   3++E5CF 23 E6                                DW CargoType5Edges             ; Edge Data
   4++E5D1 3C                                   DB CargoType5EdgesSize         ; Size of Edge Data
   5++E5D2 00                                   DB $00                         ; Gun Vertex Byte offset
   6++E5D3 12                                   DB $12                         ; Explosion Count
   7++E5D4 0A                                   DB CargoType5VertSize /6       ; Vertex Count /6
   8++E5D5 3C                                   DB CargoType5VertSize          ; Vertex Count
   9++E5D6 0F                                   DB CargoType5EdgesCnt          ; Edges Count
  10++E5D7 00 00                                DW $0000                       ; Bounty LoHi
  11++E5D9 1C                                   DB CargoType5NormalsSize       ; Face (Normal) Count
  12++E5DA 0C                                   DB $0C                         ; Range when it turns to a dot
  13++E5DB 11                                   DB $11                         ; Energy Max
  14++E5DC 0F                                   DB $0F                         ; Speed Max
  15++E5DD 5F E6                                DW CargoType5Normals           ; Normals
  16++E5DF 02                                   DB $02                         ; Q scaling
  17++E5E0 00                                   DB $00                         ; Laser power and Nbr Missiles
  18++E5E1 E7 E5                                DW CargoType5Vertices          ; Verticles Address
  19++E5E3 04                                   DB ShipTypeScoopable           ; Ship Type
  20++E5E4 00                                   DB 0                           ; NewB Tactics
  21++E5E5 00                                   DB 0                           ; AI Flags
  22++E5E6 00                                   DB $0                          ; chance of ECM module
  23++E5E7              ; So cargo is               Edge offset $0050  Face Offset $008C, Verices will alwys be +20, LineMax 31 -> 4  EdgeCnt 15  VertexCnt 60 -> 10     FaceCn 28 -> 7
  24++E5E7 18 10 00 1F  CargoType5Vertices		DB $18,$10,$00,$1F,$10,$55 	; 60 bytes in total for data
  24++E5EB 10 55
  25++E5ED 18 05 0F 1F                          DB $18,$05,$0F,$1F,$10,$22
  25++E5F1 10 22
  26++E5F3 18 0D 09 5F                          DB $18,$0D,$09,$5F,$20,$33
  26++E5F7 20 33
  27++E5F9 18 0D 09 7F                          DB $18,$0D,$09,$7F,$30,$44
  27++E5FD 30 44
  28++E5FF 18 05 0F 3F                          DB $18,$05,$0F,$3F,$40,$55   ; end of left pentagon
  28++E603 40 55
  29++E605 18 10 00 9F                          DB $18,$10,$00,$9F,$51,$66   ; start of right pentagon
  29++E609 51 66
  30++E60B 18 05 0F 9F                          DB $18,$05,$0F,$9F,$21,$66
  30++E60F 21 66
  31++E611 18 0D 09 DF                          DB $18,$0D,$09,$DF,$32,$66
  31++E615 32 66
  32++E617 18 0D 09 FF                          DB $18,$0D,$09,$FF,$43,$66
  32++E61B 43 66
  33++E61D 18 05 0F BF                          DB $18,$05,$0F,$BF,$54,$66
  33++E621 54 66
  34++E623              CargoType5VertSize      equ $  - CargoType5Vertices
  35++E623 1F 10 00 04  CargoType5Edges			DB $1F,$10,$00,$04,$1F,$20,$04,$08 	; 8 x 7 = 60 bytes
  35++E627 1F 20 04 08
  36++E62B 1F 30 08 0C                          DB $1F,$30,$08,$0C,$1F,$40,$0C,$10
  36++E62F 1F 40 0C 10
  37++E633 1F 50 00 10                          DB $1F,$50,$00,$10,$1F,$51,$00,$14
  37++E637 1F 51 00 14
  38++E63B 1F 21 04 18                          DB $1F,$21,$04,$18,$1F,$32,$08,$1C
  38++E63F 1F 32 08 1C
  39++E643 1F 43 0C 20                          DB $1F,$43,$0C,$20,$1F,$54,$10,$24
  39++E647 1F 54 10 24
  40++E64B 1F 61 14 18                          DB $1F,$61,$14,$18,$1F,$62,$18,$1C
  40++E64F 1F 62 18 1C
  41++E653 1F 63 1C 20                          DB $1F,$63,$1C,$20,$1F,$64,$20,$24
  41++E657 1F 64 20 24
  42++E65B 1F 65 24 14                          DB $1F,$65,$24,$14
  43++E65F              CargoType5EdgesSize     equ $  - CargoType5Edges
  44++E65F              CargoType5EdgesCnt      equ CargoType5EdgesSize / 4
  45++E65F 1F 60 00 00  CargoType5Normals    	DB $1F,$60,$00,$00
  46++E663 1F 00 29 1E                          DB $1F,$00,$29,$1E,$5F,$00,$12,$30
  46++E667 5F 00 12 30
  47++E66B 5F 00 33 00                          DB $5F,$00,$33,$00,$7F,$00,$12,$30
  47++E66F 7F 00 12 30
  48++E673 3F 00 29 1E                          DB $3F,$00,$29,$1E,$9F,$60,$00,$00   ; end Cargo cannister
  48++E677 9F 60 00 00
  49++E67B              CargoType5NormalsSize   equ $  - CargoType5Normals
  50++E67B              CargoType5Len           equ $  - CargoType5

   4++F127 88                                   DB DodoEdgesSize              ; Size of Edge Data
   5++F128 00                                   DB $00                        ; Gun Vertex Byte offset
   6++F129 36                                   DB $36                        ; Explosion Count
   7++F12A 18                                   DB DodoVertSize /6            ; Vertex Count /6
   8++F12B 90                                   DB DodoVertSize               ; Vertex Count
   9++F12C 22                                   DB DodoEdgesCnt               ; Edges Count
  10++F12D 00 00                                DW $0000                      ; Bounty LoHi
  11++F12F 30                                   DB DodoNormalsSize            ; Face (Normal) Count
  12++F130 7D                                   DB $7D                        ; Range when it turns to a dot
  13++F131 F0                                   DB $F0                        ; Energy Max
  14++F132 00                                   DB $00                        ; Speed Max
  15++F133 55 F2                                DW DodoNormals                ; Normals
  16++F135 00                                   DB $00                        ; Q scaling
  17++F136 00                                   DB $00                        ; Laser power and Nbr Missiles
  18++F137 3D F1                                DW DodoVertices               ; Verticles Address

  20++F13A 00                                   DB 0                          ; NewB Tactics
  21++F13B 00                                   DB 0                          ; AI Flags

 187+ C1F3              MPD_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C1F3
   2++C1F3              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C1F3              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C1F3 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C1F4 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C1F5 23           	inc			hl
   7++C1F6 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C1F7 23           	inc			hl
   9++C1F8 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C1F9 23           	inc			hl
  11++C1FA 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C1FB 23           	inc			hl
  13++C1FC E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C1FD EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C1FE 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C200 C5           	push		bc
  17++C201 D1           	pop			de
  18++C202                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C202 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C206 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C209 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C20A C1           	pop			bc
  22++C20B 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C20D C9           	ret
  24++C20E
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

 206+ C239 CD CA C0                             call 	mktdisp_DispDEIXtoIY

 212+ C246 ED B0                                ldir

 230+ C26B F5           PrintMktDispItem:       push     af
 231+ C26C 21 08 20                             ld      hl,mktdisp_position
 232+ C26F 57                                   ld      d,a
 233+ C270 1E 08                                ld      e,8
 234+ C272 ED 30                                mul
 235+ C274 53                                   ld      d,e
 236+ C275 1E 00                                ld      e,0
 237+ C277 19                                   add     hl,de
 238+ C278 22 41 C0                             ld      (mktdisp_cursor),hl

 244+ C287 DD 21 00 E0                          ld		ix,StockFood		; start 8 bytes before index as first add will shift
 245+ C28B FD 21 8E 84                          ld      iy,CargoTonnes
 246+ C28F 1E 08                                ld		e,8
 247+ C291 57                                   ld		d,a
 248+ C292 ED 30                                mul
 249+ C294 DD 19                                add		ix,de				; Move down a row ix += a * 8
 250+ C296 16 00                                ld      d,0
 251+ C298 5F                                   ld      e,a
 252+ C299 FD 19                                add     iy,de                ; cargo table is just 1 byte per item

 830  E00F              GetShipBank2Id:         MGetShipBankId ShipBankTable2
 830  E00F 06 00       >                        ld      b,0
 830  E011 4F          >                        ld      c,a                                 ; c= original ship id
 830  E012 CB 3F       >.ShiftLoop:             srl     a
 830  E014 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
 830  E016 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
 830  E018 CB 3F       >                        srl     a                                   ; divide by 16
 830  E01A 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = bank nbr
 830  E01B 79          >                        ld      a,c
 830  E01C 50          >                        ld      d,b
 830  E01D 1E 10       >                        ld      e,16
 830  E01F ED 30       >                        mul                                         ; de = 16 * bank number (max is about 15 banks)
 830  E021 93          >                        sub     e                                   ; a= actual model id now
 830  E022 50          >.SelectedBank:          ld      d,b                                 ; save current bank number
 830  E023 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = adjusted ship nbr
 830  E024 7A          >                        ld      a,d                                 ; a = bank number
 830  E025             >;.. Now b = bank and a = adjusted ship nbr
 830  E025 21 62 E0    >                        ld      hl,ShipBankTable2                        ; a= bank index
 830  E028 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 830  E02A ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 830  E02C 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                              ; a = actual bank now
 830  E02D             >                        ClearCarryFlag
 830  E02D B7          >                        or a
 830  E02E C9          >                        ret
 831  E02F              CopyVertsToUniv2:       McopyVertsToUniverse
 831  E02F 2A 43 C3    >                        ld          hl,(VerticesAddyAddr)       ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
 831  E032 11 49 C3    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullVerticies
 831  E035 06 00       >                        ld          b,0
 831  E037 3A 37 C3    >                        ld			a,(VertexCtX6Addr)
 831  E03A 4F          >                        ld          c,a
 831  E03B EB          >                        ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
 831  E03C CD D3 7A    >                        call        memcopy_dma
 831  E03F C9          >                        ret
 832  E040              CopyEdgesToUniv2:       McopyEdgesToUniverse
 832  E040 2A 31 C3    >                        ld          hl,(EdgeAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
 832  E043 11 39 C4    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullEdges
 832  E046 06 00       >                        ld          b,0
 832  E048 3A 33 C3    >                        ld			a,(LineX4Addr)
 832  E04B 4F          >                        ld          c,a
 832  E04C EB          >                        ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
 832  E04D CD D3 7A    >                        call        memcopy_dma
 832  E050 C9          >                        ret
 833  E051              CopyNormsToUniv2:       McopyNormsToUniverse
 833  E051 2A 3F C3    >                        ld          hl,(FaceAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
 833  E054 11 01 C5    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullNormals
 833  E057 06 00       >                        ld          b,0

 833  E05E CD D3 7A    >                        call        memcopy_dma
 833  E061 C9          >                        ret

 835  E06D 36 43       >                        ld          (hl),BankShipModels2
 835  E06F F5          >                        push        af

 835  E079 21 46 E1    >.GetHullDataLength:     ld          hl,ShipModelSizeTable
 835  E07C ED 31       >                        add         hl,a
 835  E07E ED 31       >                        add         hl,a                        ; we won't multiply by 2 as GetInfo is a general purpose routines so would end up x 4
 835  E080 4E          >                        ld          c,(hl)
 835  E081 23          >                        inc         hl
 835  E082 46          >                        ld          b,(hl)                      ; bc now equals length of data set
 835  E083 21 C6 E0    >.GetHullDataAddress:    ld          hl,ShipModelTable
 835  E086 ED 31       >                        add         hl,a
 835  E088 ED 31       >                        add         hl,a                        ; now hl = address of ship data value
 835  E08A 7E          >                        ld          a,(hl)
 835  E08B 23          >                        inc         hl
 835  E08C 66          >                        ld          h,(hl)
 835  E08D 6F          >                        ld          l,a                         ; now hl = address of ship hull data
 835  E08E 11 2E C3    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullCopy             ; Universe bank
 835  E091 01 1B 00    >                        ld          bc,ShipDataLength
 835  E094 ED B0       >                        ldir

 835  E0A2 3E 20       >                        ld          a," "
 835  E0A4 06 10       >                        ld          b,16
 835  E0A6 77          >.fillLoop:              ld          (hl),a
 835  E0A7 23          >                        inc         hl
 835  E0A8 10 FC       >                        djnz        .fillLoop
 835  E0AA 3A 43 C0    >.SetName:               ld          a,(UBnKShipModelId)
 835  E0AD CD 85 8E    >                        call        ShipIndexToAddress
 835  E0B0 11 10 C0    >                        ld          de,StartOfUnivName
 835  E0B3 06 10       >                        ld          b,16
 835  E0B5 7E          >.CopyLoop:              ld          a,(hl)
 835  E0B6 FE 00       >                        cp          0
 835  E0B8 28 05       >                        jr          z,.CopyDone
 835  E0BA 12          >                        ld          (de),a
 835  E0BB 23          >                        inc         hl
 835  E0BC 13          >                        inc         de
 835  E0BD 10 F6       >                        djnz        .CopyLoop
 835  E0BF C9          >.CopyDone:              ret
