  85++DA29              ; Roate around axis
  86++DA29              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
  87++DA29              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
  88++DA29              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
  89++DA29              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
  90++DA29              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
  91++DA29              ; var RAT2 gives direction
  92++DA29              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
  93++DA29              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
  94++DA29              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
  95++DA29 2A FE 7D     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
  96++DA2C 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
  97++DA2D 23                                   inc     hl
  98++DA2E 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
  99++DA2F EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 100++DA30 7C                                   ld      a,h
 101++DA31 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 102++DA33 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 103++DA35 7C                                   ld      a,h
 104++DA36 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 105++DA38 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 106++DA3A 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 107++DA3B FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 108++DA3D 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 109++DA3E B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 110++DA3F CD 52 90                             call    subHLDES15      ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 111++DA42              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 112++DA42 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 113++DA43 7D                                   ld      a,l
 114++DA44 32 1E 7F                             ld      (varR),a
 115++DA47 7C                                   ld      a,h
 116++DA48 32 1F 7F                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 117++DA4B              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 118++DA4B 2A 00 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 119++DA4E 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 120++DA4F 23                                   inc     hl
 121++DA50 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 122++DA51 7A                                   ld      a,d
 123++DA52 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 124++DA54 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 125++DA56 7A                                   ld      a,d
 126++DA57 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 127++DA59 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 128++DA5A                                      ShiftDERight1
 128++DA5A CB 3A       >			   srl d
 128++DA5C CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 129++DA5E                                      ShiftDERight1
 129++DA5E CB 3A       >			   srl d
 129++DA60 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 130++DA62                                      ShiftDERight1
 130++DA62 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 130++DA64 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 131++DA66                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 131++DA66 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 131++DA68 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 132++DA6A 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 133++DA6D FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 134++DA6F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 135++DA71 B2                                   or      d
 136++DA72 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 137++DA73              ;;; ld      a,e
 138++DA73              ;;;     or      iyh
 139++DA73              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 140++DA73              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 141++DA73 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 142++DA74                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 143++DA74              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 144++DA74 CD 83 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4 ; do add using hl and de
 145++DA77 E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 146++DA78              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 147++DA78              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 148++DA78 2A 00 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 149++DA7B 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 150++DA7C 23                                   inc     hl
 151++DA7D 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 152++DA7E EB                                   ex      de,hl
 153++DA7F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 154++DA80 E6 80                                and     $80
 155++DA82 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 156++DA84 7C                                   ld      a,h
 157++DA85 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 158++DA87 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 159++DA89 5F                                   ld      e,a
 160++DA8A FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 161++DA8C 57                                   ld      d,a
 162++DA8D B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 163++DA8E CD 52 90                             call    subHLDES15
 164++DA91              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 165++DA91 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 166++DA92 7D                                   ld      a,l
 167++DA93 32 19 7E                             ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 168++DA96 7C                                   ld      a,h
 169++DA97 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 170++DA99 32 3B 7F                             ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 171++DA9C              ;-- Set up TQ
 172++DA9C 2A FE 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 173++DA9F              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 174++DA9F 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 175++DAA0 23                                   inc     hl
 176++DAA1 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 177++DAA2 7A                                   ld      a,d
 178++DAA3 E6 80                                and     $80
 179++DAA5 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 180++DAA7 7A                                   ld      a,d
 181++DAA8 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 182++DAAA 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 183++DAAB                                      ShiftDERight1
 183++DAAB CB 3A       >			   srl d
 183++DAAD CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 184++DAAF                                      ShiftDERight1
 184++DAAF CB 3A       >			   srl d
 184++DAB1 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 185++DAB3                                      ShiftDERight1
 185++DAB3 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 185++DAB5 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 186++DAB7                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 186++DAB7 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 186++DAB9 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 187++DABB 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)
 188++DABE FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 189++DAC0 E6 80                                and     $80
 190++DAC2 B2                                   or      d
 191++DAC3 57                                   ld      d,a
 192++DAC4              ;;; ld      a,e
 193++DAC4              ;;;     or      iyh
 194++DAC4              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 195++DAC4 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 196++DAC5              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 197++DAC5 CD 52 90                             call    subHLDES15 ; do add using hl and de
 198++DAC8              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 199++DAC8 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 200++DAC9 2A 00 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 201++DACC 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 202++DACD 23                                   inc     hl
 203++DACE 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 204++DACF              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 205++DACF D1                                   pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 206++DAD0 2A FE 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 207++DAD3 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 208++DAD4 23                                   inc     hl
 209++DAD5 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 210++DAD6 C9                                   ret
 211++DAD7
 212++DAD7
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
1163+ DAD7                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipSpeed.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipSpeed.asm

   7++DAD7              ;                        call    AHLEquBHLaddCDE
   8++DAD7              ;                        ld      (vertex),hl
   9++DAD7              ;                        ld      (vertex+2),a
  10++DAD7              ;                        ENDM
  11++DAD7
  12++DAD7
  13++DAD7              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  14++DAD7 3A 46 C0     ApplyShipSpeed:         ld      a,(UBnKSpeed)                   ; get speed * 4
  15++DADA FE 00                                cp      0
  16++DADC C8                                   ret     z
  17++DADD CB 27                                sla     a
  18++DADF CB 27                                sla     a
  19++DAE1 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                           ; save pre calculated speed
  20++DAE3              .ApplyToX:              SpeedMulAxis    a, UBnkrotmatNosevX     ; e =  ABS (nosev x hi) c = sign
  20++DAE3 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  20++DAE4 2A 35 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
  20++DAE7 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  20++DAE8             >                        ClearSignBitA
  20++DAE8 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  20++DAEA 57          >                        ld      d,a
  20++DAEB ED 30       >                        mul     de
  20++DAED 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  20++DAEE             >                        SignBitOnlyA

  20++DAF1 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  20++DAF2 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0

  21++DAFC CD DE 8F    >                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned               ; DEL = DEL + BCH
  21++DAFF 7D          >                        ld      a,l
  21++DB00 32 20 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKxlo),a
  21++DB03 ED 53 21 C0 >                        ld      (UBnKxlo+1),de
  22++DB07              .ApplyToY:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatNosevY

  22++DB0D             >                        ClearSignBitA
  22++DB0D E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  22++DB0F 57          >                        ld      d,a
  22++DB10 ED 30       >                        mul     de

  22++DB13             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  22++DB13 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit

  22++DB16 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  22++DB17 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0
  23++DB19              .AddSpeedToY:           AddSpeedToVert UBnKylo

  23++DB1D 3A 23 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKylo)

  23++DB21 CD DE 8F    >                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned               ; DEL = DEL + BCH
  23++DB24 7D          >                        ld      a,l
  23++DB25 32 23 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKylo),a
  23++DB28 ED 53 24 C0 >                        ld      (UBnKylo+1),de
  24++DB2C              .ApplyToZ:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatNosevZ

   1++DB52

   7++DB53                    ;break                                                                             ; ObjectInFront:

1168+ DB7F              ProcessDot:            ; break
1169+ DB7F CD B8 CD                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1170+ DB82 CD F8 77                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1171+ DB85 CD 70 D0                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1172+ DB88 CD 3D CF                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1173+ DB8B 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0

1176+ DB94 22 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),hl

1178+ DB98 CD 1E 77                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1179+ DB9B CD E1 CD                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15

1188+ DBA9              ;     see if node >
1189+ DBA9 00           PNXX20DIV6          DB      0
1190+ DBAA 00 00        PNVERTEXPTR         DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1191+ DBAC 00 00        PNNODEPRT           DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1192+ DBAE 00           PNLASTNORM          DB      0
1193+ DBAF              ProcessNodes:           ZeroA
1193+ DBAF AF          >                        xor a
1194+ DBB0 32 22 C3                             ld      (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
1195+ DBB3 CD B8 CD                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat ; CopyRotToTransMacro                      ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1196+ DBB6 CD F8 77                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1197+ DBB9 CD 70 D0                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1198+ DBBC CD 3D CF                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1199+ DBBF 21 49 C3                             ld      hl,UBnkHullVerticies
1200+ DBC2 3A 37 C3                             ld      a,(VertexCtX6Addr)               ; get Hull byte#9 = number of vertices *6                                   ;;;
1201+ DBC5 4F           GetActualVertexCount:   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1202+ DBC6 4F                                   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1203+ DBC7 16 06                                ld      d,6
1204+ DBC9 CD D5 94                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1205+ DBCC 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1206+ DBCD FD 21 F0 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray

1208+ DBD1 C5           PointLoop:	            push	bc                                  ; save counters
1209+ DBD2 E5                                   push	hl                                  ; save verticies list pointer
1210+ DBD3 FD E5                                push	iy                                  ; save Screen plot array pointer
1211+ DBD5 78                                   ld      a,b
1212+ DBD6                                      ;break
1213+ DBD6 CD 31 D6                             call    CopyNodeToXX15                      ; copy verices at hl to xx15
1214+ DBD9 3A A7 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkXScaledSign)

1216+ DBDF CD E1 CD                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15

1223+ DBEC E1                                   pop		hl

1238+ DBFE CD B5 D2     ProcessShip:            call    CheckVisible                ; checks for z -ve and outside view frustrum, sets up flags for next bit
1239+ DC01 3A 54 C0     .IsItADot:              ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1240+ DC04 E6 68                                and     ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot | ShipExploding  ; first off set if we can draw or need to update explosion
1241+ DC06 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if none of these flags are set we can fast exit

1242+ DC07 CB 6F       >                        bit 	ShipExplodingBitNbr, a
1242+ DC09 C2 45 DC    >                        jp      nz,.ExplodingCloud

1248+ DC17 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1248+ DC1A CB DE       >                        set     ShipIsDotBitNbr,(hl)

1250+ DC20 ED 5B F2 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkNodeArray+2)        ; and Y
1251+ DC24 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; if high byte components are not 0 then off screen
1252+ DC25 B2                                   or      d                           ;
1253+ DC26 C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
1254+ DC27 7B                                   ld      a,e
1255+ DC28 E6 80                                and     %10000000                   ; check to see if Y > 128
1256+ DC2A C0                                   ret     nz
1257+ DC2B 43                                   ld      b,e                         ; now b = y and c = x
1258+ DC2C 3E FF                                ld      a,L2ColourWHITE_1           ; just draw a pixel
1259+ DC2E 3E E0                                ld      a,224
1260+ DC30                                      MMUSelectLayer2                     ; then go to update radar
1260+ DC30 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1261+ DC34 CD AA E1                             call    ShipPixel                   ;
1262+ DC37 C9                                   ret
1263+ DC38              ;............................................................
1264+ DC38 CD AF DB     .CarryOnWithDraw:       call    ProcessNodes                ; process notes is the poor performer or check distnace is not culling
1265+ DC3B CD FC D2                             call    CullV2
1266+ DC3E                                     ; break
1267+ DC3E CD 06 DE                             call    PrepLines
1268+ DC41 CD 53 DB                             call    DrawLines
1269+ DC44 C9                                   ret
1270+ DC45              ;............................................................
1271+ DC45 CD AF DB     .ExplodingCloud:        call    ProcessNodes
1272+ DC48                                      ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm, ShipKilledBitNbr ; acknowledge ship exploding
1272+ DC48 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1272+ DC4B CB A6       >                        res     ShipKilledBitNbr,(hl)
1273+ DC4D 3A 5F C0     .UpdateCloudCounter:    ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; counter += 4 until > 255
1274+ DC50 C6 04                                add     4                           ; we do this early as we now have logic for
1275+ DC52 DA 14 DD                             jp      c,.FinishedExplosion        ; display or not later
1276+ DC55 32 5F C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; .
1277+ DC58              .SkipHiddenShip:        ReturnOnMemBitClear  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr
1277+ DC58 3A 54 C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1277+ DC5B CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1277+ DC5D C8          >                        ret		z
1278+ DC5E              .IsShipADot:            JumpOnABitSet ShipIsDotBitNbr, .itsJustADot ; if its dot distance then explosion is a dot, TODO later we will do as a coloured dot
1278+ DC5E CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1278+ DC60 C2 14 DC    >                        jp      nz,.itsJustADot
1279+ DC63 2A 26 C0     .CalculateZ:            ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; al = hl = z
1280+ DC66 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
1281+ DC67                                      JumpIfALTNusng 32,.CalcFromZ        ; if its >= 32 then set a to FE and we are done
1281+ DC67 FE 20       >                        cp      32
1281+ DC69 DA 71 DC    >                        jp		c, .CalcFromZ
1282+ DC6C 26 FE                                ld      h,$FE                       ; .
1283+ DC6E C3 7C DC                             jp      .DoneZDist                  ; .
1284+ DC71              .CalcFromZ:             ShiftHLLeft1                        ; else
1284+ DC71 CB 25       >			   sla l
1284+ DC73 CB 14       >			   rl  h
1285+ DC75                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ; hl = hl * 2
1285+ DC75 CB 25       >			   sla l
1285+ DC77 CB 14       >			   rl  h
1286+ DC79                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; h = h * 3 rolling in lower bit
1286+ DC79 37          >                        scf
1287+ DC7A CB 14                                rl  h                               ;
1288+ DC7C 06 00        .DoneZDist:             ld      b,0                         ; bc = cloud z distance calculateed
1289+ DC7E 4C                                   ld      c,h                         ; .
1290+ DC7F 3A 5F C0     .CalcCloudRadius:       ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; de = cloud counter * 256
1291+ DC82                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
1292+ DC82 ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
1293+ DC82 ~                                    ld      b,h
1294+ DC82 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivBLog
1295+ DC82 ~                                    ld      d,a
1296+ DC82 ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
1297+ DC82                      ELSE
1298+ DC82 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
1299+ DC83 1E 00                                ld      e,0                         ;
1300+ DC85 CD 19 94                             call    DEequDEDivBC                ; de = cloud counter * 256 / z distance
1301+ DC88 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; if radius >= 28
1302+ DC89                      ENDIF
1303+ DC89                                      JumpIfALTNusng  28,.SetCloudRadius  ; then set raidus in d to $FE
1303+ DC89 FE 1C       >                        cp      28
1303+ DC8B DA 93 DC    >                        jp		c, .SetCloudRadius
1304+ DC8E 16 FE        .MaxCloudRadius:        ld      d,$FE                       ;
1305+ DC90 C3 9F DC                             jp      .SizedUpCloud               ;
1306+ DC93              .SetCloudRadius:        ShiftDELeft1                        ; de = 8 * de
1306+ DC93 CB 23       >			   sla e
1306+ DC95 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1307+ DC97                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1307+ DC97 CB 23       >			   sla e
1307+ DC99 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1308+ DC9B                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1308+ DC9B CB 23       >			   sla e
1308+ DC9D CB 12       >			   rl  d
1309+ DC9F 7A           .SizedUpCloud:          ld      a,d                         ; cloudradius = a = d or (cloudcounter * 8 / 256)
1310+ DCA0 32 60 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a         ; .
1311+ DCA3 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = a = calculated cloud radius
1312+ DCA5 3A 5F C0     .CalcSubParticleColour: ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; colur fades away
1313+ DCA8 ED 23                                swapnib                             ; divive by 16
1314+ DCAA E6 0F                                and     $0F                         ; mask off upper bytes
1315+ DCAC CB 2F                                sra     a                           ; divide by 32
1316+ DCAE 21 20 DD                             ld      hl,DebrisColourTable
1317+ DCB1 ED 31                                add     hl,a
1318+ DCB3 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1319+ DCB4 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = pixel colours
1320+ DCB6 3A 5F C0     .CalcSubParticleCount:  ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; cloud counter = abs (cloud counter) in effect if > 127 then shrinks it
1321+ DCB9                                      ABSa2c                              ; a = abs a
1321+ DCB9 CB 7F       >                        bit     7,a
1321+ DCBB CA C0 DC    >                        jp      z,.DoneABSa
1321+ DCBE ED 44       >                        neg
1321+ DCC0             >.DoneABSa:
1322+ DCC0 CB 2F        .ParticlePositive:      sra a                               ; iyh = (a /8)
1323+ DCC2 CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1324+ DCC4 CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1325+ DCC6 F6 01                                or  1                               ; bit 0 set so minimum 1
1326+ DCC8 DD 6F        .DoneSubParticleCount:  ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = nbr particles per vertex
1327+ DCCA 3A 36 C3     .ForEachVertex:         ld      a,(VertexCountAddr)         ; load vertex count into b
1328+ DCCD 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
1329+ DCCE 21 F0 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray            ; hl = list of vertices
1330+ DCD1 C5 E5        .ExplosionVertLoop:     push    bc,,hl                      ; save vertex counter in b and pointer to verticles in hl
1331+ DCD3 DD 68                                    ld      ixl,b                   ; save counter
1332+ DCD5 4E                                       ld      c,(hl)                  ; get vertex into bc and de
1333+ DCD6 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1334+ DCD7 46                                       ld      b,(hl)                  ; .
1335+ DCD8 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1336+ DCD9 5E                                       ld      e,(hl)                  ; .
1337+ DCDA 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1338+ DCDB 56                                       ld      d,(hl)                  ; now hl is done with and we can use it
1339+ DCDC DD 7D        .LoopSubParticles:          ld      a,ixl                   ; iyh = loop iterator for nbr of particles per vertex
1340+ DCDE FD 67                                    ld      iyh,a                   ;
1341+ DCE0                                          ;break
1342+ DCE0 D5 C5        .ProcessAParticle:          push    de,,bc                  ; save y then x coordinates
1343+ DCE2 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; hl = de (Y)
1344+ DCE3 DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1345+ DCE5 CD 28 DD                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1346+ DCE8 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if off screen skip
1347+ DCE9                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NextIteration
1347+ DCE9 A7          >                        and     a
1347+ DCEA C2 05 DD    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1348+ DCED EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; de = result for y which was put into hl
1349+ DCEE E1                                           pop     hl                  ; get x back from bc on stack
1350+ DCEF E5                                           push    hl                  ; put bc (which is now in hl) back on the stack
1351+ DCF0 D5                                           push    de                  ; save de
1352+ DCF1 DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1353+ DCF3 CD 28 DD                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1354+ DCF6 D1                                           pop     de                  ; get de back doing pop here clears stack up
1355+ DCF7 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if high byte has a value then off screen
1356+ DCF8                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero .NextIteration ;
1356+ DCF8 A7          >                        and     a
1356+ DCF9 C2 05 DD    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1357+ DCFC 43                                           ld      b,e                 ; bc = y x of pixel from e and c regs
1358+ DCFD 4D                                           ld      c,l                 ; iyl already has colour
1359+ DCFE                                              MMUSelectLayer2             ; plot it with debris code as this can chop y > 128
1359+ DCFE ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1360+ DD02 CD B2 E1                                     call    DebrisPixel         ; .
1361+ DD05 C1 D1        .NextIteration:             pop    de,,bc                   ; ready for next iteration, get back y and x coordinates
1362+ DD07 FD 25                                    dec    iyh                      ; one partcile done
1363+ DD09 20 D5                                    jr      nz,.ProcessAParticle    ; until all done
1364+ DD0B E1 C1        .NextVert:              pop     bc,,hl                      ; recover loop counter and source pointer
1365+ DD0D 3E 04                                ld      a,4                         ; move to next vertex group
1366+ DD0F ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ;
1367+ DD11 10 BE                                djnz    .ExplosionVertLoop          ;
1368+ DD13 C9                                   ret
1369+ DD14              .FinishedExplosion:     ;break
1370+ DD14 3A 3F C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSlotNumber)          ; get slot number
1371+ DD17 CD 34 84                             call    ClearSlotA                  ; gauranted to be in main memory as non bankables
1372+ DD1A                                      ClearMemBitN UBnkaiatkecm, ShipExplodingBitNbr
1372+ DD1A 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1372+ DD1D CB AE       >                        res     ShipExplodingBitNbr,(hl)
1373+ DD1F C9                                   ret
1374+ DD20
1375+ DD20
1376+ DD20 FC D8 B4 90  DebrisColourTable:      DB L2ColourYELLOW_1, L2ColourYELLOW_2, L2ColourYELLOW_3, L2ColourYELLOW_4, L2ColourYELLOW_5, L2ColourYELLOW_6, L2ColourYELLOW_7,L2ColourGREY_4
1376+ DD24 6C 48 24 25
1377+ DD28                                      ; set flags and signal to remove from slot list
1378+ DD28
1379+ DD28              ; Hl = HlL +/- (Random * projected cloud size)
1380+ DD28              ; In - d = z distance, hl = vert hi lo
1381+ DD28              ; Out hl = adjusted distance
1382+ DD28              ; uses registers hl, de
1383+ DD28 E5           HLEquARandCloud:        push    hl                          ; random number geneator upsets hl register
1384+ DD29 CD C2 84                             call    doRandom                    ; a= random * 2
1385+ DD2C E1                                   pop     hl
1386+ DD2D 17                                   rla                                 ;
1387+ DD2E 38 0A                                jr      c,.Negative                 ; if buit 7 went into carry
1388+ DD30 5F           .Positive:              ld  e,a
1389+ DD31 ED 30                                mul
1390+ DD33 5A                                   ld  e,d
1391+ DD34 16 00                                ld  d,0
1392+ DD36                                      ClearCarryFlag
1392+ DD36 B7          >                        or a
1393+ DD37 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1394+ DD39 C9                                   ret
1395+ DD3A 5F           .Negative:              ld  e,a
1396+ DD3B ED 30                                mul
1397+ DD3D 5A                                   ld  e,d
1398+ DD3E 16 00                                ld  d,0
1399+ DD40                                      ClearCarryFlag
1399+ DD40 B7          >                        or a
1400+ DD41 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1401+ DD43 C9                                   ret
1402+ DD44
1403+ DD44              GetExperiencePoints:    ; TODO calculate experience points
1404+ DD44                                      ; TODO mission updates check
1405+ DD44 C9                                   ret
1406+ DD45
1407+ DD45              ; ......................................................
1408+ DD45 3A 45 C3     KillShip:               ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1409+ DD48 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1410+ DD4A C8                                   ret     z
1411+ DD4B 3A 54 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; remove AI, mark killed, mark exploding
1412+ DD4E F6 30                                or      ShipExploding | ShipKilled  ; .
1413+ DD50 E6 7F                                and     ShipAIDisabled              ; .
1414+ DD52 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ; .
1415+ DD55                                      SetMemToN   UBnKexplDsp, ShipExplosionDuration ; set debris cloud timer, also usered in main to remove from slots
1415+ DD55 3E 4B       >                        ld      a,ShipExplosionDuration
1415+ DD57 32 51 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKexplDsp),a
1416+ DD5A                                      ldWriteZero UBnKEnergy              ; Zero ship energy
1416+ DD5A AF          >                        xor      a
1416+ DD5B 32 58 C0    >                        ld       (UBnKEnergy),a
1417+ DD5E 32 60 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a
1418+ DD61 3E 12                                ld      a,18
1419+ DD63 32 5F C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; Zero cloud
1420+ DD66                                      ; TODO logic to spawn cargo/plates goes here
1421+ DD66 C9                                   ret
1422+ DD67
1423+ DD67              ; in a = damage
1424+ DD67 47           DamageShip:             ld      b,a                         ; b = a = damage comming in
1425+ DD68 3A 45 C3                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1426+ DD6B FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1427+ DD6D C8                                   ret     z
1428+ DD6E 3A 58 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)              ; get current energy level
1429+ DD71                                      ClearCarryFlag
1429+ DD71 B7          >                        or a
1430+ DD72 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; subtract damage
1431+ DD73 D2 7A DD     .Overkilled:            jp      nc,.DoneDamage              ; if no carry then its not gone negative
1432+ DD76 CD 45 DD                             call    KillShip                    ; else kill it
1433+ DD79 C9                                   ret
1434+ DD7A 32 58 C0     .DoneDamage:            ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
1435+ DD7D C9                                   ret
1436+ DD7E              ; need recovery for energy too
1437+ DD7E              ; Shall we have a "jolt ship off course routine for when it gets hit by a blast or collision)
1438+ DD7E
1439+ DD7E              ;-LL49-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1440+ DD7E              ;  Entering Here we have the following:
1441+ DD7E              ;  XX15(1 0) = vertex x-coordinate but sign not populated
1442+ DD7E              ;  XX15(3 2) = vertex y-coordinate but sign not populated
1443+ DD7E              ;  XX15(5 4) = vertex z-coordinate but sign not populated
1444+ DD7E              ;
1445+ DD7E              ;  XX16(  1 0)sidev_x   (3 2)roofv_x   (5 4)nosev_x
1446+ DD7E              ;  XX16(  7 6)sidev_y   (9 8)roofv_y (11 10)nosev_y
1447+ DD7E              ;  XX16(13 12)sidev_z (15 14)roofv_z (17 16)nosev_z
1448+ DD7E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1449+ DD7E              AddLaserBeamLine:
1450+ DD7E              ; this code is a bag of shit and needs re-writing
1451+ DD7E              GetGunVertexNode:
1452+ DD7E 3A 34 C3             ld          a,(GunVertexAddr)                   ; Hull byte#6, gun vertex*4 (XX0),Y
1453+ DD81 21 F0 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; list of lines to read
1454+ DD84 ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; HL = address of GunVertexOnNodeArray
1455+ DD86 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0
1456+ DD89              MoveX1PointToXX15:
1457+ DD89 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1458+ DD8A 23                   inc         hl
1459+ DD8B 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = x1 of gun vertex
1460+ DD8C 23                   inc         hl
1461+ DD8D ED 43 A6 C0          ld          (UBnkX1),bc
1462+ DD91 0C                   inc         c
1463+ DD92 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1464+ DD93 04                   inc         b
1465+ DD94 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1466+ DD95              MoveY1PointToXX15:
1467+ DD95 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1468+ DD96 23                   inc         hl
1469+ DD97 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = y1 of gun vertex
1470+ DD98 23                   inc         hl
1471+ DD99 ED 43 A8 C0          ld          (UBnkY1),bc
1472+ DD9D              SetX2PointToXX15:
1473+ DD9D 01 00 00             ld          bc,0                                ; set X2 to 0
1474+ DDA0 ED 43 AA C0          ld          (UBnkX2),bc
1475+ DDA4 3A 26 C0             ld          a,(UBnKzlo)
1476+ DDA7 4F                   ld          c,a
1477+ DDA8              SetY2PointToXX15:
1478+ DDA8 ED 43 AC C0          ld          (UBnkY2),bc                         ; set Y2to 0
1479+ DDAC 3A 22 C0             ld          a,(UBnKxsgn)
1480+ DDAF                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,LL74SkipDec
1480+ DDAF CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1480+ DDB1 CA B9 DD    >                        jp      z,LL74SkipDec
1481+ DDB4              LL74DecX2:
1482+ DDB4 3E FF                ld          a,$FF
1483+ DDB6 32 AA C0             ld          (UBnkX2Lo),a                        ; rather than dec (hl) just load with 255 as it will always be that at this code point
1484+ DDB9              LL74SkipDec:
1485+ DDB9 CD 28 CB             call        ClipLineV3                            ; LL145 \ clip test on XX15 XX12 vector, returns carry
1486+ DDBC 3A 7C C8             ld          a,(ClipSuccess)
1487+ DDBF A7                   and         a
1488+ DDC0 28 71                jr          z,CalculateNewLines
1489+ DDC2              ;        jr          c,CalculateNewLines                 ; LL170 clip returned carry set so not visibile if carry set skip the rest (laser not firing)
1490+ DDC2              ; Here we are usign hl to replace VarU as index
1491+ DDC2 2A 20 7F             ld          hl,(varU16)
1492+ DDC5 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UBnKx1Lo)
1493+ DDC8 77                   ld          (hl),a
1494+ DDC9 23                   inc         hl
1495+ DDCA 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy1Lo)
1496+ DDCD 77                   ld          (hl),a
1497+ DDCE 23                   inc         hl
1498+ DDCF 3A AA C0             ld          a,(UBnkX2Lo)
1499+ DDD2 77                   ld          (hl),a
1500+ DDD3 23                   inc         hl
1501+ DDD4 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UbnKy2Lo)
1502+ DDD7 77                   ld          (hl),a
1503+ DDD8 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; iyl holds as a counter to iterations
1504+ DDDA 23                   inc         hl
1505+ DDDB FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; ready for next byte
1506+ DDDD 22 20 7F             ld          (varU16),hl
1507+ DDE0 C9                   ret
1508+ DDE1

   1++DDE1                  ;DEFINE  CLIPVersion3 1
   2++DDE1              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   3++DDE1                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   1++DDE1              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DDE1              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DDE1 21 F0 C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DDE4 ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DDE6 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DDE7 11 A6 C0                             ld          de,UBnkX1
   7++DDEA ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   8++DDEC ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   9++DDEE ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
  10++DDF0 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  11++DDF2 C9                                   ret
  12++DDF3
# file closed: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   4++DDF3                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm
   1++DDF3              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DDF3              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DDF3 21 F0 C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DDF6 ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DDF8 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DDF9 11 AA C0                             ld          de,UBnkX2
   7++DDFC ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   8++DDFE ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   9++DE00 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
  10++DE02 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  11++DE04 C9                                   ret

   5++DE05                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   1++DE05              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DE05              GetFaceAtA:         MACRO
   3++DE05 ~                                ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
   4++DE05 ~                                add         hl,a
   5++DE05 ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
   6++DE05                                  ENDM
   7++DE05
# file closed: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   6++DE05              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   7++DE05              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
   8++DE05               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
   9++DE05 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
  10++DE06
  11++DE06              PrepLines:
  12++DE06              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  13++DE06
  14++DE06              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  15++DE06              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  16++DE06              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  17++DE06              ;        or          8
  18++DE06              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  19++DE06              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  20++DE06              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  21++DE06              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  22++DE06              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  23++DE06              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  24++DE06              ;
  25++DE06              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  26++DE06              InitialiseLineRead:
  27++DE06                      ;break
  28++DE06                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  28++DE06 AF          >                        xor      a
  28++DE07 32 22 C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  29++DE0A                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayBytes                  ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  29++DE0A AF          >                        xor      a
  29++DE0B 32 23 C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a
  30++DE0E                      ldWriteZero PLEDGECTR
  30++DE0E AF          >                        xor      a
  30++DE0F 32 05 DE    >                        ld       (PLEDGECTR),a
  31++DE12 3A 38 C3             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  32++DE15 DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  33++DE17 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  34++DE1A 21 30 C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  35++DE1D 22 20 7F             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  36++DE20                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  36++DE20 3A 38 C3    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  36++DE23 32 24 7F    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  37++DE26 3A 51 C0             ld          a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  38++DE29                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  38++DE29 CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  38++DE2B CA 33 DE    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  39++DE2E E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  40++DE30 32 51 C0             ld          (UBnKexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  41++DE33              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  42++DE33              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  43++DE33              CalculateNewLines:
  44++DE33              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  45++DE33              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  46++DE33 21 39 C4             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  47++DE36                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  48++DE36 22 1E 7E             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  49++DE39 3A 33 C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  50++DE3C 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  51++DE3D              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  52++DE3D              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  53++DE3D 2A 1E 7E             ld          hl,(varV)
  54++DE40 E5                   push        hl
  55++DE41 FD E1                pop         iy
  56++DE43                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  57++DE43 ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  58++DE43                      ENDIF
  59++DE43 3A 0A 7E             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  60++DE46 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  61++DE47              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  62++DE47 FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  63++DE4A                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  63++DE4A BA          >                        cp      d
  63++DE4B DA 9D DE    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  64++DE4E              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  65++DE4E              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  66++DE4E              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  67++DE4E FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  68++DE51 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  69++DE52 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  70++DE54                      GetFaceAtA
  70++DE54 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  70++DE57 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  70++DE59 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  71++DE5A              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  72++DE5A                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  72++DE5A A7          >                        and     a
  72++DE5B C2 6F DE    >                        jp	    nz,VisibileEdge
  73++DE5E              IsFace2Visibile:
  74++DE5E 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  75++DE5F ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  76++DE61 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  77++DE63 E5                   push        hl
  78++DE64                      GetFaceAtA
  78++DE64 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  78++DE67 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  78++DE69 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  79++DE6A E1                   pop         hl
  80++DE6B                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  80++DE6B A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  80++DE6C CA 9D DE    >                        jp	    z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  81++DE6F              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  82++DE6F              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  83++DE6F              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  84++DE6F FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  85++DE72 CD E1 DD             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  86++DE75 FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  87++DE78 CD F3 DD             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
  88++DE7B                      IFDEF       CLIPVersion3
  89++DE7B ~                        call        ClipLineV3
  90++DE7B ~                        ld          a,(ClipSuccess)
  91++DE7B ~                        and         a
  92++DE7B ~                        jr          z,LL78EdgeNotVisible
  93++DE7B                      ELSE
  94++DE7B CD 7E C8                 call        ClipLine
  95++DE7E 38 1D                    jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
  96++DE80                      ENDIF
  97++DE80              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
  98++DE80 ED 5B 20 7F          ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
  99++DE84 21 A6 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
 100++DE87                      FourLDIInstrunctions
 100++DE87 ED A0       >                        ldi
 100++DE89 ED A0       >                        ldi
 100++DE8B ED A0       >                        ldi
 100++DE8D ED A0       >                        ldi
 101++DE8F ED 53 20 7F          ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
 102++DE93 21 22 C3             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
 103++DE96 34                   inc         (hl)
 104++DE97 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
 105++DE98                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
 105++DE98 FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
 105++DE9A D2 B3 DE    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
 106++DE9D              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
 107++DE9D              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 108++DE9D              LL78:
 109++DE9D 2A 1E 7E             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 110++DEA0 3E 04                ld          a,4
 111++DEA2 ED 31                add         hl,a
 112++DEA4 22 1E 7E             ld          (varV),hl
 113++DEA7 21 05 DE             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 114++DEAA 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 115++DEAB 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 116++DEAC                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 116++DEAC 21 24 7F    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 116++DEAF BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 116++DEB0 C2 3D DE    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 117++DEB3              CompletedLineGeneration:
 118++DEB3              LL81:
 119++DEB3              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 120++DEB3 3A 22 C3             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 121++DEB6 CB 27                sla         a
 122++DEB8 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 123++DEBA 32 23 C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 124++DEBD              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 125++DEBD C9                   ret
 126++DEBE
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm
1510+ DEBE
1511+ DEBE              UnivBankSize  EQU $ - StartOfUniv
1512+ DEBE
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/univ_ship_data.asm

   1+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   2+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   3+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   4+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
   5+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
   6+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
   7+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   8+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   9+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
  10+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  11+ C000
  12+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  13+ C000              ;                      0123456789ABCDEF
  14+ C000 53 75 6E 20  StartOfSun:        DB "Sun Data ......."
  14+ C004 44 61 74 61
  14+ C008 20 2E 2E 2E
  14+ C00C 2E 2E 2E 2E
  15+ C010              ; NOTE we can cheat and pre allocate segs just using a DS for now
  16+ C010              CheckRowHLOnScreen:     MACRO   failtarget
  17+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
  18+ C010 ~                                    and     a                               ; .
  19+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
  20+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
  21+ C010 ~                                    and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
  22+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ;
  23+ C010                                      ENDM
  24+ C010
  25+ C010              ; IY = SBnKLineArray + rowValue*2
  26+ C010              IYEquRowN:              MACRO   rowValue                        ; set up iy as target address
  27+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,rowValue
  28+ C010 ~                                    ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
  29+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  30+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  31+ C010 ~                                    push    hl
  32+ C010 ~                                    pop     iy
  33+ C010                                      ENDM
  34+ C010              ;   \ -> & 565D \ See ship data files chosen and loaded after flight code starts running.
  35+ C010              ; Universe map substibute for INWK

   5++C013 00           SBnKylo                     DB  0                       ; INWK+3 \ ylo

   1++C01D              ;-Rotation Matrix of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C01D              ; Rotation data is stored as lohi, but only 15 bits with 16th bit being  a sign bit. Note this is NOT 2'c compliment
   3++C01D 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevX            DW  0                       ; INWK +21
   4++C01F              SBnKrotmatSidev             equ SBnKrotmatSidevX
   5++C01F 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevY            DW  0                       ; INWK +23
   6++C021 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +25
   7++C023 00 00        SBnKrotmatRoofvX            DW  0                       ; INWK +15
   8++C025              SBnKrotmatRoofv             equ SBnKrotmatRoofvX
   9++C025 00 00        SBnKrotmatRoofvY            DW  0                       ; INWK +17
  10++C027 00 00        SBnKrotmatRoofvZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +19

  12++C02B              SBnKrotmatNosev             EQU SBnKrotmatNosevX

  51+ C078              SBnKzPointSign              equ SBnKzPoint+2
  52+ C078                                      INCLUDE "./Universe/Sun/SunXX15Vars.asm"

  77+ C1A5              SBnK_Data_len               EQU $ - SBnKDataBlock

  79+ C1A5              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  80+ C1A5 21 10 C0     ResetSBnKData:          ld      hl,SBnKDataBlock
  81+ C1A8 11 95 01                             ld      de,SBnK_Data_len
  82+ C1AB AF                                   xor     a
  83+ C1AC CD AD 7A                             call    memfill_dma
  84+ C1AF C9                                   ret
  85+ C1B0              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  86+ C1B0 21 10 C0     ResetSBnKPosition:      ld      hl,SBnKxlo
  87+ C1B3 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
  88+ C1B5 AF                                   xor     a
  89+ C1B6 77           .zeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a
  90+ C1B7 23                                   inc     hl
  91+ C1B8 10 FC                                djnz    .zeroLoop
  92+ C1BA C9                                   ret
  93+ C1BB              ; This uses UBNKNodeArray as the list
  94+ C1BB              ; the array is 256 * 2 bytes
  95+ C1BB              ; counter is current row y pos
  96+ C1BB              ; byte 1 is start x pos
  97+ C1BB              ; byte 2 is end x pos
  98+ C1BB              ; if they are both 0 then skip
  99+ C1BB              ; its always horizontal, yellow
 100+ C1BB
 101+ C1BB              ; PLANET
 102+ C1BB
 103+ C1BB
 104+ C1BB              .SunNoDraw:             SetCarryFlag                    ; ship is behind so do not draw, so we don't care abour draw as dot
 104+ C1BB 37          >                        scf
 105+ C1BC C9                                   ret
 106+ C1BD
 107+ C1BD
 108+ C1BD
 109+ C1BD              SunBankDraw:            MACRO
 110+ C1BD ~            .drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 111+ C1BD ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 112+ C1BD ~                                    inc     hl
 113+ C1BD ~                                    ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 114+ C1BD ~                                    inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 115+ C1BD ~                                    push    hl,,bc
 116+ C1BD ~                                    cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 117+ C1BD ~                                    IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 118+ C1BD ~                                    ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 119+ C1BD ~                                    sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 120+ C1BD ~                                    inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 121+ C1BD ~                                    call    z, .FixWidth
 122+ C1BD ~                                    ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 123+ C1BD ~                                    ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 124+ C1BD ~                                    call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 125+ C1BD ~            .NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 126+ C1BD ~                                    inc     b
 127+ C1BD ~                                    dec     iyh
 128+ C1BD ~                                    IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 129+ C1BD                                      ENDM
 130+ C1BD
 131+ C1BD
 132+ C1BD
 133+ C1BD              SunDraw:                MMUSelectLayer2
 133+ C1BD ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 134+ C1C1 3A A1 C5     .OptimiseStartPos:      ld      a,(MinYOffset)
 135+ C1C4                                      JumpIfAIsZero .OffsetIsZero     ; if offset is 0 then just initate as normal
 135+ C1C4 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 135+ C1C5 CA D5 C1    >                        jp	    z, .OffsetIsZero
 136+ C1C8                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64, .OffsetLT64  ; if offset >=64 then we adjust and mve to bank 0
 136+ C1C8 FE 40       >                        cp      64
 136+ C1CA DA E2 C1    >                        jp		c, .OffsetLT64
 137+ C1CD D6 40        .OffsetGTE64:           sub     64
 138+ C1CF 32 A1 C5                             ld      (MinYOffset),a          ; adjust offset for bank 2
 139+ C1D2 C3 1A C2                             jp      .StartBank2
 140+ C1D5 06 00        .OffsetIsZero:          ld      b,0                     ; row
 141+ C1D7 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64                  ; counter
 142+ C1DA 21 A3 C0                             ld      hl,SBnKLineArray        ; set hl to start of array
 143+ C1DD C3 F4 C1                             jp      .StartBank1
 144+ C1E0              ;-- Snuck routine in here so that the macro will be happier
 145+ C1E0 3D           .FixWidth:              dec     a                       ; if carry resulted in a value of zero then correct
 146+ C1E1 C9                                   ret
 147+ C1E2 21 A3 C0     .OffsetLT64:            ld      hl,SBnKLineArray        ; adjust hl for line array offset
 148+ C1E5 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 149+ C1E7 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 150+ C1E9 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; set b row to the actual offset
 151+ C1EA 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; iyh = 64 - Y offset
 152+ C1EB 3E 40                                ld      a,64                    ; .
 153+ C1ED 91                                   sub     c                       ; .
 154+ C1EE FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 155+ C1F0 AF                                   xor     a                       ; Ready bank 2 with no offset
 156+ C1F1 32 A1 C5                             ld      (MinYOffset),a          ; .
 157+ C1F4 D9           .StartBank1:            exx
 158+ C1F5 3E 00                                ld      a,LAYER2_SHIFTED_SCREEN_TOP
 159+ C1F7 CD 38 E0                             call    asm_l2_bank_select      ; get in the first bank, we will only then bank select when needed
 160+ C1FA D9                                   exx
 161+ C1FB                                      SunBankDraw
 161+ C1FB 7E          >.drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 161+ C1FC 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 161+ C1FD 23          >                        inc     hl
 161+ C1FE 56          >                        ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 161+ C1FF 23          >                        inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 161+ C200 E5 C5       >                        push    hl,,bc
 161+ C202 BA          >                        cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 161+ C203             >                        IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 161+ C203 CA 12 C2    >                        jp	z,.NoLineDraw
 161+ C206 7A          >                        ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 161+ C207 91          >                        sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 161+ C208 3C          >                        inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 161+ C209 CC E0 C1    >                        call    z, .FixWidth
 161+ C20C 57          >                        ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 161+ C20D 1E D8       >                        ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 161+ C20F CD DB E2    >                        call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 161+ C212 C1 E1       >.NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 161+ C214 04          >                        inc     b
 161+ C215 FD 25       >                        dec     iyh
 161+ C217             >                        IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 161+ C217 C2 FB C1    >                        jp	nz,.drawLoop
 162+ C21A 3A A1 C5     .StartBank2:            ld      a,(MinYOffset)
 163+ C21D                                      JumpIfAIsZero .OffsetBank2IsZero; if offset is 0 then we just continue, offset can never be >127 else there would be no draw
 163+ C21D A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 163+ C21E CA 32 C2    >                        jp	    z, .OffsetBank2IsZero
 164+ C221 21 23 C1     .NotZeroOffset:         ld      hl,SBnKLineArray + (64 * 2); adjust to correct offset
 165+ C224 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 166+ C226 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 167+ C228 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; iyh = 64 - offset
 168+ C229 3E 40                                ld      a,64                    ; .
 169+ C22B 91                                   sub     c                       ; .
 170+ C22C FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                   ; .
 171+ C22E 41                                   ld      b,c                     ; b = offset row
 172+ C22F C3 3A C2                             jp      .drawLineBank2
 173+ C232 21 23 C1     .OffsetBank2IsZero:     ld      hl,SBnKLineArray + (64 * 2); start with offset adjusted
 174+ C235 06 00                                ld      b,0
 175+ C237 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64
 176+ C23A D9           .drawLineBank2:         exx
 177+ C23B 3E 40                                ld      a,LAYER2_SHIFTED_SCREEN_MIDDLE
 178+ C23D CD 38 E0                             call    asm_l2_bank_select      ; now do the lower bank
 179+ C240 D9                                   exx
 180+ C241              ; Could make this a sub routine but unwrapping saves a call
 181+ C241                                      SunBankDraw
 181+ C241 7E          >.drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 181+ C242 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 181+ C243 23          >                        inc     hl
 181+ C244 56          >                        ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 181+ C245 23          >                        inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 181+ C246 E5 C5       >                        push    hl,,bc
 181+ C248 BA          >                        cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 181+ C249             >                        IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 181+ C249 CA 58 C2    >                        jp	z,.NoLineDraw
 181+ C24C 7A          >                        ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 181+ C24D 91          >                        sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 181+ C24E 3C          >                        inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 181+ C24F CC E0 C1    >                        call    z, .FixWidth
 181+ C252 57          >                        ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 181+ C253 1E D8       >                        ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 181+ C255 CD DB E2    >                        call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 181+ C258 C1 E1       >.NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 181+ C25A 04          >                        inc     b
 181+ C25B FD 25       >                        dec     iyh
 181+ C25D             >                        IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 181+ C25D C2 41 C2    >                        jp	nz,.drawLoop
 182+ C260 C9                                   ret
 183+ C261
 184+ C261              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 185+ C261              ; This sets current universe object to a star / sun, they use sign + 23 bit positions
 186+ C261 CD A5 C1     CreateSun:              call    ResetSBnKData
 187+ C264 3A 19 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 188+ C267 E6 07                                and     %00000111
 189+ C269 F6 81                                or      %10000001
 190+ C26B 32 18 C0                             ld      (SBnKzsgn),a
 191+ C26E 3A 1B 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 192+ C271 E6 03                                and     %00000011
 193+ C273 32 12 C0                             ld      (SBnKxsgn),a
 194+ C276 32 15 C0                             ld      (SBnKysgn),a
 195+ C279 21 00 00                             ld      hl, $0000
 196+ C27C 22 17 C0                             ld      (SBnKzhi),hl
 197+ C27F 3E E3                                ld      a, $E3
 198+ C281 32 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),a
 199+ C284 C9                                   ret
 200+ C285              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 201+ C285              ; This creates a sun relative to space station on launch
 202+ C285 CD A5 C1     CreateSunLaunched:      call    ResetSBnKData
 203+ C288 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 204+ C28B 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 205+ C28D 22 10 C0                             ld      (SBnKxlo),hl
 206+ C290 22 13 C0                             ld      (SBnKylo),hl
 207+ C293 21 00 E0                             ld      hl,$E000
 208+ C296 22 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),hl
 209+ C299 32 12 C0                             ld      (SBnKxsgn),a
 210+ C29C 32 18 C0                             ld      (SBnKzsgn),a
 211+ C29F 3E 06                                ld      a,$06
 212+ C2A1 32 15 C0                             ld      (SBnKysgn),a
 213+ C2A4 C9                                   ret
